tika-abh05t:5_0: Dhātukathāpakaraṇadesanāya desadesakaparisāpadesā vuttappakārā evāti kālāpadesaṃ dassento “dhātukathāpakaraṇaṃ desento”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:5_1: “Tasseva anantaraṃ adesayī”ti hi iminā vibhaṅgānantaraṃ dhātukathā desitāti tassā desanākālo apadiṭṭho hoti.
tika-abh05t:6_0: “Kāmā te paṭhamā senā”tiādivacanato kilesaviddhaṃsanampi devaputtamārassa balavidhamananti sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh05t:6_5: Nanu cetaṃ pañcannaṃ mārānaṃ bhañjanaṃ sāvakesupi labbhatevāti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “parūpanissayarahita”ntiādi.
tika-abh05t:6_6: Vīrassa bhāvo vīriyanti katvā vuttaṃ “mahāvīriyoti mahāvīro”ti.
tika-abh05t:6_7: Mahāvīriyatā ca paripuṇṇavīriyapāramitāya caturaṅgasamannāgatavīriyādhiṭṭhānena anaññasādhāraṇacatubbidhasammappadhānasampattiyā ca veditabbā.
tika-abh05t:7_0: Khandhādike dhamme adhiṭṭhāya nissāya visayaṃ katvā abhidhammakathā pavattāti āha “abhidhammakathādhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vā”ti.
tika-abh05t:7_2: Etena atthavisesasannissayo byañjanasamudāyo pakaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh05t:7_6: Yadi evaṃ sattannampi pakaraṇānaṃ dhātukathābhāvo āpajjatīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yadipī”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:7_7: Tattha sātisayanti savisesaṃ vicittātirekavasena anavasesato ca desanāya pavattattā.
tika-abh05t:7_8: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya mātikā”ti.
tika-abh05t:8_2: tesaṃ vasena aññehipi asādhāraṇaṃ imassa pakaraṇassa dhātukathābhāvaṃ dassento “khandhāyatanadhātūhi vā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:8_4: Mahanto pabhedānugato visayo etāsanti mahāvisayā, dhātuyo,
tika-abh05t:8_6: Yena vā sabhāvena dhammā saṅgahāsaṅgahasampayogavippayogehi uddesaniddese labhanti,
tika-abh05t:8_8: Sā dhātu idha sātisayaṃ desitāti savisesaṃ dhātuyā kathanato idaṃ pakaraṇaṃ “dhātukathā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:8_16: saddo labbhatīti āha “sattannaṃ pakaraṇānaṃ kamena vaṇṇanāya pavattattā”ti.
tika-abh05t:8_21: “Atthaṃ dīpayissāmī”ti vatvā “taṃ suṇāthā”ti vadanto sotadvārānusārena tattha upadhāraṇe niyojetīti āha
tika-abh05t:12_5: “Saṅgahitena sampayuttaṃ vippayutta”ntiādīni pana tīṇi tīṇi padāni ekekaṃ padaṃ.
tika-abh05t:12_9: taṃ pana pavattanaṃ ñāpanañca hotīti “pavattīyati ñāyantī”ti ca dvidhāpi attho vutto.
tika-abh05t:12_11: Atthadvayepi pavattanañāṇakiriyānaṃ karaṇabhāvena saṅgahādippakārā nayāti vuttā.
tika-abh05t:14_2: Paṭicca samuppajjati saṅkhārādikaṃ etasmāti hi paṭiccasamuppādo,
tika-abh05t:14_10: sokādayo ca sarūpatoyeva idha pāḷiyaṃ gahitāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tatthā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:14_11: Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ “pañcavīsādhikena padasatenā”ti evaṃ vutte aṭṭhakathāvacane.
tika-abh05t:14_14: Padatthato pana kammabhavo bhavati etasmāti bhavo,
tika-abh05t:15_0: “Sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya mātikā”ti idampi dhātukathāya mātikākittanamevāti “sabbāpi…pe…
tika-abh05t:15_1: mātikāti ayaṃ dhātukathāmātikāto bahiddhā vuttā”ti vacanaṃ asambhāvento “atha vā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:15_4: pakaraṇantaragatattā pana aññato gahetabbarūpā ito bahibhūtā nāma honti,
tika-abh05t:15_9: Na hi mātikāya asaṅgahito koci padattho atthi.
tika-abh05t:15_10: Vikiṇṇabhāvenāti khandhavibhaṅgādīsu visuṃ visuṃ kiṇṇabhāvena visaṭabhāvena.
tika-abh05t:17_3: Yathāvuttadhammā yathārahaṃ khandhāyatanadhātuyo arūpino ca khandhāti tesaṃ uddeso nayamukhamātikā.
tika-abh05t:17_8: saṅgahāsaṅgahadhammā ca viyogīsahayogīdhammā ca saṅgahā…pe… dhammā,
tika-abh05t:17_15: yaṃ yaṃ padaṃ saṅgahito asaṅgahitoti ca vattuṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:18_3: Na saṅgahabhūtehīti saṅgahaṇakiriyāya karaṇabhūtehi saccādīhi saṅgahāsaṅgaho na vutto.
tika-abh05t:18_4: Tatthāpi hi khandhāyatanadhātuyo eva karaṇabhūtāti dasseti.
tika-abh05t:18_11: aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā”ti saṅgahāsaṅgaho niyametvā vutto.
tika-abh05t:19_0: Kasmā panettha saccādayo saṅgahavasena na vuttāti?
tika-abh05t:19_3: saññādīnaṃ vā indriyādīhi saṅgahanayena pucchituṃ vissajjituṃ vāti.
tika-abh05t:19_4: Tathā ariyaphalādīsu uppannavedanādīnaṃ saccavinimuttatāya “vedanākkhandho katihi saccehi saṅgahito”ti
tika-abh05t:19_5: pucchitvāpi “ekena saccena saṅgahito”tiādinā niyametvā saṅgahaṃ dassetuṃ na sakkāti.
tika-abh05t:20_0: Rūpaṃ rūpena nibbānena vā vippayuttaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh05t:20_3: Catunnañhi khandhānaṃ aññamaññaṃ sampayogībhāvato “rūpanibbānehipi so atthi natthī”ti siyā āsaṅkā,
tika-abh05t:20_8: nibbānassa vā rūpena katthaci sampayogo atthīti tadāsaṅkābhāvato vippayogopi rūpassa rūpanibbānehi,
tika-abh05t:20_12: Anārammaṇaanārammaṇamissakehīti anārammaṇena sotāyatanādinā anārammaṇamissakena ca dhammāyatanādinā.
tika-abh05t:20_17: Yathā hi sārammaṇassa anārammaṇena anārammaṇamissakena ca vippayogo hoti,
tika-abh05t:20_19: Tena viya anārammaṇassa anārammaṇamissakassa cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:22_1: Visuṃ yojanā kātabbāti yo tīhi saṅgaho catūhi ca sampayogo vutto,
tika-abh05t:22_3: yo ca tīhi asaṅgaho catūhi ca vippayogo vutto,
tika-abh05t:22_11: Idāni yathāvuttaṃ sabhāgataṃ sarūpato niddhāretvā dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:22_13: ekuppādādiko sampayogeti iminā ruppanādividhuro asamānasabhāvo asaṅgahe visabhāgatā,
tika-abh05t:22_14: nānuppādādiko vippayogeti ayamattho atthasiddhoti na vuttoti.
tika-abh05t:24_1: Etena ṭhapanākārenāti sarūpena aggahetvā yathāvuttena pakaraṇantaramātikāya idha mātikābhāvakittanasaṅkhātena ṭhapanākārena.
tika-abh05t:24_2: Pakaraṇantaraṭhapitāya mātikāya avibhāgena pacchato gahaṇaṃ bahi ṭhapananti āha “bahi piṭṭhito ṭhapitattā”ti.
tika-abh05t:24_3: Idha aṭṭhapetvāti imissā dhātukathāya sarūpena avatvā.
tika-abh05t:24_9: tesaṃ nayānaṃ pavattidvāralakkhaṇesu ca uddiṭṭhesu dhātukathāya uddesavasena vattabbaṃ vuttameva hotīti yaṃ uddesavasena vattabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t:24_10: taṃ vatvā puna yathāvuttānaṃ khandhādīnaṃ kusalādivibhāgadassanatthaṃ “sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya
tika-abh05t:24_11: mātikā”ti vuttanti evamettha mātikāya nikkhepavidhi veditabbo.
tika-abh05t:25_1: saddo viya “saṅgaho asaṅgaho”ti ettha padatthavipallāsakārinā iti-
tika-abh05t:25_3: saddo saddapadatthako jāyatīti adhippāyenāha “aniddhāritatthassa saddasseva vuttattā”ti.
tika-abh05t:25_6: Sāmaññena gahetabbatanti saṅgahasaddābhidheyyatāsāmaññena viññāyamāno vuccamāno vā.
tika-abh05t:25_7: Na cettha sāmaññañca ekarūpamevāti codanā kātabbā bhedāpekkhattā tassa.
tika-abh05t:25_10: “Attano jātiyā”ti viññāyati yathā “matteyyā”ti vutte attano mātu hitāti.
tika-abh05t:26_0: Dhammavisesaṃ aniddhāretvāti saṅgahitatādinā pucchitabbavissajjetabbadhammānaṃ visesanaṃ akatvā.
tika-abh05t:26_3: Avasesā niddhāretvāti “saṅgahitena asaṅgahita”ntiādikā avasesā dvādasapi pucchitabbavissajjetabbadhammavisesaṃ
tika-abh05t:26_5: Nanu ca “saṅgahitena asaṅgahita”ntiādayopi yathāvuttavisesaṃ aniddhāretvā sāmaññena dhammānaṃ pucchanavissajjananayuddesāti
tika-abh05t:26_13: tena sotāyatanādibhāvena asaṅgahito sotapasādādiko yo ruppanasabhāvo dhammaviseso.
tika-abh05t:26_16: catūhi khandhehi asaṅgahitā”tiādinā asaṅgahitatāsaṅkhāto pucchāvissajjananayo parato pucchitvā vissajjiyamāno idha uddiṭṭho hoti.
tika-abh05t:26_17: Visesane karaṇavacananti iminā tassa dhammassa yathāvuttasaṅgahitatāvisesavisiṭṭhataṃyeva vibhāveti.
tika-abh05t:26_18: Evamete pucchitabbavissajjetabbadhammavisesaṃ niddhāretvā pucchanavissajjananayuddesā pavattāti veditabbā.
tika-abh05t:27_0: Nanu ca “saṅgahitena asaṅgahita”nti ettāvatāpi ayamattho labbhatīti?
tika-abh05t:27_4: Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadaniddese “cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā,
tika-abh05t:27_6: dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā”ti vatvā “te dhammā katihi khandhehi…pe…
tika-abh05t:27_7: asaṅgahitā”ti pucchitvā “te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā”ti dutiyaṃ asaṅgahitapadaṃ gahitaṃ.
tika-abh05t:28_0: Esa nayoti atidesena dassitamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “tesupī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:28_2: Kattuatthe karaṇaniddeso saṅgahitāsaṅgahitehi tehi dhammehi dhammānaṃ saṅgahitatāsaṅgahitatāya vuttattā.
tika-abh05t:28_3: Tathā hi tattha pāḷiyaṃ “tehi dhammehi ye dhammā”ti dhammamukheneva saṅgahitatāsaṅgahitatā vuttā.
tika-abh05t:28_4: Dutiyatatiyesu pana saṅgahitatāsaṅgahitatāsaṅkhātavisesanadvārena dhammānaṃ asaṅgahitatāsaṅgahitatā vuttāti tattha “visesane karaṇavacana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:28_11: Dhammantarassāti tato aññassa dhammassa visesanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh05t:28_12: Tattha hi antarena pakāravisesāmasanaṃ dhammeneva dhammo visesitoti.
tika-abh05t:28_16: Dutiyatatiyesu viya visesane eva karaṇavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t:29_1: saṅgahāsaṅgahānaṃ visuṃ saha ca visesanavisesitabbabhāvakappanatoti attho.
tika-abh05t:29_2: Taṃ pana vikappanaṃ vuttākārena vibhajanaṃ hotīti āha “vibhāgatoti attho”ti.
tika-abh05t:29_3: Sanniṭṭhānalakkhaṇena adhimokkhena sampayuttadhammā ārammaṇe nicchayanākārena pavattiyā sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttadhammā.
tika-abh05t:29_4: Te ca tehi saddhiṃ tadavasiṭṭhe dvipañcaviññāṇavicikicchāsahagatadhamme ca saṅgahetvā āha “sanniṭṭhānavasena
tika-abh05t:29_5: vuttā ca sabbe ca cittuppādā sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttasabbacittuppādā”ti.
tika-abh05t:29_13: adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo”ti paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge ca āgataṃ vacanaṃ sandhāya.
tika-abh05t:29_18: Tādisassāti phassādisadisassa sādhāraṇassa adhimokkhasadisassa asādhāraṇassa aññassa dhammassa abhāvā.
tika-abh05t:30_2: atthi pana visesoti dassento āha “jīvitindriyaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:30_3: Asamādhisabhāvā balabhāvaṃ appattā sāmaññasaddeneva vattabbāti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:30_4: Sāmaññavisesasaddehi cāti sāmaññavisesasaddehi vattabbā ca samādhisabhāvā cittekaggatā.
tika-abh05t:30_5: Visesasaddavacanīyaṃ aññanti balappattasamādhito aññaṃ sāmaññasaddena byāpetabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t:30_6: visesasaddena ca nivattetabbaṃ natthi samādhisabhāvāya eva cittekaggatāya gahitattā.
tika-abh05t:30_12: Tato viparītehi aññaṃ byāpetabbaṃ nivattetabbañca gahetvā pavattehi sāmaññavisesasaddeheva na sukhādisabhāvā vedanā viya vattabbā.
tika-abh05t:30_13: Tasmāti yasmā asamādhisabhāvā samādhisabhāvāti dvedhā bhinditvā gahitā cittekaggatā, tasmā.
tika-abh05t:30_19: Nanu ca abhinditvā gayhamānā cittekaggatā vedanā viya sādhāraṇā hotīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “abhinnāpi vā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:30_21: Arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyu ṭhitī”ti vacanato samādhijīvitindriyānaṃ aññadhammanissayena vattabbatā veditabbā.
tika-abh05t:30_22: Na arahatīti idha uddesaṃ na arahati samukheneva vattabbesu phassādīsu uddisiyamānesūti attho.
tika-abh05t:35_7: Evañca katvāti nayamukhamātikāya abhiññeyyanissayena vuccamānattā eva.
tika-abh05t:35_8: Tesaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ khandhabhāvena viya rūpakkhandhabhāvena sabhāgatā hoti,
tika-abh05t:35_14: Saddadvārena pana gahaṇe rūpakkhandhavacanasaṅkhātena vā rūpakkhandhavacanavacanīyatāsaṅkhātena.
tika-abh05t:35_15: Idāni tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “rūpakkhandhoti hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:36_2: Abhedato pañcakapucchāvissajjanaṃ khandhapadaniddese sabbapacchimamevāti āha “bhedato pañcakapucchāvissajjanānantara”nti.
tika-abh05t:38_1: Yadipi ekakepi sadisaṃ vissajjanaṃ vissajjanaṃ samudayamaggasaccānaṃ “samudayasaccaṃ ekena khandhena…pe…
tika-abh05t:38_2: maggasaccaṃ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṃ,
tika-abh05t:38_3: catūhi khandhehi ekādasahi āyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahita”nti niddiṭṭhattā.
tika-abh05t:38_6: Cakkhusotasukhindriyānañhi “ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṃ,
tika-abh05t:38_7: catūhi khandhehi ekādasahi āyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahita”nti ekake sadisaṃ vissajjanaṃ.
tika-abh05t:38_8: Cakkhusotindriyadukassa pana “cakkhundriyañca sotindriyañca ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā,
tika-abh05t:38_9: catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā”ti,
tika-abh05t:38_10: “cakkhundriyañca sukhindriyañca dvīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā,
tika-abh05t:38_11: tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā”ti cakkhusukhindriyadukassa ca asadisaṃ vissajjanaṃ.
tika-abh05t:38_12: Nāpi dukehi tikassāti cakkhusotacakkhusukhindriyādidukehi cakkhusotasukhindriyāditikassa nāpi sadisaṃ vissajjanaṃ.
tika-abh05t:38_16: na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā”ti sadisaṃ vissajjanaṃ.
tika-abh05t:41_10: Ekekabhūtānīti yathā ekasmiṃ rūpakalāpe jātiādīni ekekāniyeva honti,
tika-abh05t:41_13: Anubhavanasañjānanavijānanakiccānaṃ vedanādīnaṃ nibbattiādibhūtānipi jātiādīni tathā na gayhantīti āha “vediyana…pe…
tika-abh05t:41_17: aniccā saṅkhatā”tiādivacanato jātiādīnampi saṅkhatapariyāyo atthīti saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇakiccena saṅkhārakkhandhena
tika-abh05t:41_21: Tathā duvidhānīti vuttappakārena rūpārūpadhammānaṃ nibbattiādibhāvena dvippakārāni.
tika-abh05t:44_1: “Saṅgahitena asaṅgahita”nti ettha saṅgahitāsaṅgahitasaddā bhinnādhikaraṇā na gahetabbā visesanavisesitabbatāya icchitattā.
tika-abh05t:44_2: Yo hi dhammo saṅgahitatāvisesavisiṭṭho asaṅgahito heṭṭhā uddiṭṭho,
tika-abh05t:44_3: sveva idha asaṅgahitabhāvena pucchitvā vissajjīyatīti dassento “yaṃ taṃ…pe…
tika-abh05t:44_5: Ye hi dhammā cakkhāyatanena khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā,
tika-abh05t:44_7: tesaṃyeva puna khandhādīhi asaṅgaho pucchitvā vissajjito.
tika-abh05t:44_13: Savisesāva khandhādigaṇanāti “khandhasaṅgahenā”tiādinā avisesena vuttāpi rūpakkhandhādinā savisesāva khandhādigaṇanā,
tika-abh05t:45_5: Ettakeneva dassetabbā siyuṃ tāvatāpi saṅgahitena asaṅgahitabhāvassa pakāsitattā.
tika-abh05t:45_11: te khandhādayo kusalādayo ca tesaṃ visayabhūtāti tehi vinā saṅgahādīnaṃ pavatti natthi.
tika-abh05t:45_14: Yo hi idha saṅgāhakabhāvena vutto dhammo asaṅgāhakabhāvenapi vuttoyevāti.
tika-abh05t:46_4: tattha paṭhamanaye chaṭṭhanaye ca “rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehi saṅgahito?
tika-abh05t:46_7: Catūhi khandhehi vippayutto”ti ca evaṃ pucchitabbavissajjitabbabhāvena.
tika-abh05t:46_9: Tassa tassāti yaṃ pucchitabbaṃ vissajjitabbañca “ye dhammā”ti aniyamitarūpena niddhāritaṃ,
tika-abh05t:47_6: taṃ tadeva “cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā,
tika-abh05t:47_8: Añño dhammo natthi tassa sabhāgabhāvena saṅgāhakasseva abhāvato.
tika-abh05t:47_10: taṃ paṭikkhipanto āha “na ca so…pe… hotī”ti.
tika-abh05t:48_0: Yadi cātiādināpi tasseva tena saṅgahābhāvaṃ pāṭhābhāvadassanena vibhāveti.
tika-abh05t:48_1: Tattha so evāti yo rūpādikkhandho saṅgāhakabhāvena vutto,
tika-abh05t:48_2: so eva tena rūpādikkhandhena saṅgayheyya saṅgahetabbo bhaveyya,
tika-abh05t:48_3: teneva tassa saṅgahābhāve lakkhaṇaṃ dassento āha “na hi so eva tassa sabhāgo visabhāgo cā”ti.
tika-abh05t:48_5: Rūpakkhandho cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ na saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca sabhāgavisabhāgabhāvābhāvato.
tika-abh05t:49_0: Yathā sabbena sabbaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgābhāvena ekadesānaṃ samudāyo saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca na hoti,
tika-abh05t:49_2: Tattha yathātiādi udāharaṇadassanena yathāvuttassa atthassa pākaṭakaraṇaṃ.
tika-abh05t:49_6: visabhāgaṃ yena samudāyo saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca siyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:49_7: Ettha ca saṅgāhakattaṃ tāva mā hotu,
tika-abh05t:49_8: asaṅgāhakattaṃ pana kasmā paṭikkhipīyatīti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “tasmā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:49_13: Taṃ panetaṃ “rūpakkhandho rūpakkhandhena saṅgahito asaṅgahito ca na hotī”tiādinā vutte tayo pakāre sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:49_16: attekadesasabhāgo cāti vuttānaṃ saṅgāhakabhāvo eva natthi sabhāgābhāvato.
tika-abh05t:49_17: Tena vuttaṃ “na hi so eva tassa sabhāgo”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:49_19: Evarūpānanti yathāvuttānaṃ tippakārānaṃ aggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ satipi visabhāgabhāveti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:50_1: Ekadesassa vedanākkhandhādikassa samudāyassa dhammāyatanassa saṅgāhakattaṃ ekadesena samudāyassa saṅgahitabhāvanti attho,
tika-abh05t:50_2: samudāyassa rūpakkhandhassa ekadesassa cakkhāyatanassa sotāyatanassa ca saṅgāhakattaṃ samudāyena ekadesassa saṅgahitabhāvanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh05t:50_6: Pañcadhāti rūpādicatukkhandhasaṅgaho viññāṇakkhandhasaṅgahoti evaṃ pañcappakārena bhinnataṃ.
tika-abh05t:50_15: tāni pana visesanabhūtāni appadhānānīti visesitabbabhūtānaṃ padhānānaṃ vasenevaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:50_16: “Cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā”tiādinā kattuādayo niddiṭṭhāti āha “kattukaraṇakammattayasabbhāvā”ti.
tika-abh05t:51_5: Saṅgāhakasaṅgahetabbānanti cakkhāyatanādikassa saṅgāhakassa sotāyatanādikassa ca saṅgahetabbassa.
tika-abh05t:51_9: Ayanti yvāyaṃ paṭhamanaye tathā tathā gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbatāsaṅkhāto dutiyādinayesu yathāvuttānaṃ samānakkhandhādibhāvābhāvasaṅkhāto
tika-abh05t:52_3: Na hi sakkā “samudayasaccena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā,
tika-abh05t:52_6: Itarehīti āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgāhakattāsaṅgāhakattābhāvato na uddhaṭānīti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:52_8: Na rūpakkhandhoti na sabbo rūpakkhandhadhammoti attho.
tika-abh05t:53_3: Karaṇaṃ pana katturahitaṃ natthīti āha “kenaci saṅgāhakenāti idaṃ pana ānetvā vattabba”nti.
tika-abh05t:53_4: Saṅgāhakesu na yujjati na saṅgahetabbesūti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:53_5: Rūpakkhandhadhammā hi “ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā”ti vuttāti.
tika-abh05t:53_6: Samudāye vuttavidhi tadavayavepi sambhavatīti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpento “etena nayenā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:53_8: saddena karīyatīti āha “na hi aññamattanivāraṇaṃ eva-
tika-abh05t:53_13: Saṅgāhakāpekkhatte hi “so cā”tiādivacanassa “cakkhāyatanena rūpakkhandhova saṅgahito”ti ettha cakkhāyatanaṃ
tika-abh05t:53_14: saṅgāhakanti yathādhippetassa atthassa asambhavo evāti idāni taṃ asambhavaṃ vibhāvento “katha”ntiādimāha,
tika-abh05t:54_3: samudāyo vā tadekadesānaṃ saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca hotīti vuttovāyamatthoti āha “rūpakkhandho…pe…
tika-abh05t:54_5: Iminā pariyāyenāti yasmā vuttappakāraṃ saṅgāhakattaṃ natthi “yena saṅgahitassa asaṅgāhakaṃ siyā”ti iminā pariyāyena.
tika-abh05t:54_8: Saṅgahitatāyāti nippariyāyena saṅgahitabhāvena asaṅgahitatāya abhāvo vuttoti na yujjatīti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:54_16: Etāni aññāni cāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-abh05t:55_4: Samudayasaccādīsūti samudayasaccasukhindriyādīsu yujjeyya taṃ kāraṇaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-abh05t:55_5: Tehi samudayasaccādīhi khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahite dhammajāte sati tassa āyatanasaṅgahādīhi asaṅgahitattassa abhāvato.
tika-abh05t:55_8: “So eva tassa saṅgāhako na hotī”ti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-abh05t:55_11: Aññassa pana vedanākkhandhādikassa rūpakkhandhādinā saṅgahitattābhāvena asaṅgahitattaṃ atthīti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:55_20: Tesanti khandhacatukkakhandhadukādīnaṃ asaṅgahitatā na natthi atthevāti tassā abhāvo anekantiko.
tika-abh05t:56_1: Nivattetvā gaṇhantoti pubbe vuttaṃ paṭinivattetvā gaṇhanto paccāmasanto.
tika-abh05t:56_4: na saṅgāhakattābhāvatoti yasmā nesaṃ asaṅgāhakattaṃ viya saṅgāhakattampi natthi,
tika-abh05t:59_2: Tasmāti yasmā ekadesasabhāgatā samudāyasabhāgatā na hoti, tasmā.
tika-abh05t:59_6: evaṃ ekadesasabhāgatāya asaṅgahitatāpi natthīti dassento “na kevala”ntiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:59_10: Na kathañci sammissāti kenacipi pakārena na sammissāti asammissatāya saṅgahitattābhāvaṃ sādheti.
tika-abh05t:59_12: na hotīti yathā rūpakkhandhena sabhāgatābhāvato nibbānaṃ na kenacipi saṅgahaṇena saṅgahitaṃ,
tika-abh05t:59_13: evaṃ viññāṇakkhandhacakkhāyatanādīhi taṃ āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgahitaṃ na hotīti khandhasaṅgahābhāvo pākaṭo vuttovāti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:60_1: Na hi nibbānaṃ sandhāya “rūpakkhandhena viññāṇakkhandhena cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā,
tika-abh05t:60_4: Tathā “abyākatehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā,
tika-abh05t:60_5: āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā”tiādi na sakkā vattuṃ tādisassa dhammassa abhāvatoti āha “sanibbāna…pe…
tika-abh05t:60_15: Asaṅgahitasaṅgāhakattāti khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitānaṃ saññākkhandhādīnaṃ āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgāhakattāti attho.
tika-abh05t:61_0: Visabhāgakkhandhanibbānasamudāyattā khandhasaṅgahena dhammāyatanena na koci dhammo saṅgahito atthīti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:61_1: Etassāti “dhammāyatanena saṅgahitā”ti etassa padassa dhammāyatanagaṇanena saṅgahitāti attho.
tika-abh05t:64_3: asaṅgahaṇapubbaṃ saṅgahaṇañca vuccamānaṃ saṅgahaṇāsaṅgahaṇānaṃ pavattivisesena vuttaṃ hotīti āha “saṅgahaṇā…pe…
tika-abh05t:64_5: Saṅgahābhāvakato asaṅgaho saṅgahahetuko saṅgahassa pavattivisesoyeva nāma hotīti āha “saṅgahaṇappavattivisesavirahe”ti.
tika-abh05t:64_6: Kenaci samudayasaccādinā tīhipi saṅgahehi saṅgahitena saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannena dhammavisesena puna
tika-abh05t:64_7: tatheva saṅgahito so eva samudayasaccādiko dhammaviseso saṅgahitena saṅgahito.
tika-abh05t:64_10: Yathā hi tīhi saṅgahehi na saṅgāhakā,
tika-abh05t:64_12: ekenapi saṅgahena na saṅgāhakā idha na uddhaṭā.
tika-abh05t:64_13: Tehi saṅgahitāti tehi tīhi saṅgahehi saṅgahitā dhammā.
tika-abh05t:65_1: Tena khandhādipadenāti “teneva saṅgahaṃ gaccheyyā”ti ettha tena khandhādipadenāti evaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:65_2: Evaṃ pana ayojetvā “yaṃ attano saṅgāhakaṃ saṅgaṇhitvā puna teneva saṅgahaṃ gaccheyya,
tika-abh05t:65_3: taṃ aññaṃ saṅgahitaṃ nāma natthī”ti evaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh05t:65_5: Na hi yena samudayasaccādinā yaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannaṃ dhammajātaṃ khandhādisaṅgahehi saṅgahitaṃ,
tika-abh05t:65_7: na ca tasseva kevalassa samudayasaccādikassa saṅgaho pucchito vissajjitoti yojanā,
tika-abh05t:65_10: Tasmā attano saṅgāhakaṃ sakalakkhaṇādiṃ saṅgaṇhitvā puna tena khandhādipadena yaṃ saṅgahaṃ gaccheyya,
tika-abh05t:65_12: Vedanā saddo ca khandho āyatanañcāti vedanā visuṃ khandho,
tika-abh05t:65_15: Asammissanti abyākatadukkhasaccādi viya amissitaṃ. Na hi…pe…
tika-abh05t:65_16: etthāti saṅgahitatāvisiṭṭhena dhammena yo dhammo saṅgahito,
tika-abh05t:65_18: so na ettha vāre pucchito vissajjito ca.
tika-abh05t:65_21: Na saṅgāhakenāti idaṃ yathāvuttena atthena nivattitassa dassanaṃ.
tika-abh05t:68_2: tasmā yo ettha kenaci asaṅgahitena dhammavisesena puna asaṅgahito dhammaviseso asaṅgahitena asaṅgahito asaṅgahitatāya pucchitabbo vissajjitabbo ca.
tika-abh05t:68_3: Tameva tāva yathāniddhāritaṃ dassento “rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā khandha…pe…
tika-abh05t:68_18: tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahetabbassa atthitāya paripuṇṇasaṅgahāsaṅgāhakattāti attho.
tika-abh05t:69_1: tasmā taṃ anidassanaappaṭighehi asaṅgahetabbaṃ na hotīti attho.
tika-abh05t:69_5: nāmarūpapañhādayo pana catuvīsatīti āha “sabbepi catuttiṃsa hontī”ti.
tika-abh05t:69_8: “Rūpakkhandhenā”tiādi sabbampi vā viññāpetuṃ icchitabhāvena vacanaṃ pañhabhāvato pucchā.
tika-abh05t:69_11: Te hi lakkhaṇato dassitāti te niddhāritadhammā teneva asaṅgahitāsaṅgahitatāya niddhāraṇasaṅkhātena lakkhaṇena dassitā.
tika-abh05t:70_3: taṃ khandhādīhi asaṅgahita”nti ettha “khandhādīhevā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ nippayojanaṃ pakārantarassa abhāvato.
tika-abh05t:70_6: Tadevāti pana icchitaṃ uddhaṭasseva asaṅgahitenaasaṅgahitabhāvassa avadhāretabbattāti dassento “na kadācī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:70_9: Niyamatoti sakkā vacanaseso yojetunti idampi eva-
tika-abh05t:70_18: Etena yo pucchāya uddhaṭo tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahito,
tika-abh05t:71_0: Avasesā vedanādayo tayo khandhā nibbānañca sakalena rūpakkhandhena tesaṃ saṅgaho natthīti “saṅgahitā”ti na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh05t:71_1: ekadesena pana saṅgaho atthīti “asaṅgahitā na hontīti evaṃ daṭṭhabba”nti āha.
tika-abh05t:71_4: Tena vuttaṃ “anuddhaṭā vedanādayopi hi asaṅgahitā evā”ti.
tika-abh05t:71_8: Rūpaviññāṇehīti asukhumarūpadhammehi viññāṇena cāti ayamettha adhippāyoti dassento “oḷārika…pe…
tika-abh05t:71_10: Kathaṃ pana rūpadhammāti vutte oḷārikarūpasseva gahaṇanti āha “rūpekadeso hi ettha rūpaggahaṇena gahito”ti.
tika-abh05t:72_2: asaṅgahitā”ti evaṃ asaṅgāhakabhāvena vuttaṃ pucchitabbavissajjetabbabhāvena vuttampi kāmaṃ vedanādīheva catūhi asaṅgahitaṃ,
tika-abh05t:72_3: taṃ pana na cakkhāyatanamevāti dassetuṃ “cakkhāyatanena panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:72_5: Sabbaṃ dhammajātaṃ teva rūpādike dhamme udāneti pāḷiyaṃ.
tika-abh05t:72_8: Dveti “bāhirā upādā dve”ti ettha vuttaṃ dve-
tika-abh05t:72_13: “Rūpaṃ dhammāyatana”ntiādīnaṃ padānaṃ vasena dvevīsapadiko esa nayo.
tika-abh05t:75_4: veditabba”nti vatvā puna “rūpakkhandhādīsu hī”tiādinā tamatthaṃ vivarati.
tika-abh05t:75_5: Tattha na labbhatīti “sampayuttaṃ vippayutta”nti vā gahetuṃ na labbhati,
tika-abh05t:75_10: Tena panettha rūpadhammesu sampayogaṭṭho na labbhatīti ayamattho dassito hoti.
tika-abh05t:75_17: tasmā ekuppādādibhāvarahitānaṃ rūpanibbānānaṃ sā ekuppādāditā visabhāgatā vuttā.
tika-abh05t:75_22: Tattha tesaṃ tehīti ca arūpakkhandhe eva parāmasati.
tika-abh05t:75_23: Visabhāgatā ca hoti rūpanibbānesu avijjamānattāti attho.
tika-abh05t:76_0: Tīhi viññāṇadhātūhīti ghānajivhākāyaviññāṇadhātūhi vippayutte anārammaṇamissake rūpadhammamissake dhamme dīpeti rūpabhavoti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:76_4: Tathā hi “vippayutte ahonte sattahipi sampayutte sattapi vā tā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:77_0: Yadi evanti yadi anārammaṇamissānaṃ dhammānaṃ vippayogo natthi.
tika-abh05t:77_4: Arūpakkhandheyeva pana sandhāya “tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā”ti vuttanti nāyaṃ dosoti dasseti.
tika-abh05t:77_6: Tadekadesaññasamudāyāti tasseva yathāvuttassa samudāyassa ekadesā hutvā aññesaṃ avayavānaṃ rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ samudāyabhūtā.
tika-abh05t:77_9: Na hi samudāyāvayavānaṃ sāmaññavisesānaṃ viya accantabhedo atthi bhedābhedayuttattā.
tika-abh05t:77_10: Tesaṃ accantabhedameva hi sandhāya “samudāyantogadhānaṃ ekadesānaṃ na vibhāgo atthī”ti saṅgahepi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:77_15: Tasmāti yasmā vibhattasabhāvānaṃ na tesaṃ samudāyekadesādibhāvo, tasmā.
tika-abh05t:77_16: Yasmā pana kusalādayo eva khandhādayoti khandhādiāmasanena samudāyekadesādibhāvo āpanno evāti vuttanayena vippayogābhāvo hoti,
tika-abh05t:77_19: Aññamaññavippayuttatā vuttā “kusalehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā”tiādinā.
tika-abh05t:78_0: Chattiṃsāya piṭṭhidukapadesu vīsati dukapadāni imasmiṃ naye labbhanti,
tika-abh05t:78_2: Tato eva “tevīsapadasata”nti ettha “tevīsa”nti idañca “ekavīsa”nti vattabbanti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:78_4: Ekakālekasantānānaṃ bhinnakālabhinnasantānānañca anekesaṃ dhammānaṃ samudāyabhūtā saṅkhārakkhandhadhammāyatanadhammadhātuyoti āha “kālasantāna…pe…
tika-abh05t:78_6: Ekadesasammissāti cittiddhipādādinā attano ekadeseneva khandhantarādīhi sammissā iddhipādādayo,
tika-abh05t:78_10: saṅkhārakkhandhādīnaṃ ekadesavisesabhūtehi satipaṭṭhānasammappadhānasaññākkhandhādīhi vibhattā eva samudayasaccādayo sampayogīvippayogībhāvena,
tika-abh05t:78_15: Na hi saṅkhārakkhandhādipariyāpannattepi samudayasaccādayo maggasaccādīhi sampayogaṃ labhanti.
tika-abh05t:78_18: visabhāgatā cāti ekuppādāditāsaṅkhātā yathārahaṃ sabhāgatā visabhāgatā ca.
tika-abh05t:78_19: Tena yathāvuttakāraṇena sampayogassa vippayogassa ca labhanato.
tika-abh05t:79_1: Vattamānā ca ekasmiṃ santāne ekekadhammā vattanti.
tika-abh05t:79_6: Yadi samānakālassa vibhajitabbassa abhāvato cakkhuviññāṇadhātādayo viññāṇakkhandhassa vibhāgaṃ na karonti,
tika-abh05t:79_8: manoviññāṇadhātu soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā”ti vuttanti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “khandhāyatana…pe…
tika-abh05t:79_10: Evamevanti yathā dhātuvibhāgena vibhattassa viññāṇassa, evamevaṃ.
tika-abh05t:80_2: Yathā hi samānakālasantānehi ekacittuppādagatehi vedanāsaññāviññāṇakkhandhehi samudayasaccassa sampayuttatā,
tika-abh05t:80_3: evaṃ bhinnasantānehi bhinnakālehi ca tehi tassa vippayuttatāti āha “evaṃ taṃvippayogībhāvaṃ…pe…
tika-abh05t:80_5: Visabhāgatānibandhassa vibhāgassa abhāvena avibhāgehi tehi tīhi khandhehi.
tika-abh05t:80_7: Vibhāgarahitehīti samānakālasantānehi ekacittuppādagatattā avibhattehi vedanākkhandhādīhi na yuttaṃ vippayuttanti vattuṃ.
tika-abh05t:80_11: Na hi vijjamānaṃ rūpārūpaṃ aññamaññassa visabhāgaṃ na hoti.
tika-abh05t:80_14: evaṃ yaṃ āmaṭṭhakālabhedaṃ na hotīti attho.
tika-abh05t:80_17: sampayogārahasseva ca vippayogoti atthibhāvasannissayā sampayuttavippayuttatāti āha “paccuppannabhāvaṃ nissāyā”ti.
tika-abh05t:81_3: sampayogo natthīti etena pārisesato vijjamānassa ca vijjamānena sampayogo dassito.
tika-abh05t:81_4: Avijjamānatādīpake bhede gahiteti yathāgahitesu dhammesu tehi vippayogīnaṃ avijjamānabhāvadīpake tesaṃyeva
tika-abh05t:81_5: visese “arūpabhavo ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayutto”tiādinā gahite teneva ruppanādinā
tika-abh05t:81_6: bhedena tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ visabhāgatāpi gahitā evāti vippayogo hotīti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:81_7: Bhede pana aggahite tena tena gahaṇenāti yathāvutte avijjamānatādīpake visese,
tika-abh05t:81_9: saṅkhārakkhandho tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayutto”tiādinā tena tena gahaṇena sabhāgatādīpanena
tika-abh05t:81_11: Tathā ca sati sabhāgatte kā panettha sabhāgatāti āha “vijjamānatāya…pe… hotī”ti.
tika-abh05t:82_1: Vitakko viyāti savitakkasavicāresu cittuppādesu vitakko viya.
tika-abh05t:82_2: So hi vitakkarahitattā avitakko vicāramatto ca.
tika-abh05t:82_6: Tenevāti savitakkasavicāresu cittuppādesu vitakkassa avitakkavicāramattaggahaṇena idha aggahitattā,
tika-abh05t:82_14: Yadi hi te savitakkasavicārehi samānagatikā siyuṃ,
tika-abh05t:82_21: Yathā hi ye samudayasaccena sampayuttehi vippayuttā,
tika-abh05t:82_22: tesaṃ kehici vippayogaṃ vattuṃ na sakkā,
tika-abh05t:82_26: vuttoti ettha dasamanaye tehi avitakkavicāramattehi vippayuttehi vippayuttānaṃ soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayogo vutto,
tika-abh05t:82_27: osānanaye tehi vippayuttānaṃ aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgaho ca vuttoti tasmā na te savitakkasavicārehi samānagatikāti dasseti.
tika-abh05t:83_3: Sabbepi teti dutiyajjhānadhammā vitakko cāti sabbepi te dhammā sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh05t:83_4: Tathā hi sampayogavippayogapadaniddese “avitakkavicāramattā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:83_8: so ca vicārato aññenapi sampayuttoti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “na hi tadekadesassa…pe… hotī”ti.
tika-abh05t:83_11: yathā iddhipādasamudāyassa ekadesabhūtānaṃ chandiddhipādādīnaṃ tīhi khandhehi sampayogo vutto,
tika-abh05t:83_13: evaṃ idhāpi vitakkassa aññehi sampayogo avitakkavicāramattassa samudāyassa na hotīti.
tika-abh05t:84_0: Yadi evaṃ “iddhipādo dvīhi khandhehi sampayutto”tiādi na vattabbanti ce?
tika-abh05t:84_4: Tehi vedanākkhandhādīhi sampayuttatā vuttā “iddhipādo dvīhi khandhehi sampayutto”tiādinā.
tika-abh05t:84_6: Na hītiādinā yathādhigatadhammānaṃ sampayuttatāya navattabbābhāvaṃ udāharaṇadassanavasena vibhāveti.
tika-abh05t:84_7: Keci vicikicchā taṃsahagatā ca mohavajjā mohena sampayuttā,
tika-abh05t:84_10: Iti iminā kāraṇena na samudāyo tena mohena sampayutto.
tika-abh05t:84_11: Añño koci dhammo hetubhāvo nāpi atthi,
tika-abh05t:84_12: yena hetunā so dassanenapahātabbahetukoti vutto samudāyo.
tika-abh05t:84_15: Evanti yathā dassanenapahātabbahetukasamudāyassa sampayuttatā na vattabbā,
tika-abh05t:84_18: Tasmāti yasmā avitakkavicāramattesu kocipi vicārena asampayutto natthi, tasmā.
tika-abh05t:87_2: sampayuttehi ca vippayutte rūpanibbānādike tadaññadhamme satipi vippayogābhāvato.
tika-abh05t:87_3: Saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vitthārena dassetuṃ “na hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:87_4: Tato lobhasahagatacittuppādato aññadhammānaṃ avasiṭṭhānaṃ kusalākusalābyākatadhammānaṃ khandhādīsu kenaci
tika-abh05t:87_5: vippayogo na hi atthi khandhapañcakādīnaṃ saṅgaṇhanato tesaṃ.
tika-abh05t:87_6: Te eva cittuppādāti te lobhasahagatacittuppādā eva.
tika-abh05t:87_9: Tathāti iminā na ca te eva dhammā aḍḍhadutiyāyatanadhātuyo,
tika-abh05t:87_10: atha kho te ca tato aññe cāti imamatthaṃ upasaṃharati.
tika-abh05t:88_0: Nanu tadaññabhāvato eva tehi itaresaṃ vippayogo siddhoti āha “na cā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:88_1: Tadaññasamudāyehīti tato lobhasahagatacittuppādato aññasamudāyehi aññe lobhasahagatā dhammā vippayuttā na honti. Kasmā?
tika-abh05t:88_6: tathā ye ekadesā hutvā aññesaṃ avayavānaṃ samudāyabhūtā,
tika-abh05t:88_8: Anena samudāyena avayavassa samudāyassa avayavena ca tassa na vippayogo,
tika-abh05t:88_10: Esa nayoti yvāyaṃ samudayasacce vutto vidhi,
tika-abh05t:88_14: “So hi samudāyo”tiādiko vuttanayo labbhatīti āha “aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ na dissatī”ti.
tika-abh05t:89_2: yato samudayasaccādi idha na gahitanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:89_3: Sampayuttādhikārato “aññenā”ti padaṃ sampayuttato aññaṃ vadatīti āha “asampayuttena asammissanti attho”ti.
tika-abh05t:89_7: Cittanti “cittehi dhammehi ye dhammā”ti pañhaṃ upalakkheti.
tika-abh05t:89_8: Sahayuttapadehi sattāti “cetasikehi dhammehi ye dhammā”tiādinā cittena sahayutte dhamme dīpentehi padehi āgatā satta pañhā.
tika-abh05t:90_1: Uddhaṭapadena pakāsiyamānā atthā abhedopacārena “uddhaṭapada”nti vuttāti āha “uddhaṭapadena sampayuttehī”ti.
tika-abh05t:90_3: Manena yuttāti ettha mananamattattā manodhātu “mano”ti vuttāti āha “manodhātuyā ekantasampayuttā”ti.
tika-abh05t:93_1: Rūpakkhandhena vippayuttā nāma cattāro arūpino khandhā,
tika-abh05t:93_2: tesaṃ aññehi sampayogo nāma natthi tādisassa aññassa sampayogino abhāvato.
tika-abh05t:93_3: Samudāyassa ca ekadesena sampayogo natthīti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-abh05t:96_1: “Samāsapadaṃ ida”nti vatvā ayaṃ nāma samāsoti dassento “yassa khandhādino”tiādimāha,
tika-abh05t:96_3: Yaṃ idha sampayuttaṃ vuttanti imasmiṃ navamanaye yaṃ dhammajātaṃ sampayuttanti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:96_5: Tañhi dhammajātaṃ attanā sampayuttena vedanākkhandhādinā sayaṃ sampayuttanti niddhāritaṃ.
tika-abh05t:96_9: tehi rūpakkhandho vippayutto”ti vatvā nibbānaṃ kathanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “nibbānaṃ pana sukhumarūpagatikamevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:96_10: “Manāyatanaṃ ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici vippayutta”nti ettha hi yathā sukhumarūpaṃ viya sarūpato
tika-abh05t:96_11: anuddhaṭampi nibbānaṃ kehicītipadena gahitameva hotīti edisesu ṭhānesu nibbānaṃ sukhumarūpagatikanti
tika-abh05t:96_13: evamidhāpi “rūpamissakehi vā”ti etena anupādinnaanupādāniyādīhi nibbānamissakehipi asampayogo vutto hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh05t:96_14: Avikalacatukkhandhasaṅgāhakehi padehi sahavattino aññassa sampayogino abhāvato atītānāgatehi ca sampayogo
tika-abh05t:96_18: ke pana te rūpena asammissā arūpekadesabhūtā.
tika-abh05t:99_2: tesu keci vippayuttassa dhammantarassa abhāvato keci khandhādīhi vippayogasseva asambhavatoti imamatthaṃ dassento “dhammāyatanādidhammā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:99_3: Tattha sabbacittuppādagatadhammabhāvatoti iminā bhinnakālatādivisesavato arūpakkhandhassa vippayuttassa dhammantarassa abhāvamāha,
tika-abh05t:99_5: Kāmabhavo upapattibhavo saññībhavo pañcavokārabhavoti ime cattāro mahābhavā.
tika-abh05t:99_8: tehi vippayuttānaṃ tesaṃyeva dukkhasaccādīnaṃ khandhādīsu kenaci vippayogo sambhavati.
tika-abh05t:102_3: “Etena saha sambandho”ti iminā padānaṃ sambandhadassanamukhena “samudayasaccena ye dhammā sampayuttā”ti
tika-abh05t:102_4: pāḷiyā atthavivaraṇaṃ pākaṭataraṃ katvā kehicītipadassatthaṃ kātuṃ “kehicīti etassa panā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:102_6: Visesetvāti ettha tesaṃ dhammānaṃ taṇhāvajjānaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhadhammāyatanadhammadhātupariyāpannatākittanaṃ visesanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t:102_7: yato te samudayasaccena khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitāti vuttā.
tika-abh05t:102_8: Sayaṃ attanā sampayutto na hotīti vuttaṃ “attavajjehī”ti.
tika-abh05t:102_9: Tena vuttaṃ “cittaṃ na vattabbaṃ cittena sampayuttantipi,
tika-abh05t:102_11: Sampayogārahehīti visesanaṃ sukhumarūpaṃ nibbānanti dve sandhāya kataṃ,
tika-abh05t:105_2: dvādasamanaye ca sampayogavisiṭṭhā saṅgahitāsaṅgahitāti ubhayatthāpi sampayogavisiṭṭhāva gahitāti āha “dvādasama…pe…
tika-abh05t:108_7: Satipi asaṅgāhakatte tehi asaṅgahitānaṃ sampayogo na sambhavatīti vedanākkhandhādayo idha terasamanaye vissajjanaṃ na ruhanti nārohanti.
tika-abh05t:108_8: Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vedanākkhandhena hi khandhādivasena rūpārūpadhammā asaṅgahitā honti,
tika-abh05t:108_9: tesañca sampayogo nāma natthī”ti asaṅgāhakā eva na honti avikalapañcakkhandhādisamudāyabhāvato.
tika-abh05t:109_4: Na tesaṃ vippayogo natthi tabbinimuttassa cittuppādassa sambhavato.
tika-abh05t:109_5: Vedanākkhandhena asaṅgahitānaṃ anārammaṇamissakattā na “vippayogassa atthitāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:113_4: sā tathābhūtāpi vissajjetabbadhammābhāvassa ñāpikā hotīti āha “tesaṃ pucchāya moghattā te na labbhantī”ti.
tika-abh05t:113_7: Tena ca sahāti tena aṭṭhamanayena saddhiṃ imasmiṃ osānanaye aṭṭhamanaye ca osānanaye ca ete dhammāyatanādayo sabbappakārena na labbhanti.
tika-abh05t:118_1: “Dhātukathaṃ desayitvā anantaraṃ tassa āha puggalapaññatti”nti vutte tattha kāraṇaṃ samudāgamato paṭṭhāya vibhāvento “dhammasaṅgahe”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:118_2: Tattha yadipi dhammasaṅgahe phassādīnaṃ pathavīādīnañca dhammānaṃ nānānayavicitto anupadavibhāgopi kato,
tika-abh05t:118_4: so pana tesaṃ kusalattikādihetudukāditikadukehi saṅgahasandassanatthoti vuttaṃ “dhammasaṅgahe tikadukādivasena saṅgahitānaṃ dhammāna”nti.
tika-abh05t:118_5: Teneva hi taṃ pakaraṇaṃ “dhammasaṅgaho”ti samaññaṃ labhi.
tika-abh05t:118_6: Kāmañca dhammasaṅgahepi “tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā hontī”tiādinā khandhādivibhāgo dassito,
tika-abh05t:118_8: yathā vibhaṅgapakaraṇeti sātisayaṃ taṃ gahetvā āha “vibhaṅge khandhādivibhāgaṃ dassetvā”ti,
tika-abh05t:118_12: Ādhāro hi saṅgahaṇavibhajanappabhedavacanasaṅkhātānaṃ avayavakiriyānaṃ taṃsamudāyabhūtāni pakaraṇāni yathā “rukkhe sākhā”ti.
tika-abh05t:119_0: Ettha ca abhiññeyyadhamme desento desanākusalo bhagavā tikadukavasena tāva nesaṃ saṅgahaṃ dassento dhammasaṅgaṇiṃ
tika-abh05t:119_1: desetvā saṅgahapubbakattā vibhāgassa tadanantaraṃ khandhādivasena vibhāgaṃ dassento vibhaṅgaṃ desesi.
tika-abh05t:119_2: Puna yathāvuttavibhāgasaṅgahayutte dhamme saṅgahāsaṅgahādinayappabhedato dassento dhātukathaṃ desesi tassā abbhantarabāhiramātikāsarīrakattā.
tika-abh05t:119_3: Na hi sakkā khandhādike kusalādike ca vinā saṅgahāsaṅgahādinayaṃ netunti.
tika-abh05t:119_5: Evaṃ saṅgahato vibhāgato pabhedato ca dhammānaṃ desanā yassā paññattiyā vasena hoti,
tika-abh05t:119_8: taṃ sabbaṃ vibhāvetuṃ puggalapaññatti desitāti idametesaṃ catunnaṃ pakaraṇānaṃ desanānukkamakāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:120_6: Yāya paññattiyā sabhāvato upādāya ca paññāpananti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto “tattha ye dhamme”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:120_7: Tattha asabhāvapaññattiyāpi mūlabhūtaṃ upādānaṃ sabhāvadhammo eva,
tika-abh05t:120_8: kevalaṃ pana tesaṃ pavattiākārabhedasannissayato visesoti dassento “ye dhamme…pe…
tika-abh05t:120_10: Tattha pubbāpariyabhāvena pavattamāneti iminā pabandhasannissayataṃ dassento santānapaññattiṃ vadati,
tika-abh05t:120_12: Tisso hi paññattiyo santānapaññatti samūhapaññatti avatthāvisesapaññattīti.
tika-abh05t:120_16: Tesu asabhāvaggahaṇena vinā pabandhasamūhānaṃ asabhāvatte siddhe asabhāvasamūhavasenāti asabhāvaggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh05t:121_5: Tattha samūhasabhāvoti sabhāvasantānaṃ avatthāvisesavidhuraṃ samūhavasena lakkhaṇamevāha.
tika-abh05t:121_10: saddena sabhāvadhammesu sāmaññavasena pavattaṃ kusalādipaññattiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh05t:121_11: Rūpādidhammānaṃ samūho santānena pavattamāno avatthāvisesasahito ekattaggahaṇanibandhano sattoti voharīyatīti
tika-abh05t:121_12: so sabhāvadhammo nāma pana na hotīti āha “puggalapaññatti pana asabhāvapaññattī”ti.
tika-abh05t:121_14: Yasmā pana dhammānaṃ pabandho samūho ca dhammasannissitoti vattabbataṃ arahati,
tika-abh05t:122_3: Yadi sabbā paññattiyo idha dassitā honti,
tika-abh05t:122_9: Evañca katvā khandhādīhi saddhiṃ puggalo gahito.
tika-abh05t:123_7: Bodhanañhi bodhaneyyasantāne bodhetabbassa atthassa ṭhapananti katvā “nikkhipanā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:123_8: “Paññāpanā”tiādinā bhāvasādhanena vatvā sādhanantarāmasanena atthantaraparikappāsaṅkā siyāti taṃ nivāretuṃ “yo panāyaṃ…pe…
tika-abh05t:123_13: Taṃnimittatanti tassa dassanassa ṭhapanassa ca nimittakāraṇataṃ.
tika-abh05t:124_1: Vijjamānassa satoti vijjamānassa samānassāti imamatthaṃ dassento “vijjamānabhūtassāti attho”ti āha.
tika-abh05t:124_4: saddena byatirekavasena dīpitaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “yathā kusalādīnī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:124_8: Aññenākārenāti tato rūpavedanādito aññena tabbinimuttena paññāpetabbapaññāpanākārena vijjamānassa.
tika-abh05t:124_10: Lokaniruttimattasiddhassāti ettha mattaggahaṇaṃ tassa paññattivatthussa na kevalaṃ vijjamānasabhāvatānivattanatthameva,
tika-abh05t:124_11: atha kho viparītaggāhanivattanatthampīti dassento “anabhinivesena cittenā”ti āha.
tika-abh05t:124_16: Uddese niddese ca sattavantaṃ padhānabhāvena āgamanaṃ sandhāyāha “sarūpato tissannaṃ āgatata”nti.
tika-abh05t:124_17: Guṇabhāvena pana uddhaṃsotapaññāvimuttapāsāṇalekhādiggahaṇesu itarāpi tisso paññattiyo imasmiṃ pakaraṇe āgatā eva.
tika-abh05t:125_6: Tattha avijjamānattā paññāpetabbamattatthena paññattīti etena “avijjamānā paññatti avijjamānapaññattī”ti imaṃ samāsavikappamāha.
tika-abh05t:125_7: Avijjamānapaññattīti ettha hi dve samāsā avijjamānassa,
tika-abh05t:125_12: Tajjaparamatthanāmalābhatoti tajjassa tadanurūpassa paramatthassa anvatthassa nāmassa labhanato,
tika-abh05t:125_13: anubhavanādisabhāvānaṃ dhammānaṃ paramatthikassa vedanādināmassa labhanattāti attho.
tika-abh05t:125_16: Parato labhitabbanti paraṃ upādāya laddhabbaṃ yathā rūpādike upādāya sattoti nissabhāvasamūhasantānādi paññattivatthu.
tika-abh05t:126_0: Sasūkasālirāsiādiākārena saṃkucitaggo vāsavavāsudevādīnaṃ viya moliviseso kirīṭaṃ,
tika-abh05t:126_1: so pana makuṭavisesopi hotiyevāti āha “kirīṭaṃ makuṭa”nti.
tika-abh05t:126_2: Sabbasamorodhoti sabbāsaṃ vijjamānapaññattiādīnaṃ channaṃ paññattīnaṃ antokaraṇaṃ.
tika-abh05t:126_7: dve tīṇītiādikaṃ upanikkhittapaññattiyā ekadesaṃ upalakkhaṇavasena dassento tassa ca saṅkhyeyyappadhānatāyāha “saṅkhātabbappadhānattā”ti.
tika-abh05t:126_8: Pūraṇattho hi saddo tadatthadīpanamukhena pūretabbamatthaṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh05t:126_9: So ca saṅkhāvisayo padhānovāti dutiyādīnaṃ paññattīnaṃ saṅkhātabbappadhānatā vuttā.
tika-abh05t:126_14: koci saha visuñca tadubhayaṃ missoti chapi paññattiyo bhajatīti.
tika-abh05t:127_5: Tatheva “suvaṇṇavaṇṇo brahmassaro”tiādikā vijjamānagabbhā vijjamānenaavijjamānapaññattiṃ bhajantīti āha “yathāyogaṃ taṃ taṃ paññatti”nti.
tika-abh05t:127_9: Tattha tañca saṅkhānanti yaṃ “paṭhamaṃ eka”ntiādikaṃ saṅkhānaṃ,
tika-abh05t:128_4: taṃsamaṅgitāya tabbisiṭṭhe puggale bhāṇakoti paññattīti āha “vijjamānenaavijjamānapaññattipakkhaṃ bhajatī”ti.
tika-abh05t:128_5: Yebhuyyena rūpāyatanaggahaṇamukhena rūpasaṅkhātena saṇṭhānaṃ gayhatīti tassa tena abhedopacāraṃ katvā vuttaṃ “rūpāyatanasaṅkhātena saṇṭhānenā”ti.
tika-abh05t:128_6: Yaṃ abhedopacāraṃ bhindituṃ ajānantā nikāyantariyā rūpāyatanaṃ saṇṭhānasabhāvaṃ paṭijānanti.
tika-abh05t:128_10: thūlo daṇḍo”tiādinā puggalādīnaṃ paññāpanā tathātathāsanniviṭṭhe rūpasaṅkhāte kisādisaṇṭhānapaññatti,
tika-abh05t:128_11: na rūpāyatanamatteti āha “saṇṭhānanti vā rūpāyatane aggahite”ti.
tika-abh05t:128_13: Kiccapaññattiādivibhāgena pavatto ayampi ācariyavādo “kiccapaññatti ekaccā bhūmipaññatti paccattapaññatti asaṅkhatapaññatti ca vijjamānapaññatti,
tika-abh05t:128_16: ekaccā bhūmisaṇṭhānapaññatti vijjamānena vā avijjamānena vā avijjamānapaññattī”ti dassitattā “dhammakathā
tika-abh05t:128_19: Upādāpaññattiādibhāvo cettha kiccapaññattiādīnaṃ kiccapaññattiādibhāvo ca tāsaṃ yathārahaṃ vibhāvetabbo.
tika-abh05t:129_1: Saṅkhepappabhedavasenāti “yāvatā pañcakkhandhā”ti sabbepi khandhe khandhabhāvasāmaññena saṃkhipanavasena,
tika-abh05t:129_2: “yāvatā rūpakkhandho”tiādinā khandhānaṃ tato sāmaññato pakārehi bhindanavasena ca.
tika-abh05t:129_4: Sāmaññato vā hi dhammānaṃ paññāpanaṃ hoti visesato vā.
tika-abh05t:129_6: visesāpekkhāya pana sopi sāmaññaṃ sampajjatīti “kittāvatā khandhānaṃ khandhapaññattī”ti pucchāya saṅkhepato
tika-abh05t:129_7: vissajjanavasena “yāvatā pañcakkhandhā”ti vuttanti tatthāpi “khandhānaṃ khandhapaññattī”ti ānetvā yojetabbanti
tika-abh05t:129_14: ettāvatā khandhānaṃ khandhapaññattī”ti evamettha pāḷiyojanā kātabbā.
tika-abh05t:129_15: Evañhi saṅkhepato pabhedato ca khandhapaññatti vissajjitā hoti.
tika-abh05t:129_16: Tathā hi imasseva atthassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttabhāvaṃ dassento “yattakena…pe…
tika-abh05t:129_23: Taṃ pana bhūmimukhena dassetuṃ “rūpakkhandho kāmāvacaro”tiādi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:130_0: Evaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanayena pāḷiyā atthayojanaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ pakārantarena dassetuṃ “ayaṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:130_5: khandhapaññattiyā pabhedoti iminā saṅkhepato vitthārato ca khandhānaṃ pabhedaṃ pati paññattivibhāgoti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh05t:130_9: Tattha hi sātisayaṃ khandhānaṃ vibhāgapaññatti vuttā.
tika-abh05t:130_13: dutiye vatthumukhena paññattiyā vibhāgā dassitāti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh05t:131_0: Esa nayoti iminā khandhapaññattiyā vuttamatthaṃ āyatanapaññattiyādīsu atidisati.
tika-abh05t:131_4: “āyatanānaṃ āyatanapaññattī”ti imassa attho “yattakena paññāpanena saṅkhepato dvādasāyatanānī”ti etena dassito,
tika-abh05t:131_8: Etena avuttopi sabbo saṅgahito hotīti “tatrāpi dasāyatanā kāmāvacarā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:131_13: tattako āyatanānaṃ āyatanapaññattiyā pabhedo”ti pakaraṇantare vuttena vatthupabhedena āyatanapaññattiyā
tika-abh05t:132_3: ettāvatā indriyānaṃ indriyapaññattī”ti ayaṃ pāḷipadeso niddesopi samāno pakaraṇantare vatthubhedena vuttaṃ
tika-abh05t:132_4: khandhādipaññattippabhedaṃ upādāya uddesoyeva hotīti āha “uddesamattenevāti attho”ti.
tika-abh05t:136_2: tato suṭṭhu vimuccanaṭṭhena vimokkhoti nippariyāyena jhānaṅgāneva vimokkhoti aṭṭhakathāadhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:136_3: Ṭīkākārena pana “abhibhāyatanaṃ viya sasampayuttaṃ jhānaṃ vimokkho”ti maññamānena “adhippāyenāhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:136_4: Jhānadhammā hi sampayuttadhammehi saddhiṃyeva paṭipakkhato vimuccanti, na vinā,
tika-abh05t:136_6: Yathā vā jhānaṅgānaṃ jhānapaccayena paccayabhāvato saviseso jhānapariyāyo,
tika-abh05t:136_12: paṭiladdhā nāma hontī”ti tehi sādhetabbasahajātādipaccayalābhoyevettha paṭilābho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh05t:136_20: Phusati phalaṃ adhigacchati etāyāti kāraṇabhāvassa phusanāpariyāyo veditabbo.
tika-abh05t:137_1: Tāni aṅgānīti iminā jhānakoṭṭhāsabhāvena vuttadhammāyeva gahitā,
tika-abh05t:137_4: Evaṃ satīti sukhasaṅkhātajhānaṅgato vedanāsomanassindriyānaṃ sesitabbabhāve sati.
tika-abh05t:137_5: Evañhi nesaṃ phassakatā itarassa phassitabbatāva siyā.
tika-abh05t:137_10: Abhinnasabhāvopi hi dhammo purimavisiṭṭhapaccayavisesasambhavena visesena bhinnākāro hutvā visiṭṭhaphalabhāvaṃ āpajjati.
tika-abh05t:137_19: Yadi “sukhaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti yojanāyaṃ sesā tayo khandhā honti,
tika-abh05t:137_21: cattāro ca khandhā hontīti vattabbaṃ siyāti? Na,
tika-abh05t:138_2: So hi lokiyavimokkho viya adhigamavaḷañjanatthaṃ pakappetabbasamayavisesābhāvato evaṃ vutto.
tika-abh05t:138_5: Ekaccehi āsavehi vimuttoti diṭṭhāsavādīhi samucchedavimuttiyā vimutto.
tika-abh05t:138_10: So eva ekaccasamayavimokkhalābhī yathāvutto samayavimutto asamayavimokkhavisesassa vasena samayavimokkhapaññattiyā adhippetattā.
tika-abh05t:138_16: tasmā samayavimuttapaññattiṃ laddhuṃ arahatīti pariññātatthaṃ hetunā patiṭṭhāpeti.
tika-abh05t:138_17: Byatirekamukhenapi tamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “puthujjano panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:139_0: Yadi punarāvattakadhammatāya puthujjano samayavimuttoti na vutto,
tika-abh05t:139_1: tadabhāvato kasmā arahā tathā na vuttoti āha “arahato panā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:139_6: vattu adhippāyavasena gahetabbarūpā cāti āha “bāhirānanti lokuttarato bahibhūtāna”nti.
tika-abh05t:140_1: Rūpato aññaṃ na rūpanti tattha rūpapaṭibhāgaṃ kasiṇarūpādi rūpa-
tika-abh05t:140_2: saddena gahitanti tadaññaṃ paṭhamatatiyāruppavisayamattaṃ arūpakkhandhanibbānavinimuttaṃ arūpa-
tika-abh05t:140_5: Samādhinti vā samādhisīsena jhānameva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:141_1: Attano anurūpena pamādenāti ettha anāgāmino adhikusalesu dhammesu asakkaccaasātaccakiriyādinā.
tika-abh05t:142_5: Sati vacananānatte attheva vacanatthanānattanti āha “vacanatthanānattamattena vā”ti.
tika-abh05t:142_6: Vacanatthaggahaṇamukhena gahetabbassa pana vibhāvanatthassa natthettha nānattaṃ,
tika-abh05t:143_1: Samāpatticetanāti yāya cetanāya samāpattiṃ nibbatteti samāpajjati ca.
tika-abh05t:143_5: Tathā hi sā “kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samannesatī”ti vuttā.
tika-abh05t:144_1: Aggamaggaṭṭhopi itaramaggaṭṭhā viya anupacchinnabhayattā bhayūparatavohāraṃ labhatīti āha “arahattamaggaṭṭho ca…pe…
tika-abh05t:147_6: taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ paññattimattassa sīsabhāvānupapattito taduddhañca saṅkhārappavattisabbhāvato.
tika-abh05t:148_3: Tesu hi gahitesu itarampi pariyādiyitabbaṃ kilesabhāvena pariyādiyitabbatāsāmaññena ca gahitameva hotīti
tika-abh05t:148_5: Vaṭṭupacchedakena maggeneva hi jīvitindriyampi anavasesato nirujjhatīti.
tika-abh05t:148_6: Kasmā panettha pavattasīsaṃ visuṃ gahitanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “pavattasīsampī”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:148_7: Odhiso ca anodhiso ca kilesapariyādāne sati sijjhamānā paccavekkhaṇavārā tena nipphādetabbāti vuttā.
tika-abh05t:148_10: Cuticittena hotīti idaṃ yathāvuttassa kilesapariyādānasamāpanabhūtassa paccavekkhaṇavārassa cuticittena paricchinnattā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:148_11: tasmā cuticittena paricchedakena paricchinnaṃ hotīti attho.
tika-abh05t:149_0: 17. Tiṭṭheyyāti na upagaccheyya. Ṭhānañhi gatinivatti. Tena vuttaṃ “nappavatteyyā”ti.
tika-abh05t:151_3: tassa paṭhamaṃ adhigatavijjādvayassa viya atevijjatābhāvā yadipi nippariyāyatā tevijjatā,
tika-abh05t:151_4: paṭhamaṃ adhigatavijjādvayassa pana sā savisesāti dassento “yāya katakiccatā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:153_2: Vuttalakkhaṇūpapattikoti dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttoti evaṃ vuttalakkhaṇena upapattito yuttito samannāgato.
tika-abh05t:153_3: Eseva nayoti yathā catunnaṃ arūpasamāpattīnaṃ ekekato nirodhato ca vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ pattānaṃ vasena pañca ubhatobhāgavimuttā vuttā,
tika-abh05t:153_4: tathā sekkhabhāvaṃ pattānaṃ vasena pañca kāyasakkhino hontīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:154_1: saddo hetuatthoti dasseti yathā “sīhaṃ disvā bhayaṃ hotī”tiādīsu.
tika-abh05t:154_5: Samānakālattepi hi kāraṇakiriyā phalakiriyāya purimasiddhā viya voharīyati.
tika-abh05t:155_2: Kilesehi vimuttoti idaṃ paṭhamatatiyavādānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:155_4: Arūpajjhānaṃ yadipi rūpasaññādīhi vimuttaṃ taṃsamatikkamādinā pattabbattā,
tika-abh05t:155_5: pavattinivārakehi pana kāmacchandādīhiyevassa vimutti sātisayāti dassento “nīvaraṇasaṅkhātanāmakāyato vimutta”nti āha.
tika-abh05t:155_6: Yañcāpi arūpajjhānaṃ rūpaloke vivekaṭṭhatāvasenapi rūpakāyato vimuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:155_7: taṃ pana rūpapaṭibandhachandarāgavikkhambhaneneva hotīti vikkhambhanameva padhānanti vuttaṃ “rūpataṇhāvikkhambhanena rūpakāyato ca vimuttattā”ti.
tika-abh05t:155_8: Ekadesena ubhatobhāgavimuttaṃ nāma hoti samucchedavimuttiyā abhāvā.
tika-abh05t:156_1: “Sattisayo”ti viya samudāye pavatto vohāro avayavepi dissatīti dassento āha “aṭṭhavimokkhekadesena…pe…
tika-abh05t:157_9: Ālocito pakāsito viya hoti vibandhavikkhambhanena ālocane pakāsane samatthassa ñāṇacakkhuno adhiṭṭhānasamuppādanato.
tika-abh05t:157_10: Na tu vimuttoti vimuttoti na vuccateva.
tika-abh05t:158_6: paññāvimutto viya vā sabbathā avimuttassa sāvasesavimuttiyampi diṭṭhippattassa viya paññāya sātisayāya abhāvato saddhāmattena vimuttabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh05t:158_7: Saddhāya adhimuttoti idaṃ āgamanavasena saddhāya adhikabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:159_1: “Sototi ariyamaggassa nāma”nti nippariyāyena taṃsamaṅgī sotāpannoti adhippāyena codako “api-
tika-abh05t:159_2: saddo kasmā vutto”ti codanaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā “nanū”tiādinā attano adhippāyaṃ vivarati.
tika-abh05t:159_8: Sotaṃ vā ariyamaggaṃ ādito panno adhigatoti sotāpannoti vuccamāne dutiyamaggaṭṭhādīnaṃ nattheva sotāpannabhāvāpatti.
tika-abh05t:159_9: Sutte pana sotaṃ ariyamaggaṃ ādito mariyādaṃ amuñcitvāva panno paṭipajjatīti katvā maggasamaṅgī “sotāpanno”ti vutto.
tika-abh05t:159_10: Pariyāyena itaropi tassa aparihānadhammattā sotāpannoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:159_11: Pahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇāya samudayasaccaṃ viya dukkhasaccampi paccavekkhitaṃ hoti saccadvayapariyāpannattā
tika-abh05t:161_1: Sajjhānako aparihīnajjhāno kālakato brahmalokūpago hutvā vaṭṭajjhāsayo ce,
tika-abh05t:162_3: appatvāti vuttaṃ hotīti “appattaṃ hutvā”ti iminā vuccati.
tika-abh05t:163_2: Nanu ca vemajjhātikkamo “atikkamitvā vemajjha”nti iminā pakāsito hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:164_4: Uddhaṃsotassa uparibhavūpagatā ekaṃsikāti āha “yattha vā tattha vā gantvā”ti.
tika-abh05t:164_10: saddena “ākāsaṃ laṅghitvā nibbāyatī”tiādinā vuttā tisso upamā saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh05t:164_12: uddhaṃsotato anadhimattatā ca asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraparinibbāyīnaṃ na veditabbāti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:164_14: Yadi evaṃ asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraparinibbāyīnaṃ upamāvacanena tato mahantatarehi kasmā vuttanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tato mahanta…pe…
tika-abh05t:165_3: Imassa dukkhassāti imassa sampati vattamānassa viññāṇādidukkhassa.
tika-abh05t:165_13: Upekkhako hotīti cattabhariyo viya puriso bhayaṃ nandiñca pahāya udāsino hoti.
tika-abh05t:170_3: Puññaphalaṃ upajīvanto kataññupakkhe tiṭṭhatīti vuttaṃ “puññaphalaṃ anupajīvanto”ti.
tika-abh05t:171_0: 90. Guṇapāripūriyā paripuṇṇo yāvadattho idha tittoti āha “niṭṭhitakiccatāya nirussukko”ti.
tika-abh05t:174_2: So pana dvāravasena vuccamāno manodvāriko hotīti āha “manosaṃvarabhedenā”ti.
tika-abh05t:174_3: Idāni taṃ pakārabhedena dassento “satisaṃvarādibhedena vā”ti āha,
tika-abh05t:174_5: Yaṃ kiñci sabhāvabhūtaṃ caritampi “sīla”nti vuccatīti akusalassapi sīlapariyāyo vutto.
tika-abh05t:175_0: 94. Samānavisayānanti paṭhamaphalādiko samāno evarūpo visayo etesanti samānavisayā, tesaṃ.
tika-abh05t:178_1: Sīlassa anuggaṇhanaṃ aparisuddhiyaṃ sodhanaṃ apāripūriyaṃ pūraṇañcāti āha “sodhetabbe ca vaḍḍhetabbe cā”ti.
tika-abh05t:178_2: Adhisīlaṃ nissāyāti adhisīlaṃ nissayaṃ katvā uppannapaññāya.
tika-abh05t:179_4: Ayañca attho gūtharāsiyeva gūthakūpoti imasmiṃ pakkhe navattabbo siyā.
tika-abh05t:180_1: Sarabhaṅgasatthārādayo rūpabhavādikāmādipariññaṃ katvā paññapento lokiyaṃ pariññaṃ sammadeva paññapentīti āha “yebhuyyena na sakkontī”ti.
tika-abh05t:180_2: Asamatthabhāvaṃ vā sandhāya no ca paññāpetuṃ sakkontīti vuttanti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:183_4: attanā ca āṇattena kataṃ tañca tassa āṇāpakassa yaṃ vacīpayogena katanti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:184_0: 148. Desanāya karaṇabhūtāya. Dhammānanti desanāya yathābodhetabbānaṃ sīlādidhammānaṃ.
tika-abh05t:186_1: Sahitāsahitassāti kusalasaddayogena sāmivacanaṃ bhummattheti dassento āha “sahitāsahiteti attho”ti.
tika-abh05t:186_4: Parisasampattipi ñāṇasampannassa dhammakathikassa paṭibhānasampadāya kāraṇaṃ hotīti āha “sāvakasampattiyā bodhetuṃ samatthatāyā”ti.
tika-abh05t:188_4: tampi bhaṇati kālenā”ti yaṃ idaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:188_5: tatra tasmiṃ vacane vākye yo puggalo “kālena bhaṇatī”ti vutto,
tika-abh05t:188_6: so kīdisoti vicāraṇāya tassa dassanatthaṃ “kālaññū hotī”tiādi pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti dassento saṅgahe āhāti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:190_0: 173. Tesanti pahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesānaṃ. Vimuttidassanameva hoti vimuttiatthattā taṃdassanassa.
tika-abh05t:195_0: 187. Khandhadhammesūti saṅkhatadhammesu. Tadalābhenāti maggaphalālābhena. Atthenāti sīlādiatthena.
tika-abh05t:198_1: Yathā tesu paṭipajjitabbanti tesu pañcasu puggalesu yathārahaṃ upameyyopamādassanamukhena hitūpadesapaṭipattiyā yathā aññehi paṭipajjitabbanti attho.
tika-abh05t:198_4: na “ārambhakattussa kasāvapucchā”tiādīsu viya dhammavācīti āha “ārambhakiriyāvācako saddo”ti.
tika-abh05t:203_1: Idaṃ saccābhisambodhādikaṃ saṅgahitaṃ hoti phalassa hetunā avinābhāvato.
tika-abh05t:203_3: Anācariyakena attanā uppāditenāti idaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇe vijjamānaguṇakathanaṃ,
tika-abh05t:203_8: parato uppatti upadesena vināpi sannissāya nibbattīti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh05t:206_2: na visayeti dassento “kusalesu dhammesu antogadhā”ti āha.
tika-abh05t:206_3: Idāni visayalakkhaṇaṃ etaṃ bhummanti dassento “bodhipakkhiyadhammesu vā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:206_4: “Tadupakāratāyā”ti idaṃ kusalesu dhammesu sādhetabbesūti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:206_11: Paccekaṃ ṭhānavipassanāpataraṇapatigādhappattiniṭṭhattā tesaṃ puggalānaṃ “aneke puggalā”ti vuttaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-abh05t:209_4: Tena “ajjhattasaṃyojanānaṃ samucchinnattā”ti idaṃ visesaṃ dīpetīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:214_0: Samudāye ekadesā antogadhāti samudāyo tesaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvena vutto yathā “rukkhe sākhā”ti dasseti “kathāsamudāyassā”tiādinā.
tika-abh05t:214_1: Tattha kathānanti tisso kathā vādo jappo vitaṇḍāti.
tika-abh05t:214_2: Tesu yena pamāṇatakkehi pakkhapaṭipakkhānaṃ patiṭṭhāpanapaṭikkhepā honti, so vādo.
tika-abh05t:214_3: Ekādhikaraṇā hi aññamaññaviruddhā dhammā pakkhapaṭipakkhā yathā “hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā,
tika-abh05t:214_5: Nānādhikaraṇā pana aññamaññaviruddhāpi pakkhapaṭipakkhā nāma na honti yathā “aniccaṃ rūpaṃ,
tika-abh05t:214_7: Yena chalajātiniggahaṭṭhānehi pakkhapaṭipakkhānaṃ patiṭṭhāpanaṃ paṭikkhepārambho, so jappo.
tika-abh05t:214_12: Tattha atthavikappupapattiyā vacanavighāto chalaṃ yathā “navakambaloyaṃ puriso,
tika-abh05t:214_17: Evaṃ vādajappavitaṇḍappabhedāsu tīsu kathāsu idha vādakathā “kathā”ti adhippetā.
tika-abh05t:214_22: Desanā hi desetabbamatthaṃ vineyyasantānesu ṭhapanato nikkhipanato ṭhapanaṃ,
tika-abh05t:217_1: Abhinnasabhāvampi hi atthaṃ tadaññadhammato visesāvabodhanatthaṃ aññaṃ viya katvā voharanti yathā “attano sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhammā”ti.
tika-abh05t:217_3: Karaṇabhāvena vuttā yathāvuttassa upasamassa sādhakatamabhāvaṃ sandhāya.
tika-abh05t:217_5: dubbalatā vuttā tathārūpāya paññāya bhāve tādisānaṃ pakkhabhāvābhāvato.
tika-abh05t:218_1: bhedaṃ vā katvā yathā sā ṭhitā,
tika-abh05t:218_3: Saṅgahitato vā aññatrāti mūlasaṅgītiyā saṅgahitato aññatra.
tika-abh05t:218_7: Tīhi ṭhānehīti “sūrā satimanto idha brahmacariyavāso”ti evaṃ vuttehi tīhi kāraṇehi.
tika-abh05t:218_8: Aññaṃ sandhāya bhaṇitanti ekaṃ pabbajjāsaṅkhātaṃ brahmacariyavāsaṃ sandhāya bhaṇitaṃ.
tika-abh05t:218_9: Aññaṃ atthaṃ ṭhapayiṃsūti sabbassapi brahmacariyavāsassa vasena “natthi devesu brahmacariyavāso”tiādikaṃ aññaṃ atthaṃ ṭhapayiṃsu.
tika-abh05t:218_10: Suttañca aññaṃ sandhāya bhaṇitaṃ tato aññaṃ sandhāya bhaṇitaṃ katvā ṭhapayiṃsu,
tika-abh05t:218_11: tassa atthañca aññaṃ ṭhapayiṃsūti evamettha yojanā veditabbā.
tika-abh05t:219_1: Ekacce sakalaṃ abhidhammaṃ vissajjiṃsu chaḍḍayiṃsu seyyathāpi suttantikā.
tika-abh05t:219_2: Te hi taṃ na jinavacananti vadanti.
tika-abh05t:219_3: Kathāvatthussa savivādattetiādi heṭṭhā nidānaṭṭhakathāya āgatanayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:219_5: “Tatiyasaṅgītito pubbe pavattamānānaṃ vasenā”ti idaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:219_6: nanu tatiyasaṅgītito pubbepi taṃ mātikārūpena pavattateva?
tika-abh05t:219_7: Niddesaṃ vā sandhāya tathā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:219_9: pavattantānipi tāni aññathā katvā paṭhiṃsūti attho.
tika-abh05t:219_11: Na hi taṃ nāmaṃ piṭakattayaṃ anuvattantehi bhikkhūhi gayhati?
tika-abh05t:219_12: Itarehi gayhamānampi vā sāsanikapariññehi na sāsanāvacaraṃ gayhatīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:220_0: Saṅkantikānaṃ bhedo suttavādīti saṅkantikānaṃ anantare eko nikāyabhedo suttavādī nāma bhijjittha.
tika-abh05t:221_0: Uppanne vāde sandhāyāti tatiyasaṅgītikāle uppanne vāde sandhāya.
tika-abh05t:221_1: Uppajjanaketi tato paṭṭhāya yāva saddhammantaradhānā etthantare uppajjanake.
tika-abh05t:221_3: Suttekadesopi hi “sutta”nti vuccati samudāyavohārassa avayavesupi dissanato yathā “paṭo daḍḍho,
tika-abh05t:221_5: Te panettha suttapadesā “atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”tiādinā āgatā veditabbā.
tika-abh05t:227_3: idha pana māyāya āhitavisesā abhūtaññeyyākārā adhippetāti dassento “māyāya amaṇiādayo maṇiādiākārena dissamānā māyāti vuttā”ti āha.
tika-abh05t:227_5: so eva attho aviparītassa ñāṇassa visayabhāvaṭṭhenāti saccikaṭṭho.
tika-abh05t:227_7: Aviparītabhāvato eva paramo padhāno atthoti paramattho,
tika-abh05t:228_0: Atthīti vacanasāmaññenāti “atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”tiādīsu “atthī”ti pavattavacanasāmaññena.
tika-abh05t:228_5: taṃ pana hetuṃ atthamattato dassento “yadi saccikaṭṭhenā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:228_6: Payogato pana dūsanena saddhiṃ parato āvi bhavissati.
tika-abh05t:228_7: Okāsaṃ adadamānoti yathānurūpaṃ yuttiṃ vattuṃ avasaraṃ adento.
tika-abh05t:228_10: Upalabbhati puggaloti hi sakavādiṃ uddissa paravādino paṭiññāva na yuttā appasiddhattā visesitabbassa.
tika-abh05t:228_11: Tenevāha “anupalabbhaneyyato na tava vādo tiṭṭhatīti nivattento”ti.
tika-abh05t:228_13: dassetīti etena paravādinā adhippetahetuno viparītatthasādhakattaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh05t:229_0: Upalabbhamānaṃ nāma hotīti ākārato taṃākāravantānaṃ anaññattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:229_3: Etissāti “tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamaṭṭhenā”ti evaṃ vuttāya dutiyapucchāya.
tika-abh05t:229_4: Esa visesoti yo yathāvutto dvinnaṃ pucchānaṃ visayassa sabhāvākārabhedo,
tika-abh05t:229_6: Sabhāvadhammānaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇena abhinnānampi salakkhaṇato bhedoyevāti aññadhammassa aññenākārena na kadācipi upalabbho bhaveyya.
tika-abh05t:229_8: aññattameva na siyāti ruppanādisapaccayādiākārena anupalabbhamānopi puggalo attano bhūtasabhāvaṭṭhena
tika-abh05t:229_9: upalabbhatevāti vadantaṃ paravādinaṃ pati “yo saccikaṭṭho”tiādi codanā anokāsāti dassento āha “yathā pana…pe…
tika-abh05t:230_1: tasmā taṃ dassetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dosāparādhapariyāyehi vibhāvito.
tika-abh05t:230_21: hetvābhāsā cāti dvāvīsati niggahaṭṭhānāni ñāyavādino vadanti.
tika-abh05t:231_12: Ṭhapetvā anuvādaṃ saddatthānaṃ punappunaṃ vacanaṃ atthāpannavacanañca punaruttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:231_13: Parisāya viditassa tīhi vuttassa apaccudāhāro ananubhāsanaṃ.
tika-abh05t:231_14: Yaṃ vādinā vuttaṃ parisāya viññātaṃ paṭivādinā duviññātaṃ,
tika-abh05t:231_16: Taṃvādinā vattabbe vutte paravādino paṭivacanassa anupaṭṭhānaṃ appaṭibhā.
tika-abh05t:231_18: Attano dosānujānanena parapakkhassa dosappasañjanaṃ paramatānujānanaṃ matānuññā.
tika-abh05t:231_20: Sampattaniggahassa aniggahaṭṭhāne ca niggaṇhanaṃ anuyuñjitabbassa anuyogo.
tika-abh05t:232_0: Imesu dvāvīsatiyā niggahaṭṭhānesu idaṃ paṭiññāya apanayanato sayameva paccakkhānato paṭiññāsaññāso nāma niggahaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh05t:232_2: Asiddhattāti etena paccakkhato anumānato ca puggalassa anupalabbhamāha.
tika-abh05t:232_8: Tathā hi taṃ sāsaniko puggalavādī vadeyya “puggalo upalabbhati,
tika-abh05t:232_9: atthi puggalo”ti bhagavatā vuttattā rūpavedanādi viya.
tika-abh05t:232_11: taṃ paramatthato atthi yathā taṃ rūpaṃ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ.
tika-abh05t:232_13: na taṃ bhagavatā “atthī”ti vuttaṃ yathā taṃ pakativādiādīnaṃ pakatiādīti,
tika-abh05t:232_15: Ettha hi yadi vohārato puggalassa atthibhāvo adhippeto,
tika-abh05t:232_19: Viruddho ca tassa aniccasaṅkhatapaṭiccasamuppannādibhāvāsādhanato rūpavedanādīsu tathā diṭṭhattātiādinā tassa ahetukabhāvasseva pākaṭabhāvato.
tika-abh05t:233_0: Yaṃ pana bāhirakā puthu aññatitthiyā vadanti.
tika-abh05t:233_1: Attheva ca paramatthato attā ñāṇābhidhānassa pavattiyā nimittabhāvato rūpādi viya.
tika-abh05t:233_2: Atha vā attātirittapadatthantaro rūpakkhandho khandhasabhāvattā yathā taṃ itarakkhandhā.
tika-abh05t:234_0: Ettha ca purimassa hetuno paññattiyā anekantikatā asiddhatā ca.
tika-abh05t:234_1: Na hi asato sakavādinaṃ pati paramatthato ñāṇābhidhānappavattiyā nimittabhāvo sijjhati.
tika-abh05t:234_3: tadasiddhasādhanatā rūpādisabhāvavinimuttarūpopi puggalo na hotīti evamādiviruddhatthatā.
tika-abh05t:234_6: Tabbisesapariggahe ca sakavādinaṃ pati udāharaṇābhāvo paraparikappitajīvapadatthavirahato.
tika-abh05t:234_7: Itarakkhandhānaṃ vedanādivinimuttaubhayasiddhajīvapadatthasahitopi rūpakkhandho na hoti itarakkhandhā viyāti viruddhatthatā ca.
tika-abh05t:235_0: Yaṃ pana kāṇādā “sukhādīnaṃ nissayabhāvato”ti anumānaṃ vadanti,
tika-abh05t:235_2: kiṃ sukhādīnaṃ attani paṭibaddhaṃ yato sukhādinissayatāya attā anumīyati.
tika-abh05t:235_4: evaṃ sante sabbepi sukhādayo ekato eva bhaveyyuṃ kāraṇassa sannihitabhāvato aññanirapekkhato ca.
tika-abh05t:235_8: Atha pana tesaṃ attādhīnā vuttīti vadeyyuṃ,
tika-abh05t:235_10: Na hi rūpādivinimutto tādiso koci sabhāvadhammo sukhādisannissayabhūto atthi,
tika-abh05t:235_13: Tathā “aññassa saccikaṭṭhassa asiddhattā”ti iminā ca pakatiaṇuādīnampi bāhiraparikappitānaṃ asiddhatā vuttāvāti veditabbā.
tika-abh05t:235_16: Na hi paccakkhato pakati siddhā kapilassapi isino tassa apaccakkhabhāvassa kāpilehi anuññāyamānattā.
tika-abh05t:236_0: Yaṃ pana “atthi padhānaṃ bhedānaṃ anvayadassanato sakalakalāpamattaṃ viyā”ti te anumānaṃ vadanti.
tika-abh05t:236_1: Iminā hi bhedānaṃ satvādīnaṃ vijjamānapadhānatā paṭiññātā.
tika-abh05t:236_7: saṇṭhānabhedena aññattha paṭijānanato na dosoti ce? Taṃ na,
tika-abh05t:236_9: Na hi saṇṭhānaṃ vatthubhedanimittaṃ tassa anupādānattā.
tika-abh05t:236_11: na taṃ tassa anupādānaṃ yathā suvaṇṇamattikādighaṭādīnaṃ suvaṇṇaghaṭo mattikāghaṭo koseyyapaṭo kappāsapaṭoti ca sādhetabbadhammarahitañca udāharaṇaṃ.
tika-abh05t:236_12: Na hi padhānekakāraṇapubbakattaṃ sakalādīnaṃ pakativādino siddhaṃ,
tika-abh05t:236_15: Na hi tadeva sādhetabbaṃ tadeva ca udāharaṇaṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:236_17: Na hi tadeva tena anvitaṃ yujjati.
tika-abh05t:236_18: Padhānena anvayadassanampi asiddhaṃ paravādinoti guṇassa padhānassa ananujānanato.
tika-abh05t:236_19: Atha yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ padhānaṃ “padhīyati ettha phala”nti,
tika-abh05t:236_23: na kiñci viruddhaṃ dhammānaṃ yathāsakaṃ paccayena paṭiccasamuppattiyā icchitattāti.
tika-abh05t:237_0: Apica pakativādino “satvarajatamasaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ guṇānaṃ samabhāvo pakati,
tika-abh05t:237_1: sā ca niccā satvādivisamasabhāvato aniccato mahatādivikārato anaññā”ti paṭijānanti.
tika-abh05t:237_2: Sā tesaṃ vuttappakārā pakati na sijjhati tato viruddhasabhāvato vikārato anaññattā.
tika-abh05t:237_4: tañca rassato govisāṇato anaññanti vuccamānaṃ sijjhati.
tika-abh05t:237_7: Satvādiguṇattayato hi pakatiyā anaññattaṃ icchantānaṃ tesaṃ satvādīnampi pakatiyā anaññattaṃ āpajjati,
tika-abh05t:237_11: Yadi hi byattasabhāvato vikārato abyattasabhāvā pakati anaññā,
tika-abh05t:237_12: evaṃ sante hetumantatā aniccatā abyāpitā sakiriyatā anekatā nissitatā liṅgatā sāvayavatā paratantratāti evamādayo aneke dosā pakatiyā āpajjanti,
tika-abh05t:237_14: Tathā ca sati samayavirodhoti kappanāmattaṃ pakatīti asiddhā sāti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:238_0: Pakatiyā ca asiddhāya taṃnimittakabhāvena vuccamānā mahatādayopi asiddhā eva.
tika-abh05t:238_3: Etesu hi issaro tāva na sijjhati upakārassa adassanato.
tika-abh05t:238_4: Sattānañhi jātiyaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ bījakhettabhāvena kammassa hīnatādivibhāgakaraṇena,
tika-abh05t:238_14: Sati hi katūpacite kammasmiṃ tattha yaṃ akusalaṃ,
tika-abh05t:238_18: Issaravādināpi hi na sakkā kammaṃ paṭikkhipituṃ.
tika-abh05t:239_0: Apicetassa lokavicittassa issaranimmānabhāve bahū dosā sambhavanti. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh05t:239_4: Na hi sannihitakāraṇānaṃ phalānaṃ kamena uppatti yuttā,
tika-abh05t:239_8: Issaro eva ca kārakoti sabbakāraṇānaṃ kāraṇabhāvahāni.
tika-abh05t:239_16: Tena vā nimmitena yaṃ attano kātabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t:239_18: Paratthatāyaṃ pana paro nāmettha loko evāti kimatthiyaṃ tassa nirayādirogādivisādinimmānaṃ.
tika-abh05t:239_20: sā sayaṃkatā vā siyā paraṃkatā vā ahetukā vā.
tika-abh05t:239_26: na kassaci anissaratāti evamissarassapi asiddhi veditabbā.
tika-abh05t:240_4: Taṃnimittakaṃ pana lokappavattiṃ icchantānaṃ pajāpativāde purisavāde ca issaravāde viya dosā asiddhi ca vidhātabbā.
tika-abh05t:240_7: Paramatthato hi vijjamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ upalabbhati.
tika-abh05t:240_15: Paramatthato hi aniddhāritasabhāvassa vattanālakkhaṇatāyaṃ sasavisāṇādīnampi taṃlakkhaṇatā āpajjeyya.
tika-abh05t:241_0: Yaṃ pana vadanti kāṇādā “aparasmiṃ aparaṃ yugapadi ciraṃ khippamiti kālaliṅgānīti liṅgasabbhāvato atthi kālo”ti,
tika-abh05t:241_2: Siddhasambandhesu hi liṅgesu liṅgamattaggahaṇena liṅgini avabodho bhaveyya.
tika-abh05t:241_3: Na ca kenaci aviparītacetasā tena liṅgena saha kadāci kālasaṅkhāto liṅgī gahitapubboti.
tika-abh05t:241_5: “Aparasmiṃ apara”ntiādikassa visesassa nimittabhāvato yuttanti ce? Na,
tika-abh05t:241_7: Na ca paṭhamajātatādi nāma koci dhammo atthi aññatra samaññāmattatoti nattheva paramatthato kālo.
tika-abh05t:241_11: Tvañcetaṃ ekaṃ vadasīti bahūnaṃ ekabhāvābhāvato nattheva paramatthato kālo.
tika-abh05t:241_16: Hiyyo ca vattamāno ajja atīto ahosi,
tika-abh05t:241_18: Na cekasabhāvassa anekasabhāvatā yuttāti asiddho paramatthato kālo.
tika-abh05t:241_19: Dhammappavattiṃ pana upādāya kappanāmattasiddhāya lokasamaññāya atītādivibhāgato voharīyatīti vohāramattakoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh05t:242_4: Aññathā evaṃvidho koci bhāvo atthi ce,
tika-abh05t:242_7: Kevalaṃ panete vādā vimaddiyamānā ahetuvāde eva tiṭṭhanti,
tika-abh05t:242_9: Ahetukabhāve hi pavattiyā yvāyaṃ narasuranirayatiracchānādīsu indriyādīnaṃ viseso,
tika-abh05t:242_13: Diṭṭhā hi cakkhādito cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ bījādito aṅkurādīnaṃ pavatti,
tika-abh05t:242_16: Yato yato hi paccayasāmaggito yaṃ yaṃ phalaṃ nibbattati,
tika-abh05t:242_17: tato pubbe pacchā ca na tassa nibbatti sambhavati,
tika-abh05t:242_20: ahetukā pavattīti imāpi vācā yathāsakapaccayasamavāyato pure pacchā ca bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-abh05t:242_23: Evaṃ sabbepi saṅkhatā dhammāti na sijjhati ahetuvādo.
tika-abh05t:242_24: Tasmiñca asiddhe pavattiyā ahetubhāvo viya ahetupariyāyavisesabhūtā sabhāvaniyatiyadicchādayopi asiddhā eva hontīti veditabbā.
tika-abh05t:243_5: Na hi paramāṇavo nāma santi aññatra bhūtasaṅghātā.
tika-abh05t:243_7: na ca niccato aniccassa nibbatti yuttā tassa kāraṇabhāvānupapattito tathā adassanato ca.
tika-abh05t:243_8: Yadi ca so kassaci kāraṇabhāvaṃ gaccheyya,
tika-abh05t:243_11: yaṃ vikāraṃ anāpajjantameva kāraṇaṃ phalaṃ nibbatteyyāti.
tika-abh05t:243_15: aññepi niccādibhāvena bāhirakehi parikappitā asiddhā evāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:243_16: Tena vuttaṃ “dhammappabhedato pana aññassa saccikaṭṭhassa asiddhattā”ti.
tika-abh05t:244_1: evaṃ pana puggale anupalabbhamāne atha kasmā bhagavā ‘atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno’ti,
tika-abh05t:244_4: puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmi’nti ca tattha tattha puggalassa atthibhāvaṃ pavedesī”ti.
tika-abh05t:244_6: Tathā tathā vinetabbānañhi puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena vineyyadamanakusalo satthā dhammaṃ desento lokasamaññānurūpaṃ
tika-abh05t:245_0: Apica aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā puggalakathaṃ katheti hirottappadīpanatthaṃ,
tika-abh05t:245_8: “Khandhā dhātū āyatanāni hirīyanti ottappantī”ti hi vutte mahājano na jānāti,
tika-abh05t:245_10: paṭisattu vā hoti “kimidaṃ khandhā dhātū āyatanāni hirīyanti ottappanti nāmā”ti.
tika-abh05t:245_30: Tasmā bhagavā paccattapurisakāradīpanatthaṃ ānantariyadīpanatthaṃ brahmavihāradīpanatthaṃ pubbenivāsadīpanatthañca puggalakathaṃ katheti.
tika-abh05t:245_34: paṭisattu vā hoti “kimidaṃ khandhā dhātū āyatanāni paṭiggaṇhanti nāmā”ti.
tika-abh05t:245_39: Lokasammutiñca buddhā bhagavanto nappajahanti lokasamaññāya lokābhilāpe ṭhitāyeva dhammaṃ desenti,
tika-abh05t:245_40: tasmā bhagavā lokasammutiyā appahānatthampi puggalakathaṃ kathetīti imehi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā puggalakathaṃ katheti,
tika-abh05t:246_0: Dhammappabhedākārenevāti yathāvuttarūpādidhammappabhedato aññassa saccikaṭṭhassa asiddhattā rūpādidhammappabhedākāreneva
tika-abh05t:246_2: Tena “kiṃ tava puggalo upalabbhamāno ruppanākārena upalabbhati,
tika-abh05t:246_3: udāhu anubhavanasañjānanābhisaṅkharaṇavijānanesu aññatarākārenā”ti dasseti tabbinimuttassa sabhāvadhammassa loke abhāvato.
tika-abh05t:246_6: ādito pana paṭhamaṃ ṭhapetvā pavatto paṭhamanayo,
tika-abh05t:246_7: itaro dutiyanti imaṃ nesaṃ visesaṃ dassento “anujānanā…pe…
tika-abh05t:246_9: Yathādhikatāya laddhiyā anulomanato cettha paṭhamo nayo anulomapakkho,
tika-abh05t:247_0: Tena vata reti ettha tenāti kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-abh05t:247_3: Svāyaṃ hetu sāsanikassa bāhirakassa ca vasena heṭṭhā dassito eva.
tika-abh05t:247_6: taṃ idāni “yaṃ tattha vadesī”tiādinā nigamanarūpena micchābhāvadassanena ca vibhāviyamānaṃ pākaṭabhāvakaraṇato
tika-abh05t:248_0: Ettha ca “puggalo upalabbhatī”ti paṭiññāvayavo sarūpeneva dassito.
tika-abh05t:248_2: Yvāyaṃ yasmā paṭiññādhammo hutvā sadisapakkhe vijjamāno,
tika-abh05t:248_3: visadisapakkhe avijjamānoyeva hetu lakkhaṇūpapanno nāma hoti, na itaro,
tika-abh05t:248_4: tasmā yattha so vijjati na vijjati ca,
tika-abh05t:248_10: Svāyaṃ “vattabbe kho puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā”ti imāya pāḷiyā dīpito,
tika-abh05t:248_14: Evaṃ porāṇena ñāyakkamena sādhanāvayavā niddhāretvā yojetabbā.
tika-abh05t:249_0: Idāni vattanena parapakkhupalakkhite hetudāharaṇe anvayabyatirekadassanavasena niddhāretvā sādhanapayogo yojetabbo.
tika-abh05t:249_2: Hetudāharaṇehiyeva hi saparapakkhānaṃ sādhanaṃ dūsanaṃ vā,
tika-abh05t:249_5: Taṃ pana dvayaṃ “tena vata re”tiādipāḷiyā vibhāvitaṃ.
tika-abh05t:249_7: Paṭiññāṭhapanā pana tesaṃ visayadassanaṃ kathāyaṃ taṃmūlatāyāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:249_14: Visuṃ vuttoti ca pāpanāropanāhi asammissaṃ katvā visuṃ aṅgabhāvena vutto,
tika-abh05t:249_19: āpajjati tattha niggahassa ayathābhūtattā paṭikammassa ca yathābhūtabhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:250_2: vohārato pana anujānātīti sakavādimataṃ jānantenapi paravādinā chalavasena vibhāgaṃ akatvā “puggalo nupalabbhati
tika-abh05t:250_3: saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā”ti pucchāya katāya sakavādī tattha ayaṃ puggalavādī,
tika-abh05t:250_9: tato eva kenaci apaṭikkhipitabbato paramatthato tato so puggalo nupalabbhatīti.
tika-abh05t:250_10: Puna sakavādī pubbe paramatthasaccavasena puggale paṭikkhitte idāni sammutisaccavasenāyaṃ pucchāti mantvā
tika-abh05t:250_12: Tenāha “attanā adhippetaṃ saccikaṭṭhamevāti sammutisaccaṃ sandhāyāti adhippāyo”ti.
tika-abh05t:250_14: nārabhitabbā”ti idaṃ na vattabbaṃ paṭhamapucchāya paramatthasaccassa saccikaṭṭhoti adhippetattā.
tika-abh05t:250_16: āpajjatī”ti idampi na vattabbaṃ dutiyapucchāya sammutisaccassa saccikaṭṭhoti adhippetattā.
tika-abh05t:251_0: Yadi ubhayaṃ adhippetanti idaṃ yadi paṭhamapucchaṃ sandhāya,
tika-abh05t:251_3: tassā sammutisaccavasena paṭhamatthaṃ vatvā puna missakavasena vattuṃ “sammutisaccaparamatthasaccāni
tika-abh05t:251_4: vā ekato katvāpi evamāhā”ti vuttattā tampi na vattabbameva.
tika-abh05t:251_10: Tasmā sammutisaccavasena upaladdhiṃ icchantenapi paramatthasaccavasena anicchanato “puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā”tiādinā anuyogo yutto.
tika-abh05t:251_11: “Padhānappadhānesu padhāne kiccasiddhī”ti eteneva “na ca saccikaṭṭhekadesena anuyogo”tiādi nivattitañca hoti saccikaṭṭhekadesabhāvasseva asiddhattā.
tika-abh05t:251_12: Nāssa paramatthasaccatā anuyuñjitabbāti assa saccikaṭṭhassa paramatthasaccatā paravādinā na anuyuñjitabbā
tika-abh05t:251_13: “puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā”ti sakavādinopi saccikaṭṭhaparamatthato tassa icchitabbattāti
tika-abh05t:251_15: Voharitasaccikaṭṭhassa attanā adhippetasaccikaṭṭhatāpi yuttā tassa tena adhippetattā.
tika-abh05t:251_17: Vuttanayova dosoti “dvepi saccānī”tiādinā anantarameva vuttaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-abh05t:251_19: Atha na iti atha na bhūtasabhāvatthena upalabbheyyāti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:251_22: tasmā ettha “paramatthato puggalaṃ nānujānātī”tiādinā adhippāyamagganaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:252_0: Anuññeyyametaṃ siyāti etaṃ anupalabbhanaṃ paṭhamapucchāyaṃ viya dutiyapucchāyampi anujānitabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh05t:252_1: Na vā kiñci vattabbanti atha vā kiñci na vattabbaṃ ṭhapanīyattā pañhassa.
tika-abh05t:252_3: Ettha ca kāmaṃ saccadvayākārena puggalo nupalabbhati,
tika-abh05t:252_4: sammutiyākārena pana nupalabbhatīti upalabbhanabhāvassa vasena paṭikkhepo katoti ayamettha adhippāyo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh05t:252_7: Etaṃ chalavādaṃ nissāyāti etaṃ ekaṃyeva vatthuṃ uddissa anujānanapaṭikkhipanākāraṃ chalavacanaṃ nissāya.
tika-abh05t:252_9: Sambhavantassa sāmaññenāti niggahaṭṭhānabhāvena sambhavantassa anulomanayena anujānanapaṭikkhepassa samānabhāvena.
tika-abh05t:252_10: Asambhavantassa kappananti paccanīkanayena tassa niggahaṭṭhānabhāvena asambhavantassa tathā kappanaṃ saṃvidhānaṃ chalavādo bhavituṃ arahati.
tika-abh05t:252_13: Vacanasāmaññamattaṃ kappitaṃ chalaṃ vadati etenāti chalavādo.
tika-abh05t:252_18: Yadipi pakkhassa ṭhapanāmūlakaṃ anujānanāvajānanānaṃ micchābhāvadassanaṃ tabbisayattā,
tika-abh05t:253_2: Tena niyāmenāti yena niyāmena sakavādinā catūhi pāpanāropanāhissa niggaho kato,
tika-abh05t:253_4: So niggaho dukkaṭo aniggahoyevāti dassento āha “aniggahabhāvassa vā upagamitattā”ti,
tika-abh05t:253_6: Evamevāti yathā “tayā mama kato niggaho”tiādinā aniggahabhāvūpanayo vutto, evameva.
tika-abh05t:256_3: So hi paravādinā paro nāma hoti.
tika-abh05t:256_5: Abhinnādhikaraṇaṃ viya hi abhinnavisayameva viruddhaṃ nāma siyā,
tika-abh05t:256_9: Yadi evaṃ kathamidaṃ niggahaṭṭhānaṃ jātanti āha “attano panā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:256_10: Tena paṭiññāntaraṃ nāma aññamevetaṃ niggahaṭṭhānanti dasseti.
tika-abh05t:261_1: Sāmaññena vuttaṃ visesaniviṭṭhaṃ hotīti āha “sabbatthāti sabbasmiṃ sarīreti ayamattho”ti.
tika-abh05t:261_2: Sāmaññajotanā hi visese avatiṭṭhatīti visesatthinā viseso anupayujjitabboti.
tika-abh05t:264_7: Pāṭhassa saṃkhittatā suviññeyyāti taṃ ṭhapetvā atthassa sadisataṃ vibhāvento “idhāpi hi…pe…
tika-abh05t:264_9: Etthāpi “na kenaci sabhāvena puggalo upalabbhatī”ti ayamattho vutto hoti.
tika-abh05t:264_10: Na hi kenaci sabhāvena upalabbhamānassa sakalekadesavinimutto pavattikālo nāma atthīti.
tika-abh05t:267_0: 13. Tatiyanaye na sabbekadhammavinimuttaṃ pavattiṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:270_4: Sabbattha puggalo nupalabbhatītiādikassa pāṭhappadesassa attho “sarīraṃ sandhāyā”tiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbo attho.
tika-abh05t:270_11: vuttaṃ hoti tattha “sabbatthā”tiādinā sarīrādino parāmasanaṃ natthi,
tika-abh05t:273_2: saccikaṭṭhe vā saṃsandanaṃ saccikaṭṭhasaṃsandananti samāsadvayaṃ bhavatīti dassento “saccikaṭṭhassā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:273_3: Tattha saccikaṭṭhassa puggalassāti saccikaṭṭhasabhāvassa paramatthato vijjamānasabhāvassa puggalassa.
tika-abh05t:273_4: Rūpādīhi saddhiṃ saṃsandananti saccikaṭṭhatāsāmaññena rūpādīhi samīkaraṇaṃ.
tika-abh05t:273_8: kārassa saccikaṭṭhena upaladdhisāmaññena idha rūpamāhaṭanti tassa udāhaṭabhāvo yuttoti “yathārūpa”nti nidassanavasena attho vutto,
tika-abh05t:273_13: Opammasaṃsandane pana nidassanattho gāhīyatīti imasmiṃ suddhikasaṃsandane kevalaṃ samuccayavaseneva atthadassanaṃ yuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:273_14: Rūpādīni upādāpaññattimattattā puggalassa so tehi añño,
tika-abh05t:273_15: anañño cāti na vattabboti ayaṃ sāsanakkamoti āha “rūpādīhi…pe…
tika-abh05t:273_17: Anuññāyamāneti tasmiṃ samaye sutte ca appaṭikkhipiyamāne.
tika-abh05t:273_18: Ayañca attho sāsanikassa paravādino vasena vuttoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:274_2: paṭikammacatukkādīni saṃkhittānī”ti na sakkā vattunti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:274_3: Codanāya vinā paravādino paṭijānāpanaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ “paṭijānāpanatthanti…pe…
tika-abh05t:274_9: Yadi ṭhapanīyattā paṭikkhipitabbanti imasmiṃ paccanīkanaye ṭhapanīyattā pañhassa sakavādinā paṭikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:274_10: Parenapīti paravādināpi ṭhapanīyattā laddhimeva nissāya anulomanaye paṭikkhepo katoti ayamettha suddhikasaṃsandanāya
tika-abh05t:274_11: adhippāyo yutto anulomepi rūpādīhi aññattacodanāyameva paravādinā paṭikkhepassa katattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:277_1: Upaladdhisāmaññena aññattapucchā cāti iminā dvayampi uddharati upaladdhisāmaññena aññattapucchā,
tika-abh05t:277_5: dvinnaṃ rūpavedanānaṃ viya rūpapuggalānaṃ saccikaṭṭhena samānatā tesaṃ aññattassa kāraṇaṃ yuttaṃ na hoti.
tika-abh05t:277_11: Atha paramatthavohārabhedato tesaṃ aññattaṃ na icchitaṃ,
tika-abh05t:278_0: 37-45. Upaladdhīti puggalassa upaladdhi vijjamānatā. “Paṭikammapañcaka”nti viññāyatīti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:281_2: Etena tato sabbatopi puggalassa aññattānanujānanaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh05t:281_8: Etaṃ vacanokāsanti yadipi sattapaññāsadhammasamudāyato puggalassa aññattaṃ na icchati tabbinimuttassa saccikaṭṭhassa abhāvato,
tika-abh05t:281_11: Tasmā “taṃ paṭikkhipato kiṃ niggahaṭṭhānanti vattuṃ mā labbhethā”ti dassetuṃ “ayañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:281_12: Rūpādidhammappabhedavibhāgamukheneva anavasesato puggaloti gahaṇākāradassanavasena pavatto paṭhamavikappo,
tika-abh05t:281_13: dutiyo pana avibhāgato paramatthasaccabhāvasāmaññenāti ayaṃ imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vikappānaṃ viseso.
tika-abh05t:282_1: Sabhāvabhinno hi dhammo tadaññadhammato vinibbhogaṃ labhati.
tika-abh05t:282_6: puggalasmiṃ rūpa”nti imesu evaṃ pavattesu tīsupi anuyogesu.
tika-abh05t:282_7: Sāsaniko evāyaṃ puggalavādīti katvā āha “na hi so sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ icchatī”ti.
tika-abh05t:282_9: na rūpāyattavuttitāti āha “aññatra rūpāti ettha ca rūpavā puggaloti ayamattho saṅgahito”ti.
tika-abh05t:286_0: 54. Lakkhaṇayuttikathāyaṃ “chalavasena pana vattabbaṃ ājānāhi niggaha”nti pāṭho gahetabbo.
tika-abh05t:289_1: Padadvayassa atthato ekatteti padadvayassa ekattatthe satīti attho.
tika-abh05t:289_3: Tayidaṃ ekattaṃ upalabbhati evāti pacchimapadāvadhāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:289_4: “Kehici puggalo kehici na puggalo”ti byabhicāradassanato parena na sampaṭicchitanti katvā tameva asampaṭicchitattaṃ
tika-abh05t:289_7: Vibhajitabbatanti “puggalo ca tadaññañca upalabbhatī”ti evaṃ vibhajitabbataṃ.
tika-abh05t:289_10: Taṃ vibhāganti yathāvuttaṃ vibhajitabbāvibhajitabbaṃ vibhāgaṃ vadato sakavādino,
tika-abh05t:289_14: kehici na puggalo”ti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttappakāraṃ vibhāgaṃ.
tika-abh05t:289_15: Yathāāpāditenāti “puggalo upalabbhatīti padadvayassa atthato ekatte”tiādinā āpāditappakārena.
tika-abh05t:289_16: Na bhavitabbanti yadipi tena puggalo upalabbhati eva vuccati,
tika-abh05t:289_17: upalabbhatīti pana puggalo eva na vuccati,
tika-abh05t:290_0: 60. Atthato puggalo natthīti vuttaṃ hoti attasuññatādassanena anattalakkhaṇassa vihitattā.
tika-abh05t:293_6: Kāmībhāvassa anekantikattā kassaci kāmadhātūpapannassa kāmadhātuyā āyattattābhāvato ca kadāci bhāvassevāti yojanā.
