tika-abh05t:294_4: Evaṃladdhikattāti añño kāyo añño puggaloti evaṃladdhikattā.
tika-abh05t:297_2: tesaṃ dassanato parato “tena hi puggalo sandhāvatī”tiādinā pāḷi āgatā,
tika-abh05t:297_7: tāni dassetvā ‘tena hi puggalo sandhāvatī’tiādimāhā”ti vattabbanti attho.
tika-abh05t:297_8: Dassentoti vā idaṃ dassanakiriyāya na vattamānatāmattavacanaṃ,
tika-abh05t:298_1: So vattabboti so jīvasarīrānaṃ anaññatāpajjanākāro vattabbo,
tika-abh05t:298_3: “Rūpī attā”ti imissā laddhiyā vasena “yena rūpasaṅkhātena attano sabhāvabhūtena sarīrena saddhiṃ gacchatī”ti
tika-abh05t:298_4: evaṃ pana atthe sati so ākāro vutto eva hoti,
tika-abh05t:298_5: tathā ca sati “rūpaṃ puggaloti ananuññātattā”ti evampi vattuṃ na sakkā.
tika-abh05t:298_8: Nirayūpagassa puggalassa antarābhavaṃ na icchatīti idaṃ purātanānaṃ antarābhavavādīnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:298_9: Adhunātanā pana “uddhaṃpādo tu nārako”ti vadantā tassapi antarābhavaṃ icchanteva,
tika-abh05t:298_12: Tattha ye “saññuppādā ca pana te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti suttassa atthaṃ micchā gahetvā cutūpapātakālesu
tika-abh05t:298_13: asaññīnaṃ saññā atthīti antarābhavatova asaññūpapattiṃ icchanti,
tika-abh05t:299_2: acittuppāde vā saññā atthīti icchantīti na vattabbanti sambandho.
tika-abh05t:300_1: Indhanupādāno aggi viya indhanena rūpādiupādāno puggalo rūpādinā vinā natthīti ettha ayamadhippāyavibhāvanā –
tika-abh05t:300_2: yathā na vinā indhanena aggi paññāpīyati,
tika-abh05t:300_3: na ca taṃ aññaṃ indhanato sakkā paṭijānituṃ,
tika-abh05t:300_9: evaṃ na vinā rūpādīhi puggalo paññāpīyati,
tika-abh05t:300_15: tañca ojaṭṭhamakarūpaṃ pabandhavasena pavattaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ.
tika-abh05t:300_16: Yadi evaṃ puggalo rūpādīhi añño anicco ca āpanno,
tika-abh05t:300_18: tasmiṃyeva kaṭṭhādisaññite rūpasaṅkhātapaḷitte yaṃ usumaṃ so aggi taṃsahajātāni tīṇibhūtāni indhanaṃ.
tika-abh05t:300_19: Evampi siddhaṃ lakkhaṇabhedato aggindhanānaṃ aññattanti aggi viya indhanato rūpādīhi añño puggalo anicco ca āpajjatīti.
tika-abh05t:303_5: Evaṃ pana pāṭhe ṭhite nīlaṃ upādāya nīloti kathamayaṃ paduddhāroti āha “nīlaṃ rūpaṃ…pe…
tika-abh05t:303_6: ettha yo puṭṭho nīlaṃ upādāya nīlo”ti.
tika-abh05t:304_0: 98. Vuttanti “maggakusalo”tiādīsu chekaṭṭhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kusalapaññattiṃ kusalavohāraṃ.
tika-abh05t:305_0: 112. Pubbapakkhaṃ dassetvā uttaramāhāti paravādī pubbapakkhaṃ dassetvā sakavādissa uttaramāha.
tika-abh05t:306_1: “Rūpaṃ rūpavā”tiādinayappavattaṃ paravādivādaṃ bhindituṃ “yathā na nigaḷo negaḷiko”tiādinā sakavādivādo
tika-abh05t:306_2: āraddhoti āha “yassa rūpaṃ so rūpavāti uttarapakkhe vuttaṃ vacanaṃ uddharitvā”ti.
tika-abh05t:307_2: Tayidaṃ visesanaṃ cakkhussāti imināva siddhanti na kataṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:310_2: Taggahaṇeneva hi taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇīye kiriyānampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh05t:311_1: Kammakārakassa puggalassa yo añño puggalo kārako.
tika-abh05t:311_6: Tehi tehi kārakehi puggalā viya aññāni kammāni karīyantīti dasseti.
tika-abh05t:311_9: kammassa kārakoti ayaṃ vibhāgo idha anāmaṭṭho hoti,
tika-abh05t:311_10: tathā ca sati kārakaparamparāya vacanaṃ virujjheyyāti āha “puggalassa…pe…
tika-abh05t:311_13: Idañcāti na kevalaṃ puggalakārakassa kammakārakatāpattiyeva doso,
tika-abh05t:311_14: atha kho idaṃ kammakārakatāya kārakaparamparāpajjanampi vicāretabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t:313_3: siyā na vattabbo “aññoti vā anaññoti vā”ti,
tika-abh05t:313_4: evaṃ pavattanigaṇṭhavādasadisattā so eva eko neva so hoti,
tika-abh05t:313_9: so paṭisaṃvedetī”ti gahaṇaṃ sassatadiṭṭhibhayena paṭikkhipantassa itaraṃ ucchedaggahaṇaṃ āpannaṃ.
tika-abh05t:313_12: Kārakavedakicchāya ṭhatvāti sveva kārako vedako cāti imasmiṃ ādāye ṭhatvā.
tika-abh05t:313_14: Āpannavasenapīti āpannagāhavasenapi ayaṃ anuyogo vuttoti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:313_15: Sabbesaṃ āpannattāti heṭṭhā vuttanayena sabbesaṃ vikappānaṃ anukkamena āpannattā nāyamanuyogo katoti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:313_16: Ekekassevāti tesu visuṃ visuṃ ekekasseva āpannattā.
tika-abh05t:313_17: Tantivasena pana te vikappā ekajjhaṃ dassetvāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:313_18: Ekato yojetabbaṃ catunnampi pañhānaṃ ekato puṭṭhattā.
tika-abh05t:317_9: Arahattadhārānañhi khandhā nāma puggalattaṃ tassapi hotīti.
tika-abh05t:323_1: Pajānanaṃ nāma na hoti nibbidādīnaṃ appaccayattā.
tika-abh05t:324_2: vinārūpabhāvo tato vinissaṭatāti tadubhayaṃ rūpassa abbhantaragamanaṃ bahinikkhamanañca hoti.
tika-abh05t:324_3: Tasmā taṃ dvayaṃ saharūpabhāvavinārūpabhāvānaṃ lakkhaṇavacananti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:325_4: So eva yathāsakaṃ kammunā paṭilabhitabbato paṭilābho.
tika-abh05t:325_9: So hi rūpena amissitattā arūpoti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-abh05t:325_11: asatipi jīve tathāniruḷhaṃ lokavohāraṃ gahetvā sammāsambuddhāpi voharantīti dassento “iti imā lokassa samaññā,
tika-abh05t:325_12: yāhi tathāgato voharatī”ti vatvā idāni yathā voharanti,
tika-abh05t:326_2: Ito purimāti tattha tattha sakavādipaṭikkhepādivibhāvanavasena pavattā ito atthasaṃvaṇṇanato purimā.
tika-abh05t:326_3: Imināti vā “yathā rūpādayo dhammā”tiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttavacanena.
tika-abh05t:326_8: yathā parāmāso ca na hoti janapadaniruttiyā abhinivisitabbato,
tika-abh05t:326_10: evaṃ ito purimā ca atthavaṇṇanā yojetabbā.
tika-abh05t:327_0: Tasmā saccanti yasmā tattha paramatthākāraṃ anāropetvā samaññaṃ nātidhāvanto kevalaṃ lokasammutiyāva voharati,
tika-abh05t:327_2: Tathakāraṇanti tatho avitatho dhammasabhāvo kāraṇaṃ pavattihetu etassāti tathakāraṇaṃ,
tika-abh05t:332_3: dhammā samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattantī”ti idampi hi suttaṃ anāgāmiādīnaṃyeva parihāninissayo,
tika-abh05t:333_1: Idhekacco puggalo kālena kālaṃ samayena samayaṃ aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati,
tika-abh05t:333_2: paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
tika-abh05t:334_0: “Parihānidhammo”ti ca puthujjano ca ekacco ca sekkho adhippeto,
tika-abh05t:334_2: Tasmāti yasmā yathādassitāni suttāni anāgāmiādīnaṃ parihāniladdhiyā nissayo,
tika-abh05t:334_4: Taṃ nissāya taṃ apekkhitvā yasmā “arahatopī”ti ettha arahatopi parihāni,
tika-abh05t:334_5: ko pana vādo anāgāmiādīnanti ayamattho labbhati, tasmā pi-
tika-abh05t:334_8: Yasmā vā kāmañcettha dutiyasuttaṃ sekkhavasena āgataṃ,
tika-abh05t:334_9: paṭhamatatiyasuttāni pana asekkhavasenapi āgatānīti tesaṃ laddhi,
tika-abh05t:335_1: So hi “sabbeva arahanto”tiādinā āgatesu tatiyo pañho.
tika-abh05t:336_0: Soyeva na parihāyatīti sotāpannoyeva sotāpannabhāvato na parihāyatīti attho.
tika-abh05t:336_1: Na cettha sakadāgāmibhāvāpattiyā sotāpannabhāvāpagamo parihāni hoti visesādhigamabhāvato.
tika-abh05t:339_6: tato parihīno puna vāyamanto tadanantaraṃ na arahattaṃ pāpuṇātīti kā ettha yuttīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:339_7: Paravādī nāma yuttampi vadati ayuttampīti kiṃ tassa vāde yuttigavesanāyāti pana daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:339_9: Na cettha asiddhatāsaṅkā lokuttaramaggassa parassapi ariyamaggabhāvassa siddhattā,
tika-abh05t:339_11: Tathā na viruddhatā dutiyamaggādīnaṃ bhāvanāmaggabhāvassa oḷārikakilesappahānādīnañca parassapi āgamato siddhattā.
tika-abh05t:342_2: phusanā”ti ca paccakkhato adhigamo adhippetoti vuttaṃ “pattabbaṃ vadatīti āha phusanāraha”nti.
tika-abh05t:343_1: Katasanniṭṭhānassāti imasmiṃ sattāhe māse utumhi antovasse vā aññaṃ ārādhessāmīti katanicchayassa.
tika-abh05t:348_2: Maggabhāvanampi na icchantīti viññāyati “idha brahmacariyavāso”ti iminā “dvepi brahmacariyavāsā natthi devesūti upaladdhivasenā”ti vuttattā.
tika-abh05t:349_4: Paṭikkhepo na yuttoti evaṃ puggalavasena atthayojanā na yuttāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:349_5: Puggalādhiṭṭhānena pana katāpi atthavaṇṇanā okāsavasena paricchijjatīti nāyaṃ doso.
tika-abh05t:349_6: Tassāyaṃ adhippāyoti ayaṃ “gihīnañcevā”tiādinā vutto tassa paravādino yadi adhippāyo,
tika-abh05t:349_7: evaṃ saññāya paravādino sakavādinā samānādāyoti na niggahāraho siyā.
tika-abh05t:349_9: Paṭhamaṃ pana anujānitvā pacchā paṭikkhepeneva niggahetabbatā veditabbā.
tika-abh05t:349_11: natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti pucchāya ekaccānaṃ manussānaṃ maggappaṭivedhaṃ sandhāya paravādino paṭikkhepo.
tika-abh05t:349_12: Yadipi so devānaṃ maggappaṭilābhaṃ na icchati,
tika-abh05t:349_13: sambhavantaṃ pana sabbaṃ dassetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘gihīna’micceva avatvā ‘ekaccānañca devāna’nti vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-abh05t:352_6: “idha bhāvitamaggo”tiādikena kathaṃ sametīti codetvā yathā sameti,
tika-abh05t:352_11: Jhānānāgāmīti asamucchinnajjhattasaṃyojanopi rūpabhave uppajjitvā anāvattidhammamaggaṃ bhāvetvā tattheva parinibbāyanato.
tika-abh05t:352_12: Adhippāyoti yathāvutto dvinnaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanānaṃ avirodhadīpako adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:353_7: Aññathā “paranimmitavasavattideve upādāyā”tiādi vattuṃ na sakkā “deve ca tāvatiṃse”ti vuttattā.
tika-abh05t:353_8: Yathā hi tassa “seyyathāpi devehi tāvatiṃsehi saddhiṃ mantetvā”tiādīsu viya sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ upādāya
tika-abh05t:353_9: kāmāvacaradevesu tāvatiṃsadevā pākaṭā paññātāti tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ,
tika-abh05t:353_10: na teyeva adhippetāti suttapadassa sandhāyabhāsitatthaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t:353_12: sāsane pabbajjā “idha brahmacariyavāso”ti imasmiṃ sutte adhippetā.
tika-abh05t:353_13: Sā hi uttarakurukānaṃ devānañca anokāsabhāvato dukkarā dullabhā ca.
tika-abh05t:353_14: Tattha sūriyaparivattādīhipi devesu maggapaṭilābhāya atthitā vibhāvetabbā,
tika-abh05t:353_15: uttarakurukānaṃ pana visesānadhigamabhāvo ubhinnampi icchito evāti.
tika-abh05t:357_5: Tattha yadi catunnaṃ maggānaṃ vasena samudayapakkhikassa kilesagaṇassa catubhāgehi pahānaṃ “odhiso pahāna”nti adhippetaṃ,
tika-abh05t:357_6: icchitamevetaṃ sakavādissa “tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyā”ti ca ādivacanato.
tika-abh05t:357_7: Yasmā pana maggo catūsu saccesu nānābhisamayavasena kiccakaro,
tika-abh05t:357_10: kālena samudayaṃ pajahatī”tiādinā nānakkhaṇavasena saccesu pavattatīti icchito,
tika-abh05t:357_12: Tathā sati dukkhādīnaṃ ekadesaekadesameva parijānāti pajahatīti dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “sotāpatti…pe…
tika-abh05t:357_14: Sati hi nānābhisamaye paṭhamamaggādīhi pahātabbānaṃ saṃyojanattayādīnaṃ dukkhadassanādīhi ekadesaekadesappahānaṃ
tika-abh05t:357_16: tato eva ekadesasotāpannāditā ca āpajjati anantaraphalattā lokuttarakusalānaṃ,
tika-abh05t:357_18: Na hi kālabhedena vinā so eva sotāpanno,
tika-abh05t:358_0: Apicāyaṃ nānābhisamayavādī evaṃ pucchitabbo “maggañāṇaṃ saccāni paṭivijjhantaṃ kiṃ ārammaṇato paṭivijjhati,
tika-abh05t:358_3: tassa vipassanāñāṇassa viya dukkhasamudayānaṃ accantaparicchedasamucchedā na yuttā tato anissaṭattā,
tika-abh05t:358_5: Na hi sayameva attānaṃ ārabbha pavattatīti yuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:358_8: nirodhaṃ kiccato ārammaṇato ca paṭivijjhatīti evamasammohato paṭivijjhantassa maggañāṇassa nattheva nānābhisamayo.
tika-abh05t:358_19: tadatthasādhanatthaṃ āyasmatā gavaṃpatittherena ābhatattā paccekañca saccattayadassanassa yojitattā.
tika-abh05t:358_20: Aññathā purimadiṭṭhassa puna adassanato samudayādidassane dukkhādidassanamayojanīyaṃ siyā.
tika-abh05t:358_21: Na hi lokuttaramaggo lokiyamaggo viya katakāribhāvena pavattati samucchedakattā.
tika-abh05t:358_22: Tathā yojane ca sabbaṃ dassanaṃ dassanantaraparanti dassanānuparamo siyā.
tika-abh05t:358_23: Evaṃ āgamato yuttito ca nānābhisamayassa asambhavato paccekaṃ maggānaṃ odhiso pahānaṃ natthīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:362_2: maggabhāvanā pana yāvadeva kilesasamucchindanatthāti ñatvā “kiccasabbhāvanti tīhi pahātabbassa pahīnata”nti āha.
tika-abh05t:362_3: Tattha tīhīti heṭṭhimehi tīhi ariyamaggehi pahātabbassa ajjhattasaṃyojanassa pahīnataṃ samucchindananti attho.
tika-abh05t:362_4: Taṃ pana kiccanti adhobhāgiyasaṃyojanesu maggassa pahānābhisamayakiccaṃ.
tika-abh05t:362_6: Etaṃ na sametīti evaṃ magguppādato pageva kāmarāgabyāpādā pahīyantīti laddhikittanaṃ iminā maggassa kiccasabbhāvakathanena na sameti na yujjati.
tika-abh05t:362_9: Yo hi jhānalābhī jhānena yathāvikkhambhite kilese maggena samucchindati,
tika-abh05t:366_1: Sabbaṃ atthīti ettha yasmā paccuppannaṃ viya atītānāgatampi dharamānasabhāvanti paravādino laddhi,
tika-abh05t:366_7: Atthīti pana ayaṃ atthibhāvo yasmā desakālākāradhammehi vinā na hoti,
tika-abh05t:366_8: tasmā taṃ tāva tehi saddhiṃ yojetvā anuyogaṃ dassetuṃ “sabbattha sabbamatthī”tiādinā pāḷi pavattā.
tika-abh05t:366_11: parato ca sabbesūti dhammā vibhāgato vuccanti,
tika-abh05t:366_12: tasmā oḷārikassa pākaṭassa rūpadhammasamudāyassa vasena atthaṃ dassetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sabbatthāti sabbasmiṃ sarīre”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:366_14: Tathā ca kāṇādakāpilehi paṭiññāyamānā ākāsakālādisattapakatipurisā viya paravādinā paṭiññāyamānaṃ sabbaṃ sabbabyāpīti āpannameva hotīti.
tika-abh05t:366_15: “Sabbattha sarīre”ti ca “tile tela”nti viya byāpane bhummanti sarīrapariyāpannena sabbena bhavitabbanti vuttaṃ “sirasi pādā…pe… attho”ti.
tika-abh05t:367_1: Etasmiṃ pakkheyevassa aññavādo paridīpito siyā “yaṃ atthi,
tika-abh05t:367_7: Evaṃ sabbenākārena sabbaṃ sabbesu dhammesu sabbaṃ atthīti atthoti sambandho.
tika-abh05t:367_9: anekasattinicitābhāvā asato natthi sambhavo”ti vādo paridīpito siyā.
tika-abh05t:367_11: Taṃ pana ekasabhāvanti saṃyogarahitaṃ nāma atthato ekasabhāvaṃ,
tika-abh05t:367_13: Etena devavādīnaṃ brahmadassanaṃ atthevātivādo paridīpito siyā.
tika-abh05t:367_14: Atthīti pucchatīti yadi sabbamatthīti tava vādo,
tika-abh05t:367_15: yathāvuttāya mama diṭṭhiyā sammādiṭṭhibhāvo atthīti ekantena tayā sampaṭicchitabbo,
tika-abh05t:370_4: evaṃ visesaṃ vā rūpaṃ aggahetvā paccuppannatāvisesavisiṭṭharūpameva appiyaṃ paccuppannarūpabhāvānaṃ samānādhikaraṇattā etasmiṃyeva visaye appetabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t:370_5: vacīgocaraṃ pāpetabbaṃ satipi nesaṃ visesanavisesitabbatāsaṅkhāte vibhāge tathāpi avibhajitabbaṃ katvāti.
tika-abh05t:370_6: Yasmā pana pāḷiyaṃ “paccuppannanti vā rūpanti vā”ti paccuppannarūpasaddehi tadatthassa vattabbākāro itisaddehi dassito,
tika-abh05t:370_12: Rūpasamūhaṃ upādāyāti taṃtaṃattapaññattiyā upādānabhūtānaṃ abhāvavibhāvanākārena pavattamānānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ samūhaṃ upādāya.
tika-abh05t:370_17: Na pana yuttā rūpabhāvassa vigamāvattabbatāti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:370_19: Na hi tassa paccuppannabhāvavigame vigamāvattabbatā yuttā.
tika-abh05t:373_1: Anāgataṃ vā paccuppannaṃ vāti ettha vā-
tika-abh05t:373_2: saddo aniyamattho yathā “khadire vā bandhitabbaṃ palāse vā”ti.
tika-abh05t:373_4: saddo anāgatapaccuppannesu yaṃ kiñci padhānaṃ katvā sambandhaṃ labhatīti dassento “anāgataṃ…pe…
tika-abh05t:373_6: Tattha paccuppannaṃ hontanti paccuppannaṃ jāyamānaṃ paccuppannabhāvaṃ labhantaṃ.
tika-abh05t:373_8: Tampi hutvā hotīti yaṃ anāgataṃ hutvā paccuppannabhāvappattiyā “hutvā hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:373_9: kiṃ tadapi puna hutvā hotīti pucchati.
tika-abh05t:374_0: Vacanaṃ arahatīti iminā vacanamatte na koci dosoti dasseti.
tika-abh05t:374_2: yadipi tassa puna hutvā bhūtassa puna hutvāhotibhāvo natthi,
tika-abh05t:374_3: punappunaṃ ñāpetabbatāya pana dutiyaṃ tato parampi tathā vattabbataṃ arahatīti “āmantā”ti paṭijānātīti.
tika-abh05t:375_1: hutvā hotī”ti ettha pubbe yadetaṃ tayā “anāgataṃ hutvā paccuppannaṃ hotī”ti vadatā “taṃyeva anāgataṃ
tika-abh05t:375_2: taṃ paccuppanna”nti laddhivasena “anāgataṃ vā paccuppannaṃ vā hutvā hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:375_3: “kiṃ te tampi hutvā hotī”ti pucchite yo paravādinā hutvā bhūtassa puna hutvāabhāvato “na hevā”ti paṭikkhepo kato,
tika-abh05t:375_6: tadeva paccuppannanti satipi atthābhede anāgatapaccuppannanti pana attheva kālabhedoti taṃkālabhedavirodhāya
tika-abh05t:375_8: Tena hi so ayañca paṭikkhepo nīto pavattitoti.
tika-abh05t:375_11: Yathā hi sā paṭiññā atthābhedena nītā pavattitā,
tika-abh05t:375_14: anāgatādippabhedāya kālapaññattiyā upādānabhūtassa atthassa abhedenāti attho.
tika-abh05t:375_15: Yathā upādānabhūtarūpādiatthābhedepi tesaṃ khaṇattayānāvatti taṃsamaṅgitā anāgatapaccuppannabhāvāvattitā,
tika-abh05t:375_16: tathā tattha vuccamānā hutvāhotibhāvā yathākkamaṃ purimapacchimesu pavattitā purimapacchimakiriyāti katvāti imamatthaṃ dassento “atthānānattaṃ…pe…
tika-abh05t:375_17: paṭijānātī”ti vatvā puna “atthānānattameva hī”tiādinā tameva atthaṃ samattheti.
tika-abh05t:375_18: Yathā pana “taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīra”nti paṭijānantassa jīvova sarīraṃ,
tika-abh05t:375_20: evaṃ “taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppanna”nti ca paṭijānantassa anāgatapaccuppannānaṃ anaññattaṃ āpannanti
tika-abh05t:375_21: paccuppannānāgatesu vuttā hotibhāvahutvābhāvā anāgatapaccuppannesupi āpajjeyyunti vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh05t:376_1: Āmantā”ti evaṃ atthānānattaṃ sandhāya anuññātassa atthassa.
tika-abh05t:376_3: Doso vuttoti anāgataṃ hutvā paccuppannabhūtassa puna anāgataṃ hutvā paccuppannabhāvāpattisaṅkhāto doso vutto purimanaye.
tika-abh05t:376_4: Pacchimanaye pana anāgatapaccuppannesu ekekassa hutvāhotibhāvāpattisaṅkhāto doso vuttoti attho.
tika-abh05t:376_6: Na hevaṃ vattabbe”ti evaṃ kālanānattaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhittapañhaṃ.
tika-abh05t:376_11: Etthāti “hutvā hotī”ti etasmiṃ pañhe kathaṃ hoti dosoti codetīti.
tika-abh05t:377_0: Tadubhayaṃ gahetvāti “taṃ anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppanna”nti ubhayaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā.
tika-abh05t:377_2: Ekekamevāti ubhayaṃ ekajjhaṃ aggahetvā ekekameva visuṃ visuṃ imasmiṃ pakkhe tathā na yuttanti attho.
tika-abh05t:377_3: Esa nayoti atidesaṃ katvā saṃkhittattā taṃ dubbiññeyyanti “anāgatassa hī”tiādinā vivarati.
tika-abh05t:377_4: Paṭijānitabbaṃ siyā anāgatapaccuppannānaṃ yathākkamaṃ hotihutvābhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:377_6: tattha hi “yadi te anāgataṃ hutvā”tiādinā hutvāhotibhāvo codito.
tika-abh05t:377_9: hutvāhotiyeva nāmā”ti anāgatādīsu ekekassa hutvāhotināmatā coditā.
tika-abh05t:380_2: Tenāti hi iminā dutiyapucchāya “atītaṃ ñāṇa”nti idaṃ paccāmaṭṭhaṃ,
tika-abh05t:380_5: Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “puna puṭṭho atītārammaṇaṃ paccuppannaṃ ñāṇa”ntiādi.
tika-abh05t:383_5: saddena katakiccatābhāvo anohitabhāratāti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh05t:386_2: so atthisaddābhidheyyoti dvepi samānādhikaraṇatthāti katvā vuttaṃ “atītaatthisaddānaṃ ekatthattā”ti, na,
tika-abh05t:386_9: atthi ca nvātītanti atītañca no atītaṃ siyā,
tika-abh05t:386_10: tathā atthi no atītaṃ atītañca no atītaṃ atītaṃ siyāti,
tika-abh05t:386_11: yathā “atītaṃ atthī”ti ettha atītameva atthīti nāyaṃ niyamo gahetabbo anatītassapi atthibhāvassa icchitattā.
tika-abh05t:386_14: Yena hi ākārena atītassa atthibhāvo paravādinā icchito,
tika-abh05t:386_15: tenākārena anatītassa anāgatassa paccuppannassa ca so icchito.
tika-abh05t:386_20: Tasmā atītaṃ atthiyevāti evamettha niyamo gahetabbo.
tika-abh05t:386_23: “na pana nibbānaṃ atthī”ti ettha pana nibbānameva atthīti ayampi niyamo sambhavatīti so eva gahetabbo.
tika-abh05t:386_24: Yadipi hi nibbānaṃ paramatthato atthibhāvaṃ upādāya uttarapadāvadhāraṇaṃ labbhati tadaññassapi abhāvato,
tika-abh05t:386_25: tathāpi asaṅkhatākārena aññassa anupalabbhanato tathā nibbānameva atthīti purimapadāvadhāraṇe atthe gayhamāne “atthi siyā nibbānaṃ,
tika-abh05t:386_27: Atītādīsu pana purimapadāvadhāraṇaṃ paravādinā na gahitanti natthettha atippasaṅgo.
tika-abh05t:386_29: Evamettha atītādīnaṃ atthitaṃ vadantassa paravādissevāyaṃ iṭṭhavighātadosāpatti,
tika-abh05t:386_30: na pana nibbānassa atthitaṃ vadantassa sakavādissāti.
tika-abh05t:387_0: Etthāha “atītaṃ atthī”tiādinā kiṃ panāyaṃ atītānāgatānaṃ paramatthato atthibhāvo adhippeto,
tika-abh05t:387_5: na ca taṃ yuttaṃ āgamavirodhato yuttivirodhato ca.
tika-abh05t:387_9: So hi paravādī “yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgata”ntiādinā atītānāgatānampi khandhabhāvassa vuttattā asati
tika-abh05t:387_10: ca atīte kusalākusalassa kammassa āyatiṃ phalaṃ kathaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-abh05t:387_11: tattha ca pubbenivāsañāṇādi anāgate ca anāgataṃsañāṇādi kathaṃ pavatteyya,
tika-abh05t:387_12: tasmā attheva paramatthato atītānāgatanti yaṃ paṭijānāti,
tika-abh05t:387_15: Yepi “sabbaṃ atthī”ti vadanti atītaṃ anāgataṃ paccuppannañca,
tika-abh05t:388_2: Te hi “yathā suvaṇṇabhājanassa bhinditvā aññathā kariyamānassa saṇṭhānasseva aññathattaṃ,
tika-abh05t:388_4: yathā ca khīraṃ dadhibhāvena pariṇamantaṃ rasavīriyavipāke pariccajati,
tika-abh05t:388_6: evaṃ dhammāpi anāgataddhuno paccuppannaddhaṃ saṅkamantā anāgatabhāvameva jahanti,
tika-abh05t:388_10: te pana “tīsu addhāsu pavattamāno dhammo atīto atītalakkhaṇayutto,
tika-abh05t:388_13: Yathā puriso ekissā itthiyā ratto aññāsu aratto”ti vadanti.
tika-abh05t:388_15: te “tīsu addhāsu pavattamāno dhammo taṃ taṃ avatthaṃ patvā añño aññaṃ niddisīyati avatthantarato,
tika-abh05t:388_17: Yathā ekaṃ akkhaṃ ekaṅge nikkhittaṃ ekanti vuccati,
tika-abh05t:388_22: te pana “tīsu addhāsu pavattamāno dhammo taṃ taṃ apekkhitvā tadaññasabhāvena vuccati.
tika-abh05t:388_23: Yathā taṃ ekā itthī mātāti ca vuccati dhītā”ti ca.
tika-abh05t:389_3: Ekasseva dhammassa pavattikkhaṇe tayopi kālā samodhānaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh05t:389_6: Tatiyassa pana avatthaññattikassa natthi saṅkaro dhammakiccena kālavavatthānato.
tika-abh05t:390_0: Tattha yadi atītampi dharamānasabhāvatāya atthi anāgatampi,
tika-abh05t:390_1: kasmā taṃ atītanti vuccati anāgatanti vā,
tika-abh05t:390_3: Yadi evaṃ paccuppannassa cakkhussa kiṃ kiccaṃ,
tika-abh05t:390_5: Evaṃ sati anāgatassapi cassa tena bhavitabbaṃ atthibhāvatoti lakkhaṇasaṅkaro siyā.
tika-abh05t:390_9: yena kadāci karoti kadāci na karoti paccayasamavāyabhāvato,
tika-abh05t:390_13: Dhammo hi teneva sabhāvena vijjamāno kasmā kadāci atītoti vuccati kadāci anāgatoti kālassa vavatthānaṃ na siyā.
tika-abh05t:390_22: tassa tathā sato ajātatā niruddhatā ca kena hotīti.
tika-abh05t:390_23: Teneva hi sabhāvena sato dhammassa kathamidaṃ sijjhati ajātoti vā niruddhoti vā.
tika-abh05t:390_29: yadi ahutvā saṅgati hutvā ca vinassatīti na sampaṭicchanti.
tika-abh05t:390_32: atthi ca nāma sabbadā so dhammo,
tika-abh05t:391_0: Sabhāvo sabbadā atthi, nicco dhammo na vuccati;
tika-abh05t:392_0: Dhammo sabhāvato nāñño, aho dhammesu kosalaṃ.
tika-abh05t:393_0: Yañca vuttaṃ “yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgata”ntiādinā atītānāgatānaṃ khandhabhāvassa vuttattā atthevāti, vadāma.
tika-abh05t:393_6: Ko ca evamāha “paccuppannaṃ viya taṃ atthī”ti.
tika-abh05t:394_1: yāva na taṃ pāpaṃ byantī hotī”ti sutte vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:394_5: Tathā sati sakena bhāvena vijjamānaṃ kathaṃ taṃ atītaṃ nāma siyā.
tika-abh05t:394_8: hutvā pativenti tesaṃ udayato pubbe vayato ca pacchā na kāci ṭhiti nāma atthi,
tika-abh05t:397_6: Yañca vuttaṃ “asati atīte kusalākusalassa kammassa āyatiṃ phalaṃ kathaṃ bhaveyyā”ti,
tika-abh05t:397_7: na kho panettha atītakammato phaluppatti icchitā,
tika-abh05t:397_8: atha kho tassa katattā tadāhitavisesato santānato.
tika-abh05t:397_9: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-abh05t:397_11: tassa phalaṃ niccameva atthīti kiṃ tattha kammassa sāmatthiyaṃ.
tika-abh05t:397_14: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “asati atītānāgate kathaṃ tattha ñāṇaṃ pavatteyyā”ti,
tika-abh05t:397_19: Na hi koci atītaṃ anussaranto atthīti anussarati,
tika-abh05t:397_29: Vijjamānaṃ vā hi cittasaññātaṃ avijjamānaṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ etesaṃ atthīti ārammaṇā,
tika-abh05t:397_32: tasmā paccuppannameva dharamānasabhāvaṃ na atītānāgatanti na tiṭṭhati sabbatthivādo.
tika-abh05t:397_35: tesaṃ matena sabbeva sāsanikā sabbatthivādā siyunti.
tika-abh05t:402_1: “Atītaṃ anāgataṃ paccuppanna”nti ayaṃ kālavibhāgaparicchinno vohāro dhammānaṃ taṃ taṃ avatthāvisesaṃ upādāya paññatto.
tika-abh05t:402_6: avatthā pana tesaṃ yathāvuttā vavatthitāti tadupādānā kālapaññattipi vavatthitā eva.
tika-abh05t:402_11: Evamavaṭṭhite yasmā paravādī “atthī”ti imaṃ paccuppannaniyataṃ vohāraṃ atītānāgatesupi āropeti,
tika-abh05t:402_13: Paramatthato avijjamāne vijjamāne katvā voharatīti tato vivecetuṃ “atītaṃ khandhā”tiādikā ayaṃ kathā āraddhā.
tika-abh05t:403_0: Yasmā pana ruppanādisabhāve atītādibhedabhinne dhamme ekajjhaṃ gahetvā tattha rāsaṭṭhaṃ upādāya khandhapaññatti,
tika-abh05t:403_1: cakkhurūpādīsu kāraṇādiatthaṃ suññataṭṭhañca upādāya āyatanapaññatti dhātupaññatti ca,
tika-abh05t:403_3: na atītādipaññatti viya addhavisesādhiṭṭhānāti āha “khandhādibhāvāvijahanato atītānāgatāna”nti.
tika-abh05t:403_4: Te panete atītādike khandhādike viya sabhāvadhammato sañjānanto paravādī “atthī”ti paṭijānātīti āha “atītānāgatānaṃ atthitaṃ icchantassā”ti.
tika-abh05t:404_9: Taṃ sabbadā upaladdhito vuttaṃ niccasabhāvañāpanatthaṃ asaṅkhatadhammassa,
tika-abh05t:404_10: idha pana saṅkhatadhammānaṃ khaṇattayasamaṅgitāya atthibhāvo na tato pubbe pacchā cāti paññāpanatthaṃ “yaṃ,
tika-abh05t:404_13: Etena “atthī”ti samaññāya anupādānato atītaṃ anāgataṃ paramatthato natthīti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh05t:412_1: Ye katūpacitā kusalākusalā dhammā vipākadānāya akatokāsā,
tika-abh05t:412_5: Tesaṃ vipākadānasāmatthiyaṃ anapagatanti adhippāyena paravādī atthitaṃ icchati.
tika-abh05t:412_6: Ye pana paravādī sabbena sabbaṃ vipakkavipākā kusalākusalā dhammā,
tika-abh05t:412_9: Evaṃ icchantassa pana paravādino yathā avipākesupi ekaccaṃ natthīti āpajjati,
tika-abh05t:412_10: evaṃ vipakkavipākesu avipakkavipākesu ca āpajjatevāti dassetuṃ “avipakkavipākā dhammā ekacce”tiādinā pāḷi pavattā.
tika-abh05t:412_13: hetukiccaṃ pana anuparataṃ anupacchinnaṃ atthīti laddhiyaṃ ṭhitattā codetabbova.
tika-abh05t:412_14: Avicchedavasena pavattamānañhi phalassa pabandhavohāraṃ paravādī vohārato atthīti icchati,
tika-abh05t:412_15: hetu panassa kammaṃ paramatthato ca kammūpacayavādibhāvato pattiappattisabhāvatādayo viya cittavippayutto
tika-abh05t:415_0: Yañca sandhāya parato paribhogamayapuññakathāya “paribhogamayaṃ pana cittavippayuttaṃ uppajjatīti laddhiyā paṭijānātī”ti vakkhati.
tika-abh05t:418_1: Paramatthasatipaṭṭhānattāti etena lokuttarāya eva sammāsatiyā tatthāpi maggabhūtāya nippariyāyena satipaṭṭhānabhāvo
tika-abh05t:418_5: Satigocarassa hi satipaṭṭhānataṃ codetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “cakkhāyatanaṃ satipaṭṭhāna”nti āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh05t:421_1: Hevatthikathāyaṃ “sabbo dhammo sakabhāvena atthi parabhāvena natthī”ti pavatto paravādīvādo yathā vibhajja paṭipucchā vā na byākātabbo,
tika-abh05t:421_4: Yathā hi sabbe vādā sappaṭivādāvāti paṭiññā bhūtakathanattā avattabbuttarā upekkhitabbā,
tika-abh05t:421_8: Yathā aniccavādinaṃ pati anicco saddo paccayādhīnavuttitoti,
tika-abh05t:421_12: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana yasmā paravādinā yena sabhāvena yo dhammo atthi,
tika-abh05t:421_13: teneva sabhāvena so vinā kālabhedādiparāmasanena natthīti patiṭṭhāpīyati,
tika-abh05t:422_1: hevaṃ natthī”ti paṭijānantena paravādinā yathā saparabhāvehi rūpādīnaṃ atthitā paṭiññātā,
tika-abh05t:422_8: siyā atthi ca natthi cā”tiādinā sabbapadatthesu pattabhāge paṭijānanti.
tika-abh05t:422_16: Na cettha sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ nidassetabbaṃ salakkhaṇassa adhippetattā tassa natthibhāvassa abhāvato.
tika-abh05t:422_17: Yathā ca parabhāvena natthitāya na vivādo,
tika-abh05t:422_23: natthitā vinā kālabhedena ekasmiṃ dhamme patiṭṭhaṃ na labhanti aññamaññaviruddhattā,
tika-abh05t:423_0: Yaṃ pana te vadanti “yathā suvaṇṇaṃ kaṭakādirūpena ṭhitaṃ rucakādibhāvaṃ āpajjatīti niccāniccaṃ.
tika-abh05t:423_9: Na ca sakkā ubhinnaṃ ekabhāvoti vattuṃ kaṭakavināsepi suvaṇṇāvināsato.
tika-abh05t:423_12: Yathā hi kaṭakapariyāyanirodhena rucakapariyāyuppādepi pariyāyī tatheva tiṭṭhati,
tika-abh05t:423_13: evaṃ manussapariyāyanirodhe devapariyāyuppādepi pariyāyī jīvadrabyaṃ tiṭṭhatīti niccāniccaṃ,
tika-abh05t:423_16: Yaṃ sveva nicco aniccoti vā vadanto aññattha niccataṃ aññattha aniccataṃ paṭijānāti,
tika-abh05t:423_18: evaṃ sati pariyāyopi nicco siyā pariyāyino anaññattā pariyāyasarūpaṃ viya,
tika-abh05t:423_19: pariyāyī vā anicco pariyāyato anaññattā pariyāyasarūpaṃ viyāti.
tika-abh05t:423_27: tathā satissa ekasmimpi sattasantāne bahutā āpajjati sarūpatā ca saṇṭhānavantesupi pīḷakādīsu tathādassanato.
tika-abh05t:424_1: tattha sampattiyogato viññāyamānesu visiṭṭhesu rūpagandharasaphoṭṭhabbesu kiṃ ekaṃ,
tika-abh05t:424_4: Tattha na tāva rūpādīsu ekekaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ tena suvaṇṇakiccāsiddhito,
tika-abh05t:424_7: taṃ pana paññattimattanti na tassa niccatā,
tika-abh05t:424_11: Tayidaṃ nidassanaṃ paravādino jīvadrabyassapi paññattimattaṃ tasseva sādhetīti kuto tassa niccāniccatāti alamatippapañcena.
tika-abh05t:429_1: Vikkhambhitarāgāva avikkhambhitarāgānaṃ adhimānikatāya asambhavatoti yāva adhimānikaṃ,
tika-abh05t:429_3: “Adhimānikāna”nti idaṃ bhūtapubbagatiyā vuttanti āha “adhimānikapubbā adhippetā siyu”nti.
tika-abh05t:430_2: taṃ “handa hī”ti paraṃ jotetīti adhippāyenāha “kāraṇattheti yutta”nti.
tika-abh05t:430_3: Vimatigāhassa pana nicchitataṃ “handa hī”ti paraṃ jotetīti vuttaṃ “vacasāyatthe”ti.
tika-abh05t:433_2: Tasmāti yasmā “virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi ‘yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ,
tika-abh05t:433_3: sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”’nti suttassa atthaṃ aññathā gahetvā udayabbayānupassanānissandena maggakkhaṇepi dukkhanti vipassanā upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh05t:434_2: Āropiteti yuttiniddhāraṇena tasmiṃ atthe patiṭṭhāpite yujjati,
tika-abh05t:434_3: vacīsamuṭṭhāpanakkhaṇato pana pacchā taṃ saddaṃ suṇātīti icchite na yujjati sotaviññāṇassa paccuppannārammaṇattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:434_4: Yasmā pana attanā nicchāritaṃ saddaṃ attanāpi suṇāti,
tika-abh05t:434_5: tasmā sotaviññāṇaṃ “yena taṃ saddaṃ suṇātī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:435_2: Abhibhūsuttāharaṇe adhippāyo vattabboti etena tadāharaṇassa asambandhataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh05t:438_4: yāvatāyukaṃ tiṭṭhatī”ti evaṃvādinā dutiyāpi aḍḍhakathā passitabbā paṭhamakathāya cirakālāvaṭṭhānavacanassa aññadatthu bhāvavibhāvanatoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:438_6: Tattha hi “vassasataṃ tiṭṭhatī”ti pucchāya “āmantā”ti anuññā katā,
tika-abh05t:438_7: pacchimāyaṃ pana “manussānaṃ ekaṃ cittaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ tiṭṭhatī”ti “na hevaṃ vattabbe”ti paṭikkhepo kato.
tika-abh05t:438_12: saddena na kevalaṃ “dve vassasatānī”ti evamādiyeva saṅgahitaṃ,
tika-abh05t:438_13: atha kho “ekaṃ cittaṃ divasaṃ tiṭṭhatī”ti evamādipīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:438_14: “Muhuttaṃ muhuttaṃ uppajjatīti pañho sakavādinā pucchito viya vutto”ti idaṃ vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:441_1: “Tāni vā cattāripi ñāṇāni eko sotāpattimaggoyevāti paṭijānātī”ti imaṃ sandhāyāha “atha vā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:441_4: Kamena pavattamānānipi hi tāni ñāṇāni taṃtaṃmaggakiccassa sādhanato ekoyeva maggo hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:443_4: Sabbāsampi pana paṭisambhidānaṃ paṭhamaphalasacchikiriyāhetutā vicāretabbā maggādhigameneva laddhabbattā phalānaṃ viya,
tika-abh05t:443_5: tasmā “aṭṭhahi ñāṇehī”ti ettha nikkhepakaṇḍe āgatanayena dukkhādiñāṇānaṃ pubbantādiñāṇānañca vasena “aṭṭhahi ñāṇehī”ti yuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-abh05t:446_4: So hi voharitabbato vohārakaraṇatāya ca “vohāro”ti pāḷiyaṃ vutto.
tika-abh05t:446_6: Asiddhalokuttarabhāvassa ekantasāsavattā tassa saddāyatanassa yathā lokuttaratā tava matenāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:447_2: Na hi jalaṃ analanti parikappitaṃ dahati pacati vā.
tika-abh05t:447_3: Kiṃ lokiyena ñāṇena jānitabbato lokiyo rūpāyatanādi viya,
tika-abh05t:447_4: udāhu lokuttaro paccavekkhiyamānamaggādi viyāti evamettha hetussa anekantabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-abh05t:450_7: yo paccayavekallena dhammānaṃ uppādassa accantavibandhabhūto nirodho,
tika-abh05t:450_8: so paṭisaṅkhāya navattabbato appaṭisaṅkhānirodho nāmāti paravādino laddhi.
tika-abh05t:450_9: Paṭisaṅkhāya vinā niruddhāti paccayavekallena anuppattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:450_11: Anuppādopi hi nirodhoti vuccati yato “imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatī”ti lakkhaṇuddesassa paṭilome “imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatī”ti dassito.
tika-abh05t:450_12: Tenāti paṭisaṅkhāya nirodhassa khaṇikanirodhassa ca idha nādhippetattā.
tika-abh05t:455_8: Bhagavā hi dhamme jānanto tesaṃ ākārabhede anavasesetvāva jānāti.
tika-abh05t:455_9: Yathāha “sabbe dhammā sabbākārato buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ āgacchantī”ti.
tika-abh05t:455_11: Ekadeso ca vitthāro na hotīti āha “saṅkhepato”ti.
tika-abh05t:455_17: Svāyamattho sakavādināpi icchitoyevāti āha “kathamayaṃ codetabbo siyā”ti.
tika-abh05t:456_3: Nanu ca sesānaṃ asādhāraṇatāpi atthīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “ṭhānā…pe…
tika-abh05t:459_1: Saṅkhāre sandhāya paṭijānantassāti diṭṭhiyā parikappitena sattena suññe saṅkhāre sandhāya “suññatañca
tika-abh05t:459_3: Dvinnaṃ phassānaṃ samodhānaṃ kathaṃ āpajjati ṭhānāṭhānabhūte saṅkhāre vuttanayena suññataṃ manasi karontassāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:459_4: Yathāvuttanayenāti “diṭṭhiyā parikappitena sattena suññā pañcakkhandhā”ti pakārena nayena.
tika-abh05t:459_7: “Saṅkhāre sandhāya paṭijānantassā”ti vuttattā “dvinnaṃ phassānaṃ samodhānaṃ kathaṃ āpajjatī”ti āha.
tika-abh05t:459_9: añño suññatāmanasikāroti yujjateva dvinnaṃ phassānaṃ samodhānāpatticodanā,
tika-abh05t:459_10: saṅkhāre sandhāya paṭijānantassa pana kathaṃ ariyabhāvasiddhi ṭhānāṭhānañāṇādīnanti vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:462_1: Maggakkhaṇe cittaṃ ekadesena vimuttaṃ ekadesena avimuttanti ayaṃ “vimuttaṃ vimuccamāna”nti laddhiyā doso.
tika-abh05t:462_4: Aṭṭhakathāyañca “tañhi tadā samucchedavimuttiyā vimuttekadesena vimuccamānantissa laddhī”ti dassitovāyamattho.
tika-abh05t:462_11: Sati ca dose vippakataniddeseti ānetvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:465_0: 368. Pahīnā nāma bhaveyyuṃ, na pahiyyamānāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:468_3: Tattha niyyānikāni bhāventoti yathā niyyānikā honti,
tika-abh05t:468_5: Indriyabhāvaṃ pana pattesu tesu puna bhāvanākiccaṃ natthīti tassa adhippāyoti dassento āha “na pana indriyāni bhāvento”ti.
tika-abh05t:471_1: Visinoti visesena bandhati visayīnaṃ attapaṭibandhaṃ karotīti visayo,
tika-abh05t:471_10: Visayaggahaṇañcettha ānubhāvagocarakaraṇānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānadassanaṃ yatthassa tehi upatthaddhattā balādhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
tika-abh05t:471_12: Balādhānañca uttarimanussadhammato mahaggatadhammavisesato uppannehi paṇītehi cittajarūpehi visesāpatti.
tika-abh05t:471_18: Yato ubhinnampi rūpāyatanameva visayoti visayassa sadisataṃ avisesaṃ āha,
tika-abh05t:472_5: Pakaticakkhumato eva hi dibbacakkhu uppajjati. Kasmā?
tika-abh05t:472_7: so ca kasiṇamaṇḍale uggahanimittena vinā natthi,
tika-abh05t:473_2: Tīṇi cakkhūni maṃsadibbapaññācakkhūni cakkhuntarabhāvaṃ vadato bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-abh05t:476_6: Tattha atthantarabhāvaṃ nivāretīti dibbacakkhuñāṇassa pakkhikattā yathākammūpagatañāṇassa tato atthantarabhāvaṃ nivāreti.
tika-abh05t:476_8: Dibbacakkhussa yathākammūpagatañāṇato atthantarabhāvaṃ na nivāreti atappakkhikattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:476_10: na yathākammūpagatañāṇassa dibbacakkhukiccatāti tamatthaṃ “yathākammūpagatañāṇameva dibbacakkhu”nti ettha yojetvā dassento “eva-
tika-abh05t:479_3: yakkhā yebhuyyena pāṇātipātā appaṭiviratā”ti āgatattā cātumahārājikānaṃ saṃvarāsaṃvarasabbhāvo avivādasiddho.
tika-abh05t:479_5: tameva dassentena tāvatiṃsādayo gahitāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “cātumahārājikāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:479_6: Evaṃ satīti yadi tāvatiṃsesu saṃvarāsaṃvaro natthi,
tika-abh05t:484_1: Te hi tāvatiṃsānaṃ uppattito pubbadevāti paññāyiṃsu.
tika-abh05t:484_8: Aṭṭhakathāyañca vuttaṃ “āgantukadevaputtā āgatāti nevāsikā gandhapānaṃ sajjayiṃsu.
tika-abh05t:484_10: Tenāha “tesaṃ surāpānaṃ asaṃvaro na hotīti vattabbaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-abh05t:484_11: Ettha ca tāvatiṃsānaṃ pātubhāvato paṭṭhāya surāpānampi tattha nāhosi,
tika-abh05t:484_12: pageva pāṇātipātādayoti viramitabbābhāvato eva tāvatiṃsato paṭṭhāya upari devalokesu samādānasampattavirativasena puretabbā saṃvarā na santi,
tika-abh05t:484_15: Na hi appahīnānusayānaṃ maggavajjhā kilesā na santīti.
tika-abh05t:492_2: Adhigamo nāma samannāgamo hotīti pāḷiyaṃ catūhi phassādīhi samannāgamo coditoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:495_1: Sabbaṃ yojetabbanti ettha yadi te arahā catūhi khandhehi viya chahi upekkhāhi samannāgato,
tika-abh05t:495_2: evaṃ sante cha upekkhā paccekaṃ phassādisahitāti “chahi phassādīhi samannāgato”tiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:498_1: Pattidhammavasenāti “pattidhammo nāmā”tiādinā vuttassa cittavippayuttassa saṅkhārassa vasena.
tika-abh05t:498_3: “Bodhiyā niruddhāya vigatāya paṭippassaddhāya abuddho hotī”ti anuyogo.
tika-abh05t:501_1: Tasmāti yasmā abodhisattassapi cakkavattino lakkhaṇehi samannāgamo bodhisattassapi carimabhavato aññattha asamannāgamo hoti,
tika-abh05t:504_3: Tena tesaṃ ārambhasamādānādīnampi saṅgaho katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:504_4: Mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya hi mahāsattā niyatāti vuccanti. Yathāha –
tika-abh05t:504_8: na niyāmassa nāma kassaci dhammassa uppannattā byākaronti,
tika-abh05t:504_9: atha kho ekaṃsenāyaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā buddho bhavissatīti katvā byākarontīti paravādīparikappitaṃ dhammantaraṃ paṭisedheti,
tika-abh05t:507_1: Satipi kesañci saṃyojanānaṃ heṭṭhimamaggehi pahīnatte “pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā”tiādīsu
tika-abh05t:507_2: viya vaṇṇabhaṇanamukhena anavasesatañca sandhāya sabbasaṃyojanappahānakittanaṃ pariyāyavacananti āha
tika-abh05t:507_4: Arahattamaggena pajahanato evāti gaṇhātīti aggamaggo eva sabbasaṃyojanāni pajahatīti laddhiṃ gaṇhātīti vadanti padakārā.
tika-abh05t:507_5: Evaṃ satīti yadi anavasesatāmattena tathā paṭijānāti.
tika-abh05t:512_2: sesāni vipassanāmaggapaccavekkhaṇañāṇāni vimuttānīti na vattabbānīti sambandho.
tika-abh05t:515_1: Asekhe ārabbha pavattattā asekhañāṇanti parassa laddhi,
tika-abh05t:518_0: 424. Asive sivāti vohāraṃ viya aññāṇe…pe… vadati.
tika-abh05t:521_3: Viparītānuyogato pabhuti gaṇetvā “catuttha”nti āha na aniyatassa niyāmagamanāyāti aviparītānuyogato pabhuti gaṇetvā,
tika-abh05t:524_1: Sabbaṃ ñāṇanti idaṃ “ariyāna”nti iminā na visesitanti adhippāyenāha “anariyānampi hi ñāṇaṃ ñāṇamevā”ti.
tika-abh05t:524_2: Atha vā pāḷiyaṃ avisesena sabbaṃ ñāṇanti vuttaṃ gahetvā evamāha.
tika-abh05t:524_4: so pana paṭikkhepeyyāti āha “anariyassa etaṃ ñāṇaṃ sandhāyā”ti.
tika-abh05t:527_0: 436-438. Vattabbapaṭiññāti phassārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ vattabbaṃ cetopariyañāṇanti evaṃ pavattā paṭiññā.
tika-abh05t:530_2: tattha pana khaṇapaccuppanne viya tādisena parikammena kadāci ñāṇaṃ uppajjeyya.
tika-abh05t:533_1: “Sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccato diṭṭhesū”ti vutte yaṃ dassanabhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ,
tika-abh05t:533_2: tampi saṅkhārasabhāvattā tathādiṭṭhaṃ siyāti atthato āpajjati,
tika-abh05t:533_4: Taṃ pana yasmā “tampi ñāṇaṃ aniccato diṭṭhaṃ hotī”ti paṭijānanavasena pavattaṃ,
tika-abh05t:545_2: Yo hi dhammo yassa dhammassa yadā kāraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh05t:548_3: Sabhāvadhammatte siddhe saṅkhatavidūratāya asaṅkhataṃ siyāti āha “sabhāvadhammattāsādhakattā”ti.
tika-abh05t:553_2: Te pana yasmā ekavidhatādisāmaññena bandhā viya honti,
tika-abh05t:559_4: na taṃsamuṭṭhānā rūpadhammāti āha “ekuppādatādivirahitā sahajātatā natthī”ti.
tika-abh05t:562_2: Phaladānaṃ vuttaṃ viya hotīti cittena phaladānaṃ padhānabhāve vuttaṃ viya hotīti attho.
tika-abh05t:563_0: Kathaṃ tatheva suttaṃ sakavādiparavādivādesu yujjatīti codanāya “na pana ekenatthenā”ti vuttaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “deyyadhammova dāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:566_1: Tassā laddhiyāti pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ samodhānaṃ hotīti laddhiyā.
tika-abh05t:567_6: Aparibhutte deyyadhamme puññabhāvato eva hi puthujjanakāle dinnaṃ arahā hutvā paribhuñjante tampi puthujjane dānamevāti nicchitaṃ.
tika-abh05t:567_8: dutiyo pana ujukameva sakavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpetīti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh05t:570_1: Teneva cīvarādidānenāti anumodanaṃ vinā dāyakena pavattitacīvarādidānena.
tika-abh05t:570_3: Iminā kāraṇenāti anumoditattāva tesaṃ tattha bhogā uppajjantīti etena kāraṇena.
tika-abh05t:570_9: somanassaṃ paṭilabheyyunti ekacce aññe pete anumodanādīni katvā yāpente disvā anumodanādīni karonti,
tika-abh05t:570_10: tasmā te ito dinnena yāpentīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:573_2: Na hi so eva tena sampayutto hoti.
tika-abh05t:573_5: āvajjanaṃ purecārikaṃ katvā eva pavattanaketi attho.
tika-abh05t:573_6: Kammūpanissayabhūtamevāti yena kammunā yathāvuttā phassādayo nibbattitā,
tika-abh05t:573_11: Kammāyūhanassa kāraṇabhūtā purimasiddhā taṇhā kammassa upanissayo,
tika-abh05t:573_12: katūpacite kamme bhavādīsu namanavasena pavattā hi vipākassa upanissayo.
tika-abh05t:574_0: 493. Okāsakatuppannaṃ akhepetvā parinibbānabhāvo sakasamayavasena codanāya yujjamānatā.
tika-abh05t:575_1: Kamme satīti iminā kammassa pathavīādīnaṃ paccayatāmattamāha,
tika-abh05t:578_1: Ekārammaṇāti idaṃ anārammaṇatāsādhanavasena sampayogalakkhaṇābhāvassa uddhaṭattā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:583_1: Vipāko vipākassa paccayo honto aññamaññapaccayo hotīti adhippāyenāha “yassa vipākassa vipāko aññamaññapaccayo hotī”ti.
tika-abh05t:583_2: “Tappaccayāpi aññassa vipākassa uppattiṃ sandhāyā”tiādivacanato pana jātijarāmaraṇādīnaṃ upanissayapaccayoti sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-abh05t:583_4: Imassa codanassāti “vipāko ca vipākadhammadhammo cā”tiādinā pavattassa codanassa.
tika-abh05t:588_0: 503-504. Vaṇṇā eva nīlādivasena nibhātīti vaṇṇanibhā, vaṇṇāyatananti attho. Saṇṭhānaṃ dīghādi.
tika-abh05t:591_2: Nivārakaṭṭhānāni bhinditvā ca ākāsena ca gamanato.
tika-abh05t:591_3: Yadi so bhavānaṃ antarā na siyāti so antarābhavo kāmabhavādīnaṃ bhavānaṃ antare yadi na bhaveyya.
tika-abh05t:591_4: Na nāma antarābhavoti “sabbena sabbaṃ natthi nāma antarābhavo”ti evaṃ pavattassa sakavādivacanassa paṭikkhepe kāraṇaṃ natthi,
tika-abh05t:591_5: tassa paṭikkhepe kāraṇaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā na paṭikkhipati,
tika-abh05t:591_6: atha kho tathā anicchanto kevalaṃ laddhiyā paṭikkhipatīti attho.
tika-abh05t:593_1: Evaṃ taṃ tattha na icchatīti kāmabhavādīsu viya taṃ cutipaṭisandhiparamparaṃ tattha antarābhavāvatthāya na icchati.
tika-abh05t:593_2: So hi tassa bhāvibhavanibbattakakammato eva pavattiṃ icchati,
tika-abh05t:593_5: Ye “appakena kālena sattāheneva vā paṭisandhiṃ pāpuṇātī”ti vadanti,
tika-abh05t:593_6: ye pana “tattheva cavitvā āyātīti sattasattāhānī”ti vadanti,
tika-abh05t:593_7: tehi anuññātāva cutipaṭisandhiparamparāti te adhunātanā daṭṭhabbā pāḷiyaṃ “antarābhave sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
tika-abh05t:593_11: Tathā hi te vadanti “uddhaṃpādo tu nārako”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:593_12: Tattha yaṃ nissāya paravādī antarābhavaṃ nāma parikappeti,
tika-abh05t:593_13: taṃ dassetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “antarāparinibbāyīti suttapadaṃ ayoniso gahetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:593_14: Imassa hi “avihādīsu tattha tattha āyuvemajjhaṃ anatikkamitvā antarā aggamaggādhigamena anavasesakilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyati,
tika-abh05t:594_1: So hi sambhavaṃ upapattiṃ esatīti sambhavesī”ti vadanti,
tika-abh05t:594_2: tepi ye bhūtāva na puna bhavissanti,
tika-abh05t:594_3: te khīṇāsavā “bhūtānaṃ vā sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā”ti ettha “bhūtā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh05t:594_6: Catūsu vā yonīsu aṇḍajajalābujā sattā yāva aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca na bhindanti,
tika-abh05t:594_8: aṇḍakosato vatthikosato ca nikkhantā bhūtā nāma.
tika-abh05t:594_14: tato paraṃ bhūtā nāmāti evaṃ ujuke pāḷianugate atthe sati kiṃ aniddhāritassa patthiyena antarābhavena
tika-abh05t:595_0: Yaṃ paneke “santānavasena pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ avicchedena desantaresu pātubhāvo diṭṭho.
tika-abh05t:595_2: evaṃ saviññāṇakasantānepi avicchedena desantare pātubhāvena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:595_5: tehi iddhimato cetovasippattassa cittānugatikaṃ kāyaṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa khaṇena brahmalokato idhūpasaṅkamane ito vā brahmalokūpagamane yutti vattabbā.
tika-abh05t:595_6: Yadi sabbattheva vicchinnadese dhammānaṃ pavatti na icchitā,
tika-abh05t:595_13: Tathā hi mukhaghosādīhi paccayehi aññasmiṃ dese ādāsapabbatapadesādike paṭibimbapaṭighosādikaṃ nibbattamānaṃ diṭṭhanti.
tika-abh05t:596_1: paṭibimbaṃ tāva asiddhattā asadisattā ca na nidassanaṃ.
tika-abh05t:596_2: Paṭibimbañhi nāma aññadeva rūpantaraṃ uppajjatīti asiddhametaṃ.
tika-abh05t:596_3: Siddhiyampi asadisattā na nidassanaṃ siyā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne dvinnaṃ sahaṭhānābhāvato.
tika-abh05t:596_5: na ca ekasmiṃ dese rūpadvayassa sahabhāvo yutto nissayabhūtadesato,
tika-abh05t:596_7: Na hi mukhassa paṭibimbasandhānabhūtaṃ ādāsasandhānasambandhattā sandhānaṃ uddissa avicchedena desantare pātubhāvo vuccati,
tika-abh05t:597_0: Tattha yaṃ vuttaṃ “paṭibimbaṃ nāma aññadeva rūpantaraṃ uppajjatīti asiddhaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne dvinnaṃ sahaṭhānabhāvato”ti,
tika-abh05t:597_3: Yathā anekesaṃ maṇidīpādīnaṃ pabhārūpaṃ ekasmiṃ padese pavattamānaṃ acchitamānatāya nirantaratāya ca abhinnaṭṭhānaṃ viya paññāyati,
tika-abh05t:597_7: Tādisapaccayasamavāyena hi tattha taṃ uppajjati ceva vigacchati ca,
tika-abh05t:597_10: cakkhuviññāṇassa vā na gocaro viya siyā.
tika-abh05t:597_13: Acinteyyo hi dhammānaṃ sāmatthiyabhedoti vadantenapi ayamevattho sādhito bhinnanissayassapi abhinnaṭṭhānassa viya upaṭṭhānato.
tika-abh05t:598_0: Siddhe ca paṭibimbarūpe tassa nidassanabhāvo siddhoyeva hoti hetuphalānaṃ vicchinnadesatāvibhāvanato.
tika-abh05t:598_3: Na hi nidassanaṃ nāma nidassitabbena sabbadā sadisameva hoti.
tika-abh05t:598_4: Cutikkhandhādhānato vicchinnadese upapattikkhandhā pātubhavantīti etassa atthassa sādhanatthaṃ mukharūpato
tika-abh05t:598_5: vicchinne ṭhāne tassa phalabhūtaṃ paṭibimbarūpaṃ nibbattatīti ettha tassa nidassanatthassa adhippetattā.
tika-abh05t:599_3: Yathāvuttadvīhikāraṇehi paṭibimbaṃ uppajjati bimbato ādāsato ca,
tika-abh05t:600_1: yadi “dhammānaṃ vicchinnadesuppatti na yuttā”ti antarābhavo parikappito,
tika-abh05t:600_2: rāhuādīnaṃ sarīre kathamanekayojanasahassantarikesu pādaṭṭhānahadayaṭṭhānesu kāyaviññāṇamanoviññāṇuppatti vicchinnadese yuttā.
tika-abh05t:600_5: Na cettha arūpadhammabhāvato alaṃ parihārāya pañcavokāre rūpārūpadhammānaṃ aññamaññaṃ sambandhattā.
tika-abh05t:600_6: Vattamānehi tāva paccayehi vicchinnadese phalassa uppatti siddhā,
tika-abh05t:600_9: tatthassa nissayabhūtassa vatthussa sahabhāvīnañca khandhānaṃ sambhavoti laddhokāsena kammunā nibbattiyamānassa
tika-abh05t:600_10: avasesapaccayantarasahitassa vipākaviññāṇassa uppattiyaṃ nālaṃ vicchinnadesatā vibandhāya.
tika-abh05t:600_11: Yathā ca anekakappasahassantarikāpi cutikkhandhā upapattikkhandhānaṃ anantarapaccayoti na kāladūratā,
tika-abh05t:600_12: evaṃ anekayojanasahassantarikāpi te tesaṃ anantarapaccayo hontīti na desadūratā.
tika-abh05t:600_13: Evaṃ cutikkhandhanirodhānantaraṃ upapattiṭṭhāne paccayantarasamavāyena paṭisandhikkhandhā pātubhavantīti nattheva antarābhavo.
tika-abh05t:600_14: Asati ca tasmiṃ yaṃ tassa keci “bhāvibhavanibbattakakammuno tato eva bhāvipurimakālabhavākāro sajātisuddhadibbacakkhugocaro
tika-abh05t:600_15: ahīnindriyo kenaci appaṭihatagamano gandhāhāro”ti evamādikāraṇākārādiṃ vaṇṇenti,
tika-abh05t:603_2: Tesampi hi ālambanatthikatālakkhaṇassa kattukamyatāchandassa vasena siyā kamanaṭṭhatāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:603_3: Dhātukathāyaṃ “kāmabhavo pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahi āyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahito.
tika-abh05t:603_5: Na kehici khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahito”ti āgatattā āha “upādinnakkhandhānameva kāmabhavabhāvo dhātukathāyaṃ dassito”ti.
tika-abh05t:603_7: tadaññagaṇananivattanatthoti “pañca kāmaguṇā”ti vacanaṃ tato aññesaṃ tabbhāvaṃ nivattetīti āha “pañceva kāmakoṭṭhāsā kāmoti vuttā”ti.
tika-abh05t:603_8: Tato eva kāmadhātūti vacanaṃ na aññassa nāmaṃ,
tika-abh05t:603_11: Evaṃ vacanamattanti evaṃ “pañcime kāmaguṇā”ti vacanamattaṃ nissāya,
tika-abh05t:606_6: bhavassa āgataṭṭhāne dhātuyā paricchinditabba”nti hi vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:606_7: tasmā kāmarūpārūpāvacaradhammāva taṃtaṃbhummabhāvena paricchinnā evaṃ vuttā.
tika-abh05t:609_0: 517-518. Purimakathāyanti rūpadhātukathāyaṃ. Avisesenāti pavattiṭṭhānavasena visesaṃ akatvā.
tika-abh05t:615_1: Nissaraṇaṃ nāma nissaritabbe sati hoti, na asati,
tika-abh05t:618_1: Pakappayamānāti pakārehi kappayamānā attano sampayuttānañca kiccaṃ samatthayamānā.
tika-abh05t:621_1: Antaṃ gahetvā vadatīti “atthi arūpadhammānaṃ āyu ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā iriyanā vattanā pālanā,
tika-abh05t:621_2: atthi arūpajīvitindriya”nti tasmiṃ pañhe “atthi arūpajīvitindriya”nti imaṃ antaṃ pariyosānaṃ gahetvā vadati.
tika-abh05t:621_3: Vattuṃ yutto samudāyassa icchanto tadavayavassa icchatīti.
tika-abh05t:621_4: Na hi avayavehi vinā samudāyo nāma atthi.
tika-abh05t:624_0: 544-545. So yutto dvinnaṃ rūpārūpajīvitindriyānaṃ sakasamaye icchitattā.
tika-abh05t:627_1: “Pāṇātipātakammassa hetū”tiādikassa parihānikathāyaṃ anāgatattā yo tattha āgatanayo,
tika-abh05t:632_1: Daṭṭhabbassa ādīnavato ānisaṃsato ca yadipi paravādinā pacchā nānācittavasena paṭiññātaṃ,
tika-abh05t:632_10: Ñāṇaṃ vipassanā paṭivedhañāṇassa viya anubodhañāṇassapi yathārahaṃ pavattinivattīsu kiccakaraṇaṃ yuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:635_4: dhammaṃ desessāmi anāsavagāminiñca paṭipada”ntiādīni suttapadāni saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh05t:638_2: “Rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”tiādīsu olubbhaṭṭhoti āha “paccayaṭṭho olubbhaṭṭho”ti.
tika-abh05t:638_3: Evaṃ vibhāge vijjamāneti tattha paccayāyattavuttitā paccayaṭṭho,
tika-abh05t:638_4: daṇḍarajjuādi viya dubbalassa cittacetasikānaṃ ālambitabbatāya upatthambhanaṭṭho olubbhaṭṭho.
tika-abh05t:641_1: “Imasmiṃ satī”ti iminā maggena aniruddhatāpi saṅgahitāti āha “appahīnattāva atthīti vuccatī”ti.
tika-abh05t:641_2: Na pana vijjamānattāti avadhāraṇena nivattitaṃ dasseti,
tika-abh05t:644_1: Yassa adhigatattā arahato pariññeyyādīsu anavasesato sammoho vigato,
tika-abh05t:644_3: Yasmā tassa sabbassa satokāritā viya sampajānakāritā,
tika-abh05t:647_0: 562. Dvīhipīti dvīhi visesehi, visesena visesaṃ akatvāti attho.
tika-abh05t:650_2: so pana pakāro pavattiṭṭhānakālavasena gahetabboti āha “sabbattha sabbadā vā”ti.
tika-abh05t:650_3: Te ca ṭhānakālā “vitakkayato”tiādivacanato cittavisesavasena gahetabbāti vuttaṃ “savitakkacittesū”ti.
tika-abh05t:650_4: “Vitakketvā vācaṃ bhindatī”ti suttapadaṃ ayoniso gahetvā “vitakkavipphāramattaṃ saddo”ti āha.

tika-abh05t:858_7: Yathā hi iddhimanto cetovasippattā mahāmoggallānādayo nerayike anukampantā iddhibalena nirayabhūmiṃ upagatā tattha dāhadukkhena na bādhīyanti,
tika-abh05t:859_2: Tathārūpena hi kammunā te nibbattā yathā nirayadukkhena abādhitā eva hutvā nerayike yātenti,
tika-abh05t:859_3: na cettakena bāhiravisayābhāvo vijjati iṭṭhāniṭṭhatāya paccekaṃ dvārapurisesu vibhattasabhāvattā.
tika-abh05t:859_4: Tathā hi ekaccassa dvārassa purisassa iṭṭhaṃ ekaccassa aniṭṭhaṃ,
tika-abh05t:859_5: ekaccassa ca aniṭṭhaṃ ekaccassa iṭṭhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh05t:859_6: Evañca katvā yadeke vadanti “natthi kammavasena tejasā parūpatāpana”ntiādi,
tika-abh05t:859_8: Yaṃ pana vadanti “anerayikānaṃ tesaṃ kathaṃ tattha sambhavo”ti nerayikānaṃ yātakabhāvato.
tika-abh05t:859_9: Nerayikasattayātanāyoggañhi attabhāvaṃ nibbattentaṃ kammaṃ tādisanikantivināmitaṃ nirayaṭṭhāneyeva nibbatteti.
tika-abh05t:859_10: Te ca nerayikehi adhikatarabalārohapariṇāhā ativiya bhayānakasantāsakurūratarapayogā ca honti.
tika-abh05t:859_11: Eteneva tattha kākasunakhādīnampi nibbatti saṃvaṇṇitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:860_0: Kathamaññagatikehi aññagatikabādhananti ca na vattabbaṃ aññatthāpi tathā dassanato.
tika-abh05t:860_1: Yaṃ paneke vadanti “asattasabhāvā nirayapālā nirayasunakhādayo cā”ti,
tika-abh05t:860_2: taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ aññattha tathā adassanato.
tika-abh05t:860_3: Na hi kāci atthi tādisī dhammappavatti,
tika-abh05t:860_5: sampatisattehi appayojitā ca atthakiccaṃ sādhentī diṭṭhapubbā.
tika-abh05t:860_6: Petānaṃ pānīyanivārakānaṃ daṇḍādihatthapurisānampi asattabhāve visesakāraṇaṃ natthi.
tika-abh05t:860_8: Tathā hi supine āhārūpabhogādinā na atthasiddhi atthi,
tika-abh05t:860_10: Idhāpi kammavipākassa acinteyyabhāvatoti ce? Taṃ na,
tika-abh05t:860_13: vuttanayena pana nesaṃ sattabhāvo eva siddho.
tika-abh05t:860_14: Sakkā hi vattuṃ sattasaṅkhātā nirayapālasaññitā dhammappavatti sābhisandhikā parūpaghāti atthakiccasabbhāvato ojāhārādirakkhasasantati viyāti.
tika-abh05t:860_15: Abhisandhipubbakatā cettha na sakkā paṭikkhipituṃ tathā tathā abhisandhiyā yātanato,
tika-abh05t:860_17: Ye pana vadanti “bhūtavisesā eva te vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivisesavanto bheravākārā narakapālāti samaññaṃ labhantī”ti,
tika-abh05t:860_19: Ujukameva pāḷiyaṃ “atthi niraye nirayapālā”ti vādassa patiṭṭhāpitattā.
tika-abh05t:861_0: Apica yathā ariyavinaye narakapālānaṃ bhūtamattatā asiddhā,
tika-abh05t:861_2: Na hi tassa bhūtāni nāma santi.
tika-abh05t:861_8: asatipi bāhire visaye narake viya desādiniyamo hotīti vādo na sijjhati evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:864_2: Tahiṃ kīḷanakāle hatthivaṇṇena vikubbanaṃ sandhāya “hatthināgassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:864_4: Na hi ekantasukhappaccayaṭṭhāne sagge dukkhādhiṭṭhānassa akusalakammasamuṭṭhānassa attabhāvassa sambhavo yutto.
tika-abh05t:867_1: “Dvādasavatthukaṃ ñāṇaṃ lokuttara”nti ettha dvādasavatthukassa ñāṇassa lokuttaratā patiṭṭhāpīyatīti dassento
tika-abh05t:867_2: paṭhamavikappaṃ vatvā puna lokuttarañāṇassa dvādasavatthukatā patiṭṭhāpīyatīti dassetuṃ “taṃ vā…pe…
tika-abh05t:867_9: “Pariññeyyaṃ pariññāta”ntiādinā parijānanādikiriyāya nibbattetabbatā nibbattitatā ca dassitā,
tika-abh05t:867_17: Parijānanādikiccasādhanavasena hoti asammohato visayato cāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:873_1: Samudāyāti “sāsanaṃ navaṃ kata”ntiādinā pucchāvasena pavattā vacanasamudāyā.
tika-abh05t:879_1: Rūpasabhāvo rūpaṭṭhoti āha “rūpaṭṭho nāma koci rūpato añño natthī”ti.
tika-abh05t:879_3: na taṃ taṃsabhāvanti āha “rūpaṭṭhato aññaṃ rūpañca na hotī”ti,
tika-abh05t:879_6: Tasmāti yasmā rūpato añño rūpaṭṭho natthi,
tika-abh05t:879_11: Aññathāti tesaṃ aññatte rūpaṭṭhena niyamena rūpaṃ niyatanti vattabbanti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:879_13: Na hi abhinne vatthusmiṃ pariyāyantarabhedaṃ karoti.
tika-abh05t:879_22: Tañca vacananti “rūpaṃ rūpaṭṭhena na niyata”nti vacanaṃ.
tika-abh05t:880_2: Parena coditanti “na vattabbaṃ rūpaṃ rūpaṭṭhena niyata”ntiādinā paravādino codanaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-abh05t:880_3: Tameva kāraṇaṃ dassetvāti tameva yathāvuttaṃ yuttiṃ “ettha hī”tiādinā dassetvā.
tika-abh05t:880_4: Codanaṃ nivattetīti “atha kasmā paṭijānātī”ti vuttaṃ codanaṃ nivatteti.
tika-abh05t:891_5: Taṃ abhiññānibbattaṃ maññatīti nidassanaṃ katvā dassento āha “ākāsagamanādiabhiññā viyā”ti.
tika-abh05t:891_6: Heṭṭhimānaṃ catunnaṃ vā maggānaṃ adhigamena dhammābhisamayo aggaphalādhigamena arahattappatti ca supine atthīti maññatīti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:894_1: Bījaṃ catumadhurabhāvaṃ na gaṇhātīti idaṃ sakasamayavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:894_2: parasamaye pana rūpadhammāpi arūpadhammehi samānakkhaṇā eva icchitā.
tika-abh05t:894_4: Khaṇikattepi vā acetanesupi anindriyabaddharūpesu bhāvanāviseso labbhati,
tika-abh05t:894_5: kimaṅgaṃ pana sacetanesūti dassetuṃ “yathā bījaṃ catumadhurabhāvaṃ na gaṇhātī”ti nidassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:894_6: Āsevento nāma koci dhammo natthi ittaratāya anavaṭṭhānatoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:894_8: Kusalādibhāvena hi attasadisassa payogena karaṇīyassa punappunaṃ karaṇappavattanaṃ attasadisatāpādanaṃ
tika-abh05t:894_9: vāsanaṃ vā āsevanaṃ pure paricitagantho viya pacchimassāti.
tika-abh05t:897_2: Tattha hi kesuci purimuppannesu ṭhitesu kesañci tadaññesaṃ uppādo,
tika-abh05t:897_3: tato purimantaruppannānaṃ kesañci nirodho hoti ekekakalāparūpesu samānuppādanirodhattā tesaṃ.
tika-abh05t:897_4: Evaṃ patiṭṭhānanti evaṃ vuttappakārena asamānuppādanirodhena pabandhena patiṭṭhānapavattīti attho.
tika-abh05t:897_5: Sā panāyaṃ yathāvuttā pavatti kasmā rūpasantatiyā evāti āha “na hi rūpāna”ntiādi.
tika-abh05t:897_8: tathā sati arūpasantatiyā viya rūpasantatiyāpi anantarādipaccayena vidhinā pavatti siyā,
tika-abh05t:902_3: puthujjanassa pana sachandarāgaparibhogabhāvato āha “rāgādhippāyato aññādhippāyovāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-abh05t:902_7: Ayañca nayo itthiyā jīvitarakkhaṇatthaṃ kāruññena manorathaṃ pūrentassa bodhisattassa saṃvaravināso na hotīti evaṃvādinaṃ paravādiṃ sandhāya vutto,
tika-abh05t:902_8: paṇidhānādhippāyavādinaṃ pana sandhāya “eko adhippāyoti etthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:905_6: Micchādiṭṭhiyā karīyatīti micchābhiniveseneva yā kāci dukkarakārikā karīyatīti attho.
tika-abh05t:908_1: Mettādayo viyāti yathā mettā karuṇā muditā ca sinehasabhāvāpi arañjanasabhāvattā asaṃkiliṭṭhattā ca na rāgo,
tika-abh05t:908_2: evaṃ rāgapatirūpako koci dhammo natthi ṭhapetvā mettādayo,
tika-abh05t:908_5: Evaṃ dosepīti ettha issādayo viya na doso dosapatirūpako koci atthīti dosameva gaṇhātīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:908_6: Ṭhapetvā hi issādayo aññacittassa dussanākāro dosasseva pavattiākāroti.
tika-abh05t:911_1: Aniccādiko bhāvoti aniccasaṅkhārapaṭiccasamuppannatādiko bhāvo dhammo pakati etassāti attho.
tika-abh05t:911_3: na dukkhatāmatta”nti ayamattho viññāyati “na kevalañhi paṭhamasaccameva dukkha”nti vacanena.
tika-abh05t:911_4: Tathā sati paravādinā cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ aññesañca taṃsarikkhakānaṃ dhammānaṃ parinipphannatā nānujānitabbā siyā. Kasmā?
tika-abh05t:911_9: itaraṃ saṅkhāradukkhatāya dukkhanti imamatthaṃ dassento “na kevalañhī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:911_10: Tattha na hi anupādinnānīti iminā cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ samudayasaccena saṅgahābhāvamāha.
tika-abh05t:911_17: Tathā ceva taṃ amhehi tattha tattha vibhāvitaṃ.
tika-abh05t:911_20: etaṃ no vata re vattabbe. Kasmā?
tika-abh05t:918_3: Aviparītato gahitesu dhammesu mūlayamakādivasena pavattiyamānā desanā veneyyānaṃ nānappakārakosallāvahā pariññākiccasādhanī ca hoti,
tika-abh05t:918_11: tassa vedanākkhandho uppajjatī”tiādinā puggalaṃ “yattha rūpakkhandho uppajjati,
tika-abh05t:918_12: tattha vedanākkhandho uppajjatī”tiādinā okāsaṃ nissāya ārabbha pavattānaṃ. Ādi-
tika-abh05t:919_0: Kāmañcettha dhammapaṭiggāhakānaṃ saṃsayapubbakaṃ sanniṭṭhānanti paṭhamaṃ saṃsayo vattabbo,
tika-abh05t:919_1: desentassa pana bhagavato sanniṭṭhānapubbako saṃsayoti dassanatthaṃ ayaṃ padānukkamo kato.
tika-abh05t:919_2: Sabbañhi pariññeyyaṃ hatthāmalakaṃ viya paccakkhaṃ katvā ṭhitassa dhammasāmino na katthaci saṃsayo,
tika-abh05t:919_3: vissajjetukāmatāya pana vineyyajjhāsayagataṃ saṃsayaṃ dassento saṃsayitavasena pucchaṃ karotīti evaṃ
tika-abh05t:919_4: vissajjanapucchanavasena na sanniṭṭhānasaṃsayā labbhantīti ayamattho dassito,
tika-abh05t:920_4: kusalākusalamūlādiyamakākārena desanāti vibhāgato “saṅkhepenevā”tiādigāthāhi vibhāvitā nimittena saddhiṃ
tika-abh05t:920_7: yadidaṃ kamānuppatti āgatabhāravāhitā ca paṇḍitānaṃ paṇḍitakiccabhāvato.
tika-abh05t:921_1: Yamanaṃ uparamananti yamo maraṇanti āha “jātiyā sati maraṇaṃ hotīti…pe…
tika-abh05t:921_3: Tattha yathā “jātiyā sati maraṇaṃ hotī”ti jāti yamassa visayo,
tika-abh05t:921_4: evaṃ “upādānakkhandhesu santesu maraṇaṃ hotī”ti upādānakkhandhā yamassa visayoti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:921_6: Anuppattamaraṇaṃyeva kibbisakārinaṃ puggalaṃ yamapurisā vividhā kammakāraṇā karonti,
tika-abh05t:921_7: na appattamaraṇanti maraṇaṃ yamassa visayo vutto.
tika-abh05t:921_13: tena vā saddhiṃ pañca verāni cha abhabbaṭṭhānāni.
tika-abh05t:925_2: Mūlayamakādayo hi pakaraṇāpekkhāya avayavabhūtāpi niccāvayavāpekkhāya yamakasamūhoti vutto.
tika-abh05t:926_1: tathā paṭhamapucchāya vuttānaṃ kusalamūlasaṅkhātānaṃ visesānaṃ atthayamakabhāvassa vuttattāti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:926_2: Yathā hi paṭhamapucchāya visesavantabhāvena vuttāyeva kusaladhammā dutiyapucchāyaṃ visesabhāvena vuttā,
tika-abh05t:926_3: evaṃ paṭhamapucchāyaṃ visesabhāvena vuttāyeva kusalamūladhammā dutiyapucchāyaṃ visesavantabhāvena vuttā.
tika-abh05t:926_6: Ettha ca visesavantāpekkhavisesavasena paṭhamo atthavikappo vutto,
tika-abh05t:927_0: Tattha ñātuṃ icchitānanti pucchāya visayabhūtānanti attho.
tika-abh05t:927_6: Padhānabhāvoti paṭhamavikappe tāva saṃsayitappadhānattā pucchāya visesānaṃ padhānabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-abh05t:927_8: Dutiyavikappe pana visesā nāma visesavantādhīnāti visesavantānaṃ tattha padhānabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh05t:927_9: Dvinnaṃ pana ekajjhaṃ padhānabhāvo na yujjati.
tika-abh05t:927_10: Sati hi appadhāne padhānaṃ nāma siyā.
tika-abh05t:927_11: Tenāha “ekekāya pucchāya ekeko eva attho saṅgahito hotī”ti.
tika-abh05t:927_13: aññathā vinicchitavisesitabbabhāvehi idha padhānabhāvo na yujjatevāti.
tika-abh05t:928_2: samuccayo ca tulyayoge siyā. Kiṃ nāma-
tika-abh05t:928_3: padena anavasesato kusalādīnaṃ saṅgahoti āsaṅkāya tadāsaṅkānivattanatthamāha “tīṇipi…pe…
tika-abh05t:928_7: Tena nivattitaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ “na niravasesasaṅgāhakatta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:928_11: na nāmaṃyeva kusalādīti imameva ca niyamaṃ sandhāyāha “kusalādīnaṃ saṅgāhakattamattameva sandhāya vutta”nti.
tika-abh05t:928_15: tadatthameva ca taṃ gahitanti nāmassa kusalattikapariyāpannatā vuttāti dassento āha “kusalādi…pe…
tika-abh05t:931_2: Evamidhāpīti yathā ekamūlayamake “ye keci kusalā”icceva pucchā āraddhā,
tika-abh05t:931_3: evaṃ idhāpi aññamaññamūlayamakepi “ye keci kusalā”icceva pucchā ārabhitabbā siyā. Kasmā?
tika-abh05t:931_9: Te hi yathā paṭhamadutiyayamakesu purimapucchā eva parivattanavasena pacchimapucchā katāti pacchimapucchāya
tika-abh05t:931_13: Yadi tatthāpi dvīhipi pucchāhi sadisāhi bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t:931_15: pacchimapucchā vā “sabbe te dhammā kusalamūlena ekamūlā”ti vattabbā siyā.
tika-abh05t:931_16: Evaṃ pana avatvā paṭhamadutiyayamakesu viya purimapacchimapucchā sadisā akatvā tatiyayamake tāsaṃ visadisatā “ye keci kusalā”ti anāraddhattā,
tika-abh05t:931_17: tasmā paṭilomapucchānurūpāya anulomapucchāya bhavitabbanti imamatthaṃ sandhāya “ye keci kusalāti apucchitvā”ti vuttanti vadanti.
tika-abh05t:932_1: Tadanurūpāyāti tassā purimapucchāya atthato byañjanato ca anucchavikāya.
tika-abh05t:932_4: Yasmā anulome saṃsayacchede jātepi paṭilome saṃsayo uppajjati,
tika-abh05t:932_9: tāya ca anurūpatāya atthādivasena dvinnaṃ padānaṃ sambandhattā atthādiyamakatā vuttā.
tika-abh05t:932_10: Desanākkamato cettha anulomapaṭilomatā veditabbā “kusalā kusalamūlā”ti vatvā “kusalamūlā kusalā”ti ca vuttattā.
tika-abh05t:932_15: te nicchayādhiṭṭhāne katvā dassento “ye keci kusalā dhammā”ti vatvā tesu yasmiṃ viseso saṃsayādhiṭṭhāno,
tika-abh05t:932_17: Dutiyapucchāyaṃ pana tappaṭilomato yena visesena te visesavanto,
tika-abh05t:932_18: taṃ visesaṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā dassento “ye vā pana kusalamūlā”ti vatvā te visesavante saṃsayādhiṭṭhānabhūte
tika-abh05t:932_19: dassetuṃ “sabbe te dhammā kusalā”ti pucchā katā.
tika-abh05t:933_0: Imināpi byañjanenāti “ye keci kusalamūlena ekamūlā”ti imināpi vākyena.
tika-abh05t:933_1: Evaṃ na sakkā vattunti yenādhippāyena vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:933_3: Tattha tenevāti kusalabyañjanatthassa kusalamūlena ekamūlabyañjanatthassa bhinnattā eva.
tika-abh05t:933_8: Etthāti “imināpi byañjanena tassevatthassa sambhavato”ti etasmiṃ vacane.
tika-abh05t:933_10: sambhavatoti etena kusalānaṃ kusalamūlena ekamūlatāya byabhicārābhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh05t:933_12: Vuttabyañjanatthasseva sambhavatoti hi iminā avuttabyañjanatthassa sambhavābhāvavacanena svāyamadhippāyamattho vibhāvito.
tika-abh05t:933_13: Yathā hi kusalamūlena ekamūlabyañjanattho kusalabyañjanatthaṃ byabhicarati,
tika-abh05t:933_17: Kusalamūlena ekamūlā kusalā evāti codanā katā,
tika-abh05t:933_18: kusalamūlena ekamūlā eva kusalāti pana parihāro pavattoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:933_19: Dutiyayamake viya apucchitvāti “ye keci kusalā”ti apucchitvā.
tika-abh05t:934_2: Tena “kusalamūlāni ekamūlāni ceva aññamaññamūlāni cā”tiādipāḷisesaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh05t:934_3: Yaṃ sandhāya “heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva vissajjanaṃ kātabbaṃ bhaveyyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:934_8: anulomapucchāyaṃ viya vissajjanaṃ kātabbaṃ bhaveyyāti iminā pakārenāti attho.
tika-abh05t:934_11: Tattha “āmantā”icceva vissajjanena bhavitabbanti “sabbe te dhammā kusalā”ti pucchāyaṃ viya “sabbe te
tika-abh05t:934_12: dhammā kusalamūlena ekamūlā”ti pucchitepi paṭivacanavissajjanameva labbhati,
tika-abh05t:934_13: na anulomapucchāyaṃ viya sarūpadassanavissajjanaṃ vibhajitvā dassetabbassa abhāvato.
tika-abh05t:935_0: Tattha yenāti yena aññamaññamūlesu ekamūlassa abhāvena.
tika-abh05t:935_3: Dvinnaṃ dvinnañhi ekekena aññamaññamūlakatte vutte tesaṃ ekekena ekamūlakattampi vuttameva hoti samānattho ekasaddoti katvā.
tika-abh05t:935_7: dvīsupi ekekena itarassa ekamūlakattaṃ sambhavati evāti.
tika-abh05t:935_10: te kusalamūlena ekamūlā”ti imamatthaṃ vibhāventena idha “āmantā”ti padena yattha dve mūlāni uppajjanti,
tika-abh05t:935_11: tattha ekekena itarassa ekamūlakattaṃ pakāsitamevāti āha “āmantāti imināva vissajjanena taṃgahaṇanivāraṇato”ti.
tika-abh05t:935_12: Nicchitattāti ettha ekato uppajjamānānaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ tāva mūlānaṃ nicchitaṃ hotu aññamaññekamūlakattaṃ,
tika-abh05t:935_14: Samānamūlatā evāti avadhāraṇena nivattitatthaṃ dassetuṃ “na aññamaññasamānamūlatā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:935_17: Dvinnaṃ mūlānanti dvinnaṃ ekamūlānaṃ ekato uppajjamānānaṃ.
tika-abh05t:935_20: Taṃmūlehi aññehīti itaramūlehi mūladvayato aññehi sahajātadhammehi.
tika-abh05t:936_0: Idāni yena adhippāyena paṭilome “kusalā”icceva pucchā katā,
tika-abh05t:936_4: Na hi kusalamūlena aññamaññamūlesu kiñci ekamūlaṃ na hotīti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-abh05t:936_14: na paṭilomapucchāyanti ubhayatthāpi taṃ gahetabbaṃ na vā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:936_15: Evañhi mūlekamūlayamakadesanāhi ayaṃ aññamaññayamakadesanā samānarasā siyāti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “tatthā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:937_1: Yadipi ekamūlā aññamaññamūlāti idaṃ padadvayaṃ vuttanayena mūlayuttatameva vadati,
tika-abh05t:937_2: tathāpi sāmaññavisesalakkhaṇe attheva bhedoti dassetuṃ “mūlayogasāmaññe”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:937_3: Samūlakānaṃ samānamūlatā ekamūlattanti ekamūlavacanaṃ tesu avisesato mūlasabbhāvamattaṃ vadati,
tika-abh05t:937_4: na aññamaññamūlasaddo viya mūlesu labbhamānaṃ visesaṃ,
tika-abh05t:937_5: na ca sāmaññe nicchayo visese saṃsayaṃ vidhamatīti imamatthamāha “mūlayogasāmaññe…pe…
tika-abh05t:937_7: Visese pana nicchayo sāmaññe saṃsayaṃ vidhamanto eva pavattatīti āha “mūlayogavisese pana…pe…
tika-abh05t:937_11: sāmaññassa nicchitattā tattha vā saṃsayābhāvatoti attho.
tika-abh05t:937_13: Kusalabhāvadīpakaṃ na hotīti kusalabhāvasseva dīpakaṃ na hoti tadaññajātikassapi dīpanato.
tika-abh05t:937_16: Kusalādhikārassa anuvattamānattāti iminā “sabbe te dhammā kusalā”ti kusalaggahaṇe kāraṇamāha.
tika-abh05t:938_1: Mūlanaye vutte eva attheti mūlanaye vutte eva kusalādidhamme.
tika-abh05t:938_2: Kusalādayo hi sabhāvadhammā idha pāḷiatthatāya atthoti vutto.
tika-abh05t:938_8: Akusalābyākatāpi mūladhammā atthīti kusalamūlabhāvena mūladhammā visesitā.
tika-abh05t:938_9: Mūlaggahaṇena ca mūlavantānaṃ mūlayogo dīpito hoti.
tika-abh05t:938_15: mūlayogadīpanena ca pakāsetuṃ “aññamaññamūlamūlā”ti mūlamūlanayo vuttoti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:939_0: Mūlayogaṃ dīpetunti mūlayogameva padhānaṃ sātisayañca katvā dīpetunti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:939_1: Yathā hi kusalāni mūlāni etesanti kusalamūlakānīti bāhiratthasamāse mūlayogo padhānabhāvena vutto hoti,
tika-abh05t:940_1: Na ekamūlabhāvaṃ labhamānehīti abyākatamūlena na ekamūlakaṃ tathāvattabbataṃ labhamānehi aṭṭhārasaahetukacittuppādāhetukasamuṭṭhānarūpanibbānehi
tika-abh05t:940_3: Yathā hi yathāvuttacittuppādādayo hetupaccayavirahitā ahetukavohāraṃ labhanti,
tika-abh05t:940_7: ahetukamevā”ti vuttattā kiñcāpi sahetukasamuṭṭhānampi rūpaṃ ahetukaṃ,
tika-abh05t:940_9: vipākābyākatā kiriyābyākatā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena
tika-abh05t:940_10: paccayo”ti pana vacanato hetupaccayayogena sahetukasamuṭṭhānassa rūpassa ahetukavohārābhāvo vutto.
tika-abh05t:940_11: Keci pana “abbohārikaṃ katvāti sahetukavohārena abbohārikaṃ katvāti atthaṃ vatvā aññathā ‘ahetukaṃ abyākataṃ
tika-abh05t:940_12: abyākatamūlena ekamūla’nti na sakkā vattu”nti vadanti.
tika-abh05t:941_0: Apare pana bhaṇanti “sahetukacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ ahetukaṃ abyākatanti iminā vacanena saṅgahaṃ gacchantampi
tika-abh05t:941_1: samūlakattā ‘abyākatamūlena na ekamūla’nti na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh05t:941_2: satipi samūlakatte nippariyāyena sahetukaṃ na hotīti ‘abyākatamūlena ekamūla’nti ca na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh05t:941_4: sahetukaṃ abyākataṃ abyākatamūlena ekamūla’nti dvīsupi padesu anavarodhato abbohārikaṃ katvāti vutta”nti,
tika-abh05t:941_5: taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ “sahetukaabyākatasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ abyākatamūlena ekamūlaṃ hotī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tassa ekamūlabhāvassa nicchitattā,
tika-abh05t:942_1: Kusalākusalābyākatarāsito namananāmanasaṅkhātena visesena arūpadhammānaṃ gahaṇaṃ niddhāraṇaṃ nāma hotīti āha “nāmānaṃ niddhāritattā”ti.
tika-abh05t:942_2: Tena tesaṃ adhikabhāvamāha viññāyamānameva pakaraṇena aparicchinnattā.
tika-abh05t:942_3: Yadi evaṃ “ahetukaṃ nāmaṃ sahetukaṃ nāma”nti pāṭhantare kasmā nāmaggahaṇaṃ katanti āha “supākaṭabhāvattha”nti,
tika-abh05t:942_4: paribyattaṃ katvā vutte kiṃ vattabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:948_2: pariññā ca vattabbāti idaṃ padhānabhāvena vattabbadassanaṃ.
tika-abh05t:948_4: sā ca yāvadeva pariññattāti pariññāsu ca na vinā tīraṇapariññāya pahānapariññā,
tika-abh05t:948_5: tīraṇañca sampuṇṇaparānuggahassa adhippetattā kālapuggalokāsavibhāgamukhena khandhānaṃ visuṃ saha ca
tika-abh05t:948_8: pariññā ca vattabbā”ti padhānaṃ vattabbaṃ uddharati.
tika-abh05t:948_9: Tattha pana yathā na tīraṇapariññāya vinā pahānapariññā,
tika-abh05t:948_11: Sā ca sutamayañāṇamūlikāti desanākusalo satthā anvayato byatirekato ca samudāyāvayavapadatthādivibhāgadassanamukhena
tika-abh05t:948_12: khandhesu pariññāppabhedaṃ pakāsetukāmo “pañcakkhandhā”tiādinā desanaṃ ārabhīti dassento “te pana khandhā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:949_3: Yadipi avayavavinimutto paramatthato samudāyo nāma natthi,
tika-abh05t:949_4: yathā pana avayavo samudāyo na hoti,
tika-abh05t:949_5: evaṃ na samudāyopi avayavoti satipi samudāyāvayavānaṃ bhede dvinnaṃ padānaṃ samānādhikaraṇabhāvato atthevābhedoti
tika-abh05t:949_6: padadvayassa samānatthatāya siyā āsaṅkāti āha “etasmiṃ saṃsayaṭṭhāne”ti.
tika-abh05t:949_8: viññāṇakkhandho tajjā manoviññāṇadhātū”tiādīsu ekadeso samudāyapadattho vutto,
tika-abh05t:949_10: ayaṃ vuccati rūpakkhandho”tiādīsu pana sakaloti āha “rūpādi…pe… attho”ti.
tika-abh05t:949_13: Na hi visesanavisesitabbānaṃ atthānaṃ accantaṃ bhedo abhedo vā icchito,
tika-abh05t:949_17: Yo hi ruppanādisaṅkhāto rāsaṭṭho avayavapadehi rūpādisaddehi ca khandhasaddena ca visesanavisesitabbabhāvena bhinditvā vutto,
tika-abh05t:949_18: svāyaṃ atthato rāsibhāvena apekkhito ruppanādiattho evāti.
tika-abh05t:950_0: Yathā avayavapadehi vuccamānopi samudāyapadassa attho hoti,
tika-abh05t:950_1: evaṃ samudāyapadehi vuccamānopi avayavapadassa atthoti “rūpakkhandho rūpañceva rūpakkhandho ca,
tika-abh05t:950_5: Tattha ekaccassa avayavapadassa aññattha vuttiyā avayavapadatthassa samudāyapadatthatāya siyā anekantikatā,
tika-abh05t:950_6: samudāyapadassa pana taṃ natthīti samudāyapadatthassa avayavapadatthatāya byabhicārābhāvo “rūpakkhandho rūpanti?
tika-abh05t:951_2: Rūpāvayavapadena vuttassāti rūpasaṅkhātena avayavapadena visesanabhāvena vuttassa khandhatthassa rūpakkhandhabhāvo hoti.
tika-abh05t:951_6: Padhānabhūtena visesitabbattā khandhāvayavapadena vuttassa ruppanaṭṭhassa kiṃ vedanākkhandhādibhāvo hotīti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:951_7: Samāne avayavapadābhidheyyabhāve appadhānena padena yo attho viññāyati,
tika-abh05t:951_8: so kasmā padhānena na viññāyatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:951_15: Rūparūpakkhandhādiavayavasamudāyapadasodhanamukhena tattha ca catukkhandhavasena pavattā pāḷigati padasodhanamūlacakkavāro.
tika-abh05t:951_16: Evañca dassentenāti iminā yvāyaṃ rūpādiavayavapadehi rūpakkhandhādisamudāyapadehi ca dassitākāro atthaviseso,
tika-abh05t:952_4: Yathā nīluppalapade uppalavisesanabhūtaṃ nīlaṃ visiṭṭhameva hoti,
tika-abh05t:952_6: evamidhāpi khandhavisesanabhūtaṃ rūpampi visiṭṭhameva siyāti dassento “kiṃ khandhato…pe…
tika-abh05t:952_8: Tathā “rūpañca taṃ khandho cā”ti samānādhikaraṇabhāveneva yaṃ rūpaṃ,
tika-abh05t:952_11: taṃ rūpanti ayampi āpanno evāti āha “sabbeva…pe…
tika-abh05t:952_13: Visesanena ca nāma niddhāritarūpena bhavitabbaṃ avacchedakattā,
tika-abh05t:952_18: Na khandhato aññaṃ rūpaṃ atthīti idaṃ ruppanaṭṭho rūpanti katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:952_22: dassentenappaka”nti ca ādīsu atadatthassa rūpasaddassa labbhamānattā “tena rūpasaddenā”ti visesetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:952_31: Yadipi yathāvuttaṃ rūpaṃ khandho eva ca,
tika-abh05t:952_32: khandho pana na rūpamevāti āha “na ca sabbe…pe…
tika-abh05t:952_36: Vibhajitabbāti “khandhā rūpakkhandho”ti padaṃ uddharitvā “rūpakkhandho khandho ceva rūpakkhandho ca,
tika-abh05t:952_37: avasesā khandhā na rūpakkhandho”tiādinā vibhāgena dassetabbā.
tika-abh05t:953_1: saṃsayo hotīti ettha kiṃ khandhato aññāpi vedanā atthi,
tika-abh05t:953_3: sabbe ca khandhā kiṃ khandhavisesanabhūtāya vedanāya visesitabbāti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
tika-abh05t:954_0: Ettha ca rūpādipaṇṇatti khandhapaṇṇatti ca “rūpaṃ khandho,
tika-abh05t:954_1: khandhā rūpakkhandho”tiādinā visuṃ saha ca ruppanādike atthe pavattamānā kadāci avayavabhūte pavattati,
tika-abh05t:954_3: tassā pana tathā pavattanākāre niddhārite yasmā rūpādikkhandhā padato atthato ca visodhitā nāma honti tabbisayakaṅkhāpanodanato,
tika-abh05t:954_6: Āmantā”tiādinayappavattena paṭhamavārena rūpādiavayavapadehi avayavattho viya samudāyatthopi vuccati,
tika-abh05t:954_9: khandhā vedanākkhandho”tiādinayappavattena pana dutiyavārena visesavācī viya rūpādiavayavapadehi sāmaññabhūtenapi
tika-abh05t:954_10: taṃtaṃvisiṭṭhena khandhāvayavapadena so so eva samudāyattho vuccati,
tika-abh05t:954_12: Khandhavinimuttassa yathādhippetassa abhāvā yadipi khandhoyeva rūpaṃ,
tika-abh05t:954_18: khandhā vedanākkhandho”tiādinayappavattena pana catutthavārena “rūpaṃ khandho”ti rūpassa khandhabhāve nicchite khandho nāmāyaṃ na kevalaṃ rūpameva,
tika-abh05t:954_19: atha kho vedanādi cāti vedanādīnampi khandhabhāvappakāsane na sabbe khandhā vedanādivisesavanto,
tika-abh05t:954_20: kecideva pana tena tena visesena tathā vuccantīti ayamattho dassito.
tika-abh05t:954_21: Evaṃ dassentī cesā pāḷi khandhānaṃ yathāvuttapaṇṇattisodhanamukhena sarūpāvadhāraṇāya saṃvattati,
tika-abh05t:954_22: tañca tesaṃ yāvadeva uppādādinicchayatthanti dassento “evaṃ yesaṃ…pe…
tika-abh05t:955_0: Ekadesepi samudāyavohāro dissati yathā paṭo daḍḍho,
tika-abh05t:955_1: samuddo diṭṭhoti āha “cakkāvayavabhāvato cakkānīti yamakāni vuttānī”ti.
tika-abh05t:955_6: Apubbassa vattabbassa abhāvato nayidha desanā maṇḍalabhāveneva sambajjhatīti āha “na maṇḍalabhāvena sambajjhanato”ti.
tika-abh05t:955_8: vedanākkhandhādimūlakesu pana saññādimukhena desanappavattiyaṃ apubbavaseneva gato siyā maṇḍalabhāvena sambandho,
tika-abh05t:955_12: Suddhakkhandhalābhamattameva gahetvāti “khandhā rūpa”nti ettha khandhāti khandhasaddena labbhamānaṃ rūpādīhi
tika-abh05t:955_14: Yadipi uddese khandhavisesanaṃ rūpādi “khandhā rūpa”nti suddharūpādimattameva gahitaṃ,
tika-abh05t:955_15: tathāpi visesarahitassa sāmaññassa abhāvato tattha suddharūpādimattatāya aṭṭhatvā.
tika-abh05t:955_16: Khandhavisesanabhāvasaṅkhātanti yathādhigataṃ khandhānaṃ visesanabhāvena kathitaṃ ruppanādikaṃ visesanatthaṃ dassetuṃ.
tika-abh05t:955_17: Kevalameva taṃ aggaṇhanto khandhasaddena saha yojetvā…pe…
tika-abh05t:959_1: Evaṃ vuttanti evaṃ dvārālambanehi saddhiṃ dvārappavattadhammavibhāgavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:959_6: Ruppanaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhapariyāpannampi cakkhādi piyasabhāvamattavacanicchāvasena piyarūpameva anuppavisati,
tika-abh05t:959_9: “Yo pana yattha viseso”ti vutto visesasaddo nānuvattatīti adhippāyenāha “vacanaseso”ti.
tika-abh05t:959_10: Na hi adhikārato labbhamānassa ajjhāharaṇakiccaṃ atthi.
tika-abh05t:959_12: Visesatā panassā “visesaṃ vaṇṇayissāmā”ti paṭiññāya eva pākaṭā.
tika-abh05t:959_14: Saṃyojanavasena jānāti abhinivisatīti saññā diṭṭhīti āha “diṭṭhi eva saññā”ti.
tika-abh05t:959_17: Tathā hi “papañcasaññāsaṅkhā”ti ettha papañcasūdaniyaṃ vuttaṃ “saññānāmena vā papañcā eva vuttā”ti.
tika-abh05t:960_1: “Khandhā vedanākkhandho”ti etasmiṃ anulome yathā sarūpadassanena vissajjanaṃ labbhati,
tika-abh05t:960_2: na evaṃ “na khandhā na vedanākkhandho”ti paṭilome,
tika-abh05t:960_3: idha pana paṭivacanena vissajjananti tadatthaṃ vivaranto “khandhasaddappavattiyā ca abhāve vedanākkhandhasaddappavattiyā ca abhāvo”ti āha.
tika-abh05t:960_6: Saddaggahaṇañcettha saddanibandhanattā paññattiyā saddasabhāgataṃ vā sandhāya kataṃ.
tika-abh05t:960_12: Kāmaṃ katthaci satipi khandhe natthi vedanākkhandho,
tika-abh05t:960_13: akhandhattasabhāvā pana natthi vedanāti “na khandhā na vedanākkhandhoti?
tika-abh05t:960_14: Āmantā”ti vuttanti evaṃ vā etaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:961_1: “Rūpato aññe”ti ettha bhūtupādāya dhammo viya piyasabhāvopi rūpasaddābhidheyyatāsāmaññena gahitoti āha “lokuttarā vedanādayo daṭṭhabbā”ti.
tika-abh05t:961_2: Appavattimattamevāti khandhasaddappavattiyā abhāve rūpasaddappavattiyā ca abhāvoti paṇṇattisodhanamattataṃyeva sandhāya vadati,
tika-abh05t:961_5: yathā cakkhuto aññassa sabbassapi sabhāvadhammassa āyatanaggahaṇena gahitattā tadubhayavinimuttaṃ kiñci
tika-abh05t:961_6: natthīti kevalaṃ paññattisodhanatthaṃ tameva abhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “cakkhuñca āyatane ca ṭhapetvā avasesā
tika-abh05t:961_7: na ceva cakkhu na ca āyatana”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:961_8: evamidhāpi tadatthameva ubhayavinimuttassa abhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “rūpañca khandhe ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva rūpaṃ na ca khandhā”ti vuttanti.
tika-abh05t:961_10: “Cakkhuñca āyatane ca ṭhapetvā”ti ettha hi avasesaggahaṇena gayhamānaṃ kiñci natthīti sakkā vattuṃ āyatanavinimuttassa sabhāvadhammassa abhāvā.
tika-abh05t:961_12: “Rūpañca khandhe ca ṭhapetvā”ti ettha pana na tathā sakkā vattuṃ khandhavinimuttassa sabhāvadhammassa atthibhāvato.
tika-abh05t:961_13: Yadi pana tādisaṃ khandhagataṃ dhammajātaṃ natthīti evamidaṃ vuttaṃ siyā,
tika-abh05t:961_16: Taṇhāvatthu ca na siyā avasesaggahaṇena gayhamānanti ānetvā sambandho.
tika-abh05t:964_1: Missakakālabhedesu yamakesu padānaṃ bhinnakālattā siyā atthavisesoti āha “amissakakālabhedesu vāresu atthavisesābhāvato”ti.
tika-abh05t:964_9: Ete pana tayoti attanā visuṃ anantaraṃ dassite sandhāyāha.
tika-abh05t:964_10: Yathādassitāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ niddhāretvā dassitabbākārā paccuppannenātītādayo ye pāḷiyaṃ ujukameva āgatā.
tika-abh05t:964_11: “Na visuṃ vijjantī”ti vuttamevatthaṃ “tattha tattha hī”tiādinā pākaṭataraṃ karoti.
tika-abh05t:964_12: Tattha paṭilomapucchāhīti “yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho uppajjittha,
tika-abh05t:964_13: tassa rūpakkhandho uppajjatī”ti evamādikāhi paṭhamapade vuttassa paṭilomavasena pavattāhi.
tika-abh05t:965_0: Yena kāraṇenāti yena ekapadadvayasaṅgahitānaṃ khandhānaṃ uppādassa nirodhassa lābhasaṅkhātena kāraṇena.
tika-abh05t:965_1: Yathākkamaṃ purepañho pacchāpañhoti ca nāmaṃ vuttaṃ. Ca-
tika-abh05t:965_2: saddena purepacchāpañhoti ca nāmaṃ vuttanti niddhāretvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:965_3: Tattha pana “ekapadadvayasaṅgahitāna”nti idaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:965_9: taṃ vā yathāvuttaṃ vissajjanaṃ etassāti taṃvissajjano,
tika-abh05t:965_12: Tena hi vissajjanapadassa samānatthatā idha sadisatthatā.
tika-abh05t:965_15: Uppādanirodhalābhasāmaññamattenāti uppādassa vā nirodhassa vā labbhamānatāya samānatāmattena.
tika-abh05t:965_17: yuttanti idaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjatī”tiādinā purepañhassa dassitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:965_18: Yadipi tattha “uppajjatī”ti vissajjitattā vedanākkhandhassa uppādo labbhatīti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:965_19: yo pana sanniṭṭhānapadasaṅgahito rūpakkhandhassa anuppādo pāḷiyaṃ anuññātarūpena ṭhito,
tika-abh05t:966_1: tassa vedanākkhandho nuppajjitthā”ti ettha rūpakkhandhassa anuppannapubbatāpaṭikkhepamukhena itarassa
tika-abh05t:966_3: Eseva nayo aññesupi edisesu ṭhānesūti āha “sanniṭṭhānatthasseva paṭikkhipanaṃ paṭikkhepo”ti.
tika-abh05t:966_5: tassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhatī”ti ettha pana rūpakkhandhassa uppādalakkhaṇaṃ katvā vedanākkhandhassa
tika-abh05t:966_7: Esa nayo aññesupi edisesu ṭhānesūti vuttaṃ “saṃsayatthanivāraṇaṃ paṭisedho”ti. “Na-
tika-abh05t:966_9: Yadi evaṃ pāḷigatipaṭisedhavissajjanānaṃ ko visesoti āha “tattha uppattī”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:967_0: Tadekadesapakkhepavasenāti tesaṃ catunnaṃ pañhānaṃ pañcannañca vissajjanānaṃ ekadesassa pakkhipanavasena.
tika-abh05t:967_1: Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “paṭhame ṭhāne paripuṇṇapañhassa purimakoṭṭhāse sarūpadassanenā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:967_2: Yo panettha pañhesu vissajjanesu ca sattavīsatiyā ṭhānesu pakkhepaṃ labhati,
tika-abh05t:967_5: saddena pucchāvibhaṅgo vissajjanāṭhānāni ekasmiṃ pañhe yojanānayoti imesaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh05t:968_0: Suddhāvāsānantiādi pāḷiyā padaṃ uddharitvā atthadassanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh05t:968_2: tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjitthā”ti imassa vissajjanaṃ hoti “suddhāvāsānaṃ tesaṃ tatthā”ti.
tika-abh05t:968_3: Tattha ekabhūmiyaṃ dutiyā upapatti natthīti ekissā bhūmiyā ekassa ariyapuggalassa dutiyavāraṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ natthīti attho.
tika-abh05t:968_9: Ādānanikkhepaparicchinnaṃ kammajasantānaṃ ekattena gahetvā tassa vasena uppādanirodhesu vuccamānesu akammajesu
tika-abh05t:968_10: kusalādīsu kathanti codanāyaṃ tepi idha taṃnissitā eva katāti dassento āha “tasmiñhi…pe…
tika-abh05t:968_15: Pañcasu suddhāvāsesu yathā paccekaṃ “ekissā bhūmiyā dutiyā upapatti natthī”ti yathāvuttapāḷiyā viññāyati,
tika-abh05t:968_16: evaṃ “suddhāvāsāna”nti avisesavacanato sakalepi suddhāvāse sā natthīti tāya kasmā na viññāyatīti codanaṃ
tika-abh05t:968_18: Tattha suddhāvāsesu heṭṭhābhūmikassa asati indriyaparipāke uparibhūmisamuppatti na sakkā paṭisedhetuṃ uddhaṃsotavacanato.
tika-abh05t:969_4: Te eva asaññasatte eva gahetvā purimakoṭṭhāseti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:969_5: Tena ye sanniṭṭhānena vajjitāti tena yathāvuttasanniṭṭhānena ye virahitā,
tika-abh05t:969_9: Pacchimabhavikānanti ettha pacchimabhavaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “kiṃ pañcavokārādī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:969_10: Apacchimabhavikānampi arūpānaṃ arūpabhave yathā rūpakkhandho nuppādi,
tika-abh05t:969_11: evaṃ tattha pacchimabhavikānaṃ vedanākkhandhopīti āha “etena sanniṭṭhānena saṅgahitattā”ti.
