tika-abh05t:969_16: Sappaṭisandhikānampi suddhāvāsānaṃ khandhabhedassa parinibbānapariyāyo oḷārikadosappahānato kilesūpasamasāmaññena vuttoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:970_0: Sabbesañhi tesanti taṃtaṃbhūmiyaṃ ṭhitānaṃ sabbesaṃ suddhāvāsānaṃ.
tika-abh05t:970_2: Anantā lokadhātuyoti idaṃ okāsassa paricchedābhāvaṃyeva dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:970_3: Puggalavasena samānādhāratāya samānakālattena asambhavanto okāsavasena pana sambhavanto saṃkiṇṇā viya hontīti āha “saṃkiṇṇatā hotī”ti.
tika-abh05t:973_2: Okāse puggalassevāti yathāgahite okāse yo puggalo,
tika-abh05t:973_4: Yathā pana puggalavāre labbhamāne puggalokāsavāropi labbhati,
tika-abh05t:973_5: evaṃ okāsavāropi labbheyyāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “okāsavāropi cā”ti.
tika-abh05t:973_6: Tasmāti yasmā vuccamānopi okāso puggalassa visesabhāveneva vucceyya, na visuṃ, tasmā.
tika-abh05t:974_0: Aññathāti pavattivāre viya ādānanikkhepaparicchinnaṃ kammajasantānaṃ ekattena gahetvā tassa uppādanirodhavasena pariññāvacane.
tika-abh05t:974_4: tasmā pavatte cittakkhaṇavasenevettha tayo addho labbhantīti attho.
tika-abh05t:974_5: “Aggamaggasamaṅgiñca arahantañcā”ti dvinnaṃ padānaṃ “rūpakkhandhañca na parijānanti vedanākkhandhañca
tika-abh05t:974_6: na parijānitthā”ti dvīhi padehi yathākkamaṃ sambandho.
tika-abh05t:974_9: natthīti iminā arahattamaggañāṇasseva pariññāmatthakappattiyā pariññākiccaṃ sātisayaṃ,
tika-abh05t:974_15: Imaṃ pana yathāvuttadosaṃ pariharantā “puthujjanādayo sandhāyā”ti vadanti.
tika-abh05t:980_1: Vuttanayenāti “avayavapadehi vutto ekadeso sakalo vā samudāyapadānaṃ attho,
tika-abh05t:980_2: samudāyapadehi pana vutto ekantena avayavapadānaṃ attho”tiādinā vuttena nayena.
tika-abh05t:980_3: Etena yathāvuttaatthavaṇṇanānayadassanatāya sabbapaṇṇattivārādīsu yathārahaṃ attho netabboti dasseti.
tika-abh05t:983_3: evaṃ sīlādīsupīti pāḷiyaṃ “sīlagandho”tiādi vuttaṃ “sīlādiyeva gandho”ti katvā.
tika-abh05t:983_6: Yasmā pana savisayabyāpanaṃ tattha pasaṭabhāvo pākaṭabhāvo vā hoti,
tika-abh05t:983_12: natthīti idaṃ “na dhammo nāyatana”nti ettha dhammasaddassa vinivattavisesasabbasabhāvadhammavācakataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:987_0: Sadisavissajjananti sāmaññavacanaṃ visesaniviṭṭhameva hotīti taṃ visesaṃ dassento “puggalavārameva sandhāya
tika-abh05t:987_1: vutta”nti vatvā tassā pana sadisavissajjanatāya abyāpitattā yattha sadisaṃ,
tika-abh05t:987_8: Virattakāmakammanibbattassāti bhāvanābalena viratto kāmo etenāti virattakāmaṃ,
tika-abh05t:987_13: Gandhādayo ca na santīti sabbena sabbaṃ tesampi abhāvaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-abh05t:988_0: “Sacca”nti yathāvuttavasena gahetabbaṃ codakena vuttamatthaṃ sampaṭicchitvā puna yenādhippāyena tāni yamakāni sadisavissajjanāni,
tika-abh05t:988_3: tattha cakkhāyatanamūlakesu ghānāyatanayamakena “sacakkhukānaṃ aghānakānaṃ upapajjantāna”ntiādinā nayena
tika-abh05t:988_5: tathā idha ghānāyatanamūlakesu ghānāyatanayamakena tāni jivhākāyāyatanayamakāni “yassa ghānāyatanaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh05t:988_8: Evamettha ubhayesaṃ visuṃ aññamaññaṃ sadisavissajjanatāya idaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:988_10: Tenāha “tasmā tattha tattheva sadisavissajjanatā pāḷianāruḷhatāya kāraṇa”nti.
tika-abh05t:988_13: na pana tesaṃ nidassitabbehi sabbathā sadisavissajjanatāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:989_0: Evanti iminā “āmantā”ti paṭivacanavissajjanena yathāvuttavacanasseva vissajjanabhāvānujānanaṃ kattabbanti imamatthaṃ ākaḍḍhati.
tika-abh05t:989_7: samaññenā”ti vatvā idāni “kāraṇasāmaññenā”ti vuttassa sadisavissajjanattassa tattha abhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “ghānajivhākāyāyatanānaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:989_8: Tattha agabbhaseyyakesu pavattamānānanti etthāpi “sahacāritāyā”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t:989_10: Itarāni ghānāyatanamūlakāni jivhākāyāyatanayamakāni dve na vissajjīyanti,
tika-abh05t:989_11: ghānāyatanamūlakesu ca yamakesu vissajjitesu itaradvayamūlakāni jivhākāyāyatanamūlakāni na vissajjīyanti avisesattā appavisesattā cāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:989_14: Rūpāyatanamanāyatanehi saddhinti idaṃ rūpāyatanamūlakamanāyatanavasena vuttanti āha “rūpāyatana…pe…
tika-abh05t:990_0: Heṭṭhimehīti idaṃ avisesavacanampi yesu sadisavissajjanatā sambhavati,
tika-abh05t:990_3: yo tattha na sabbena sabbaṃ uddesānurūpaguṇena upalabbhati,
tika-abh05t:990_4: tassa akathanampi atthato vissajjanameva nāma hotīti āha “avissajjaneneva alabbhamānatādassanena vissajjitāni nāma hontī”ti.
tika-abh05t:991_0: Cakkhuvikalasotavikalā viya cakkhusotavikalopi labbhatīti so pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pi-
tika-abh05t:991_3: Paripuṇṇāyatanameva opapātikaṃ sandhāya vuttanti ettha aṭṭhānappayutto eva-
tika-abh05t:991_4: saddoti tassa ṭhānaṃ dassento “vuttamevāti attho”ti vatvā tena paripuṇṇāyatanassa tattha aniyatattā aparipuṇṇāyatanassapi
tika-abh05t:991_5: saṅgaho siddhoti dassento “tena jaccandhabadhirampi sandhāya vuttatā na nivāritā hotī”ti āha.
tika-abh05t:992_3: “Āmantā”ti paṭiññāya kāraṇavibhāvanādhippāyeneva “kasmā paṭiññāta”nti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ dassetukāmo “nanū”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:993_2: tassa cakkhāyatanaṃ uppajjissatī”ti pucchāyaṃ vuttena vidhinā paṭiññātabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t:993_3: atha kasmā atha kena kāraṇena paṭilome “yassa vā pana rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati,
tika-abh05t:993_7: No ca nuppajjissati uppajjissati evāti attho.
tika-abh05t:993_9: Tattha tasmiṃ bhaveti yasmiṃ bhave “rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjissatī”ti vuttaṃ pavattamānattā,
tika-abh05t:993_11: Anāgatabhāvena avacanatoti bhāvībhāvena avattabbato āraddhuppādabhāvena pavattamānattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:994_7: Āmantā”ti ca evaṃ pavattaṃ pucchādvayavissajjanaṃ āyatanapaṭilābhassa jātibhāvato suṭṭhu upapannaṃ bhavati.
tika-abh05t:995_0: Yaṃ pana aghānakānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantānanti vuttanti sambandho.
tika-abh05t:995_3: Kathaṃ panīdisaṃ kammaṃ atthīti viññāyatīti āha “yassa yatthā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:995_4: Evampi gabbhaseyyako eva idha aghānakoti adhippetoti kathamidaṃ viññāyatīti codanāya “na hī”tiādiṃ vatvā
tika-abh05t:995_11: tassa tattha rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatī”ti ca dassitappakārāsu pucchāsu.
tika-abh05t:995_12: Āmantāti vuttanti atha kasmā na viññāyatīti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:995_13: Etāsu pucchāsu kasmā paṭivacanena vissajjanaṃ na katanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:995_14: Sanniṭṭhānena gahitatthassāti “yassa vā pana sotāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati,
tika-abh05t:995_15: yassa yattha ghānāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatī”ti ca evamādikena sanniṭṭhānapadena gahitassa atthassa.
tika-abh05t:995_16: Ekadese saṃsayatthassa sambhavenāti ekadese saṃsayitabbassa atthassa sambhavena sanniṭṭhānatthapaṭiyogabhūtasaṃsayatthassa
tika-abh05t:995_17: paṭivacanassa akaraṇato “āmantā”ti paṭivacanavissajjanassa akattabbato atthassa abhinditvā ekajjhaṃ katvā
tika-abh05t:996_0: Yadi siyāti bhinditvā vattabbepi atthe yadi paṭivacanavissajjanaṃ siyā,
tika-abh05t:996_1: paripuṇṇavissajjanameva na siyā anokāsabhāvato bhinditabbato cāti attho.
tika-abh05t:996_8: arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanañca na nirujjhati,
tika-abh05t:996_9: rūpāyatanañca na nirujjhissatī”ti ca tattha vibhāgavasena pavatto pāṭhaseso.
tika-abh05t:996_12: evaṃ sante “yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh05t:996_14: Āmantā”ti iminā paṭivacanavissajjanena gabbhaseyyakānaṃ somanassapaṭisandhi natthīti kasmā na viññāyati,
tika-abh05t:996_15: bhinditabbe na paṭivacanavissajjanaṃ hotīti sampaṭicchitabbanti? Taṃ na,
tika-abh05t:997_4: Āmantā”ti tasseva cittassa nirodho anāgatabhāvena tassa uppādakkhaṇe yathā vutto,
tika-abh05t:997_5: evaṃ tasseva kammajasantānassa nirodho tassa uppāde anāgatabhāvena vattabbo.
tika-abh05t:997_6: Tenetaṃ dasseti “ekacittassa nāma uppādakkhaṇe nirodho anāgatabhāvena vuccati,
tika-abh05t:997_9: Upapajjantānaṃ eva vasena so nirodho tathā anāgatabhāvena vutto,
tika-abh05t:997_10: kasmā panettha nirodho upapannānaṃ vasena na vuttoti āha “uppannānaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:997_12: Tasmāti yasmā uppādakkhaṇato uddhaṃ nirodho āraddho nāma hoti, tasmā.
tika-abh05t:997_14: Anāgatakālāmasanavaseneva nirodhasseva vasena vissajjanadvayaṃ upapannameva yuttameva hotīti.
tika-abh05t:997_15: Aññesaṃ vasena nirodhasseva vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā “arahata”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:998_0: Yadi upapattianantaraṃ nirodho āraddho nāma hoti,
tika-abh05t:998_1: atha kasmā cutiyā nirodhavacananti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tanniṭṭhānabhāvato pana cutiyā nirodhavacana”nti.
tika-abh05t:998_5: Vakkhatītiādipi pavatte nirodhaṃ anādiyitvā cutinirodhasseva gahitatāya kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-abh05t:998_8: Yadi pavatte niruddhassapi cutiyā eva nirodho icchito,
tika-abh05t:998_9: “sacakkhukāna”ntiādi kathanti āha “sacakkhukānantiādīsu ca paṭiladdhacakkhukānantiādinā attho viññāyatī”ti.
tika-abh05t:1002_4: Na hi tāni cakkhuviññāṇadhātādisambandhāni viya cutipaṭisandhivasena labbhanti,
tika-abh05t:1002_5: eteneva āyatanayamakepi pavattivāre saddadhātusambandhānaṃ yamakānaṃ alabbhamānatā ca veditabbā.
tika-abh05t:1006_6: Esa dukkhasaddo “dukkhaṃ dukkhasacca”nti ettha paṭhamo dukkhasaddo.
tika-abh05t:1006_8: “Dukkhaṃ dukkhasacca”nti ettha dukkhameva dukkhasaccanti nayidaṃ avadhāraṇaṃ icchitabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1006_9: dukkhaṃ dukkhasaccamevāti pana icchitabbanti āha “ekantena dukkhasaccamevā”ti.
tika-abh05t:1006_10: Saccavibhaṅge vuttesu samudayesu koci phaladhammesu natthīti saccavibhaṅge pañcadhā vuttesu samudayesu ekopi phalasabhāvesu natthi,
tika-abh05t:1006_13: Maggasaddo ca phalaṅgesūti sāmaññaphalaṅgesu sammādiṭṭhiādīsu “maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpanna”ntiādinā āgato
tika-abh05t:1006_16: Tasmāti yasmā saccadesanāya pabhavādisabhāvā eva dhammā samudayādipariyāyena vuttā,
tika-abh05t:1006_18: Ettha ca tebhūmakadhammānaṃ yathārahaṃ dukkhasamudayasaccantogadhattā asaccasabhāve sabhāvadhamme ca uddharanto phaladhamme eva uddhari.
tika-abh05t:1006_19: Nanu ca maggasampayuttāpi dhammā asaccasabhāvāti tepi uddharitabbāti? Na,
tika-abh05t:1006_21: “Phaladhammesū”ti ettha dhammaggahaṇena vā phalasampayuttadhammānaṃ viya tesampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1007_1: idha gahitāti etena asaccasabhāvānaṃ dhammānaṃ pakaraṇena nivattitataṃ āha.
tika-abh05t:1007_5: Yathā cetthāti yathā etasmiṃ saccayamake suddhasaccavāre saccavisesanabhūtā eva dukkhādayo gahitā.
tika-abh05t:1007_6: Evaṃ khandhayamakādīsupīti na suddhasaccavāre eva ayaṃ nayo dassitoti attho.
tika-abh05t:1007_7: Padasodhanavāre taṃmūlacakkavāre ca “rūpaṃ rūpakkhandho”tiādinā samudāyapadānaṃyeva vuttattā vattabbameva natthīti “suddhakkhandhādivāresū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1007_8: Tathā cetthāpi suddhavāre eva ayaṃ nayo dassito.
tika-abh05t:1007_9: Yadi suddhakkhandhādivāresu khandhādivisesanabhūtānameva rūpādīnaṃ gahaṇena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1007_10: atha kasmā khandhādivisesanato aññesampi rūpādīnaṃ vasena attho dassitoti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:1010_1: Dukkhapariññā yāva dukkhasamatikkamanatthāti sappadesaṃ pavattāpi sā tadatthāvahā bhaveyyāti kassaci āsaṅkā siyāti dassento āha “ariyattā…pe…
tika-abh05t:1010_5: na ca sabbe suddhāvāsā antimabhavikā uddhaṃsotavacanato.
tika-abh05t:1010_7: Avisesena dukkhasaccapariyāpannā dhammā sambandhībhāveneva taṃsamaṅgī ca puggalo vuttoti dassento “sabbe
tika-abh05t:1010_8: upapajjantā”tiādiṃ vatvā svāyamattho yasmā nicchayarūpena gahito,
tika-abh05t:1011_1: Tattha samudayasaccuppādavomissassa dukkhasaccuppādassāti idaṃ anādare sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1011_2: Katthaci samudayasaccuppādavomissepi dukkhasacce taṃrahitassa samudayasaccuppādarahitassa dukkhasaccuppādassa dassanavasena vuttanti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:1011_5: Taṃsahitassāti samudayasaccuppādasahitassa dukkhasaccuppādassa dassanavasena vuttanti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:1011_7: pavattiyaṃ dukkhasaccassa uppādo “pavatte”tiādinā vuttesu dvīsupi koṭṭhāsesu na gahitoti attho.
tika-abh05t:1011_8: Paṭisandhiyaṃ pana tesaṃ uppādassa paṭhamakoṭṭhāsena gahitatā dassitā eva.
tika-abh05t:1011_9: Tathā nirodho cāti yathā asaññasattānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ dukkhasaccassa uppādo paṭhamakoṭṭhāsena gahito,
tika-abh05t:1011_10: pavattiyaṃ pana so dvīhi koṭṭhāsehi na gahito,
tika-abh05t:1011_12: Tathā hi “sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte taṇhāvippayuttacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe”tiādinā nirodhavāre pāḷi pavattā.
tika-abh05t:1011_13: Eseva nayoti yvāyaṃ “ettha cā”tiādinā samudayasaccayamake pāḷiyā atthanayo vutto,
tika-abh05t:1011_16: Tathā hi “sabbesaṃ upapajjantāna”ntiādinā tattha pāḷi pavattā.
tika-abh05t:1012_0: Evañca satīti evaṃ khaṇavasena okāsaggahaṇe satīti yathāvuttamatthaṃ ananujānanavasena paccāmasati.
tika-abh05t:1012_6: asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh05t:1012_7: no ca tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ uppajjissatī”ti purimakoṭṭhāsassa āgatattā virodho natthīti “pacchimakoṭṭhāse”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1012_8: Tattha tasmāti yasmā na upapatticittuppādakkhaṇo bhāvino samudayapaccuppādassa ādhāro,
tika-abh05t:1012_15: atha kasmā “sabbesaṃ upapajjantāna”ntiādinā okāsaṃ anāmasitvā tattha vissajjanaṃ pavattanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tattha…pe…
tika-abh05t:1012_19: Yattha teti yasmiṃ kāmāvacarādiokāse te puggalā.
tika-abh05t:1013_1: So hi “pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjatī”ti ettha cittajarūpameva adhippetaṃ cittapaṭibaddhavuttittāti kāraṇaṃ vadati.
tika-abh05t:1013_2: Apare “arūpeti imaṃ purimāpekkhampi hotīti tena pavattaṃ visesetvā arūpabhavavasena ayamattho vutto,
tika-abh05t:1013_6: Puggalo na cittaṃ apekkhitvāva gahitoti idaṃ cittassa anadhikatattā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1013_8: tattheva tassa anuppādanicchayenapi bhavitabbaṃ cittena ca vinā puggalasseva anupalabbhanatoti “yassa
tika-abh05t:1013_9: samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjatī”ti ettha samudayasaccādhāraṃ cittaṃ atthato gahitamevāti sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-abh05t:1013_10: Apica indriyabaddhepi na sabbo rūpuppādo ekantena cittuppādādhīnoti sakkā vattuṃ cittuppattiyā vināpi tattha rūpuppattidassanato,
tika-abh05t:1013_13: itaraṃ pana tassa tīsupi khaṇesu uppajjatīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1013_14: Vibhajitabbā avibhattā nāma natthīti siyāyaṃ pasaṅgo paṭhamavāre,
tika-abh05t:1013_15: dutiyavāre pana vibhajanā eva sāti nāyaṃ pasaṅgo labbhati,
tika-abh05t:1014_2: Bhavanikantiyā āvajjanampi vipākappavattito visadisattā “dutiya”nti vattuṃ sakkā,
tika-abh05t:1014_3: tato paṭṭhāya pubbe tassa tattha samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjitthāti vattabbāti apare.
tika-abh05t:1014_4: Bhavanikantiyā pana sahajātaṃ paṭhamaṃ cittaṃ idha dutiyaṃ cittanti adhippetaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1014_5: Tato pubbe pavattaṃ sabbaṃ abyākatabhāvena samānajātikattā ekanti katvā tato paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā tassa tattha samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjitthevāti.
tika-abh05t:1014_8: Tena samānagatikattāti tena yathāvuttadutiyacittena ca taṃsamaṅgino vā dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjittha,
tika-abh05t:1014_10: Evañca katvāti tena samānagatikatāya dassitattā eva.
tika-abh05t:1014_11: Yathāvuttāti dutiyākusalacittato purimasabbacittasamaṅgino aggahitā honti itarabhāvābhāvato.
tika-abh05t:1014_15: Pañcavokārā viya yathāvuttā suddhāvāsāti dutiyacittakkhaṇasamaṅgibhāvena vuttappakārā yathā suddhāvāsasaṅkhātā pañcavokārā pubbe vuttā santi,
tika-abh05t:1014_16: evaṃ catuvokārā pubbe vuttā na hi santīti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:1015_0: “Yassa yatthā”ti puggalokāsā ādheyyādhārabhāvena apekkhitāti āha “puggalokāsā aññamaññaparicchinnā gahitā”ti.
tika-abh05t:1015_2: upapannāti ettha kāmāvacare abhisametāvino rūpāvacaraṃ upapannā,
tika-abh05t:1015_4: saddena kāmāvacare abhisametāvino arūpāvacaraṃ upapannāti ca yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1015_6: Abhisamayoti uparimaggābhisamayo yāva upapanno na bhavissati,
tika-abh05t:1015_7: tāva te tattha upapannapuggalā ettha etasmiṃ “abhisametāvīna”ntiādinā vutte dutiyakoṭṭhāse na gayhanti puggalokāsānaṃ aññamaññaṃ paricchinnattā.
tika-abh05t:1015_8: Yadi evaṃ kiṃ te imasmiṃ yamake asaṅgahitāti āha “te panā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:1015_9: Tattha yaṃ vuttaṃ “samānagatikāti visuṃ na dassitā”ti,
tika-abh05t:1015_12: “anabhisametāvīna”nti iminā paṭhamapadena gahitā sabbattha magguppattirahe sampattibhave tattha suddhāvāse ye anabhisametāvino,
tika-abh05t:1015_13: tesu dvippakāresu suddhāvāsā yasmiṃ kāle tattha anabhisametāvinoti gahetabbā,
tika-abh05t:1015_14: tattha nesaṃ tathā gahetabbakālassa visesanatthaṃ “suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vattamāne”ti vuttanti.
tika-abh05t:1017_0: Paṭisandhicuticittānaṃ bhaṅguppādakkhaṇā pavatte cittassa bhaṅguppādakkhaṇehi dukkhasaccādīnaṃ nuppādādīsu
tika-abh05t:1017_2: Tattha cuticittassapi uppādakkhaṇassa gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbanti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:1017_3: Dvīsupi koṭṭhāsesūti samudayasaccassa bhāvino nirodhassa appaṭikkhepapaṭikkhepavasena pavattesu purimapacchimakoṭṭhāsesu.
tika-abh05t:1017_4: Na visesitanti yathāvutte appaṭikkhepe ca satipi visesetvā na vuttanti attho.
tika-abh05t:1017_5: Ekassapi puggalassa tādisassa maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇasamaṅgino purimakoṭṭhāsasseva abhajanato koṭṭhāsadvayasambhavābhāvatoti attho.
tika-abh05t:1017_9: “Maggassa ca phalassa cā”ti vuttamaggaphalāni dassento “tiṇṇaṃ phalānaṃ dvinnañca maggāna”nti āha.
tika-abh05t:1017_10: Tāni pana heṭṭhimāni tīṇi phalāni majjhe ca dve maggā veditabbā.
tika-abh05t:1017_11: Nirantaraṃ anuppādetvāti paṭipakkhadhammehi avokiṇṇaṃ katvā saha vipassanāya maggaṃ uppādentena yā sātaccakiriyā kātabbā,
tika-abh05t:1017_15: “Arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe”ti avisesato vutte kathamayaṃ viseso labbhatīti āha “sāmaññavacanenapī”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:1017_16: Tena apavādavisayapariyāyena upasaggā abhinivisantīti lokasiddhoyaṃ ñāyoti dasseti.
tika-abh05t:1020_5: atha kho tadaññavacanoti yathārahaṃ saccesu labbhamānānaṃ pahātabbatādīnampi dassane āpanneyeva samayavāro dassanaparo,
tika-abh05t:1020_7: tesu kesuci saccesu labbhamānānampi kesañci visesānaṃ ayaṃ vāro na dassanaparoti dassento “sacchikaraṇa…pe…
tika-abh05t:1020_10: na tīraṇapariññāti yuttaṃ tāvetaṃ samudayassapi tīretabbasabhāvattā,
tika-abh05t:1020_12: na pahānapariññā”ti idaṃ pana kasmā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1020_14: Samudayasaccavibhaṅge vuttānaṃ kesañci samudayakoṭṭhāsānaṃ dukkhasacce saṅgahaṇato dukkhasamudaye vā
tika-abh05t:1020_16: Ubhayatthāti dukkhe samudaye ca vuttā. Kasmā?
tika-abh05t:1020_18: Evaṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇabhedabhinnaṃ yathāvuttaṃ pariññākiccaṃ pubbabhāge nānakkhaṇe labbhamānampi maggakāle
tika-abh05t:1020_19: ekakkhaṇe eva labbhati ekañāṇakiccattāti dassetuṃ “maggañāṇañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1025_1: Satipi kusalamūlādīnampi vibhattabhāve khandhādivibhāgo tato sātisayoti dassento “khandhādayo viya pubbe avibhattā”ti āha.
tika-abh05t:1025_5: Hetuattho vā ettha luttaniddiṭṭho aviññāpitattāti attho.
tika-abh05t:1026_1: Suddhikaekekapadavasenāti “kāyo saṅkhāro”tiādīsu dvīsu dvīsu padesu aññamaññaṃ asammissaekekapadavasena.
tika-abh05t:1026_7: Kasmā pana ubhayattha samāne samāsapadabhāve tattha attho labbhati,
tika-abh05t:1026_10: Tattha hi rūpakkhandhādipadāni samānādhikaraṇānīti padadvayādhiṭṭhāno eko attho labbhati,
tika-abh05t:1026_11: idha pana kāyasaṅkhārādipadāni bhinnādhikaraṇānīti tathārūpo attho na labbhatīti.
tika-abh05t:1027_0: Visuṃ adīpetvāti “kāyasaṅkhāro”tiādinā saha vuccamānopi kāyasaṅkhārasaddo visuṃ visuṃ attano atthaṃ ajotetvā
tika-abh05t:1027_1: ekaṃ atthaṃ yadi dīpetīti parikappavasena vadati.
tika-abh05t:1027_5: Evañhi sati khandhatthe vattamāno khandhasaddo viya rūpasaddena kāyasaddena visesitabboti idaṃ vacanaṃ yujjeyya,
tika-abh05t:1027_6: kāyasaṅkhārasaddānaṃ pana samānādhikaraṇatte na kevalaṃ saṅkhārasaddoyeva saṅkhāratthe vattati,
tika-abh05t:1027_7: atha kho kāyasaddopīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “kāyasaṅkhārasaddo kāyasaṅkhāratthe vattamāno”ti vuttaṃ siyā,
tika-abh05t:1028_1: Padasodhanena dassitānanti ettakeva vuccamāne tattha dassitabhāvasāmaññena suddhakāyādīnampi gahaṇaṃ
tika-abh05t:1028_5: Suddhasaṅkhāravāraṃ sandhāya vuttampi suddhasaṅkhāravāramevettha ananujānanto sakalasaṅkhārayamakavisayanti āha “idha pana saṅkhārayamake”ti.
tika-abh05t:1028_6: Adhippetatthapariccāgoti assāsapassāsādikassa adhippetatthassa aggahaṇaṃ cetanākāyaabhisaṅkharaṇasaṅkhārādi anadhippetatthapariggaho.
tika-abh05t:1028_7: Yadi “kāyo saṅkhāro”tiādinā suddhasaṅkhārataṃmūlacakkavārā atthābhāvato idha na gahetabbā,
tika-abh05t:1028_8: atha kasmā pavattivārameva anārabhitvā aññathā desanā āraddhāti āha “padasodhanavārataṃmūlacakkavārehī”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:1028_9: Saṃsayo hoti saṅkhārasaddavacanīyatāsāmaññato kāyasaṅkhārādipadānaṃ byadhikaraṇabhāvato ca.
tika-abh05t:1031_2: saṅkhārānaṃ samāpajjitabbatāya puggalānaṃ jhānassa okāsatā veditabbā,
tika-abh05t:1031_6: “kāmāvacare rūpāvacare”tiādinā bhūmi ca visuṃ okāsabhāvena gahitā.
tika-abh05t:1031_10: Puggalavāre ca okāsavasena puggalaggahaṇeti puggalavāre ca yadā puggalokāsasaṅkhārādīnaṃ okāsabhāvena gayhati,
tika-abh05t:1031_11: tadā tesaṃ dvinnaṃ okāsānaṃ vasena gayhanaṃ hotīti yattha so puggalo,
tika-abh05t:1031_13: tesaṃ dvinnaṃ bhūmijhānasaṅkhātānaṃ okāsānaṃ vasena yathārahaṃ kāyasaṅkhārādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ kathanaṃ hotīti.
tika-abh05t:1031_16: “Vinā vitakkavicārehi assāsapassāsānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe”ti evaṃ gahitā puggalā visesetvā dassitā. Kena?
tika-abh05t:1032_5: “Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ kāmāvacarāna”nti ca idaṃ nivattetabbagahetabbasādhāraṇavacanaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1032_6: tassa ca avacchedakaṃ “assāsapassāsānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe”ti idanti vuttaṃ “visesa…pe… khaṇe”ti.
tika-abh05t:1032_10: Tena na kevalaṃ rūpārūpāvacaresu paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1032_15: Te hi akāmāvacaratāya viya rūpārūpabhavasamaṅgino vitakkavicāruppattiyāva nivattitā.
tika-abh05t:1032_22: Iminā nayenāti yvāyaṃ “saṅkhārānaṃ puggalānañcā”tiādinā jhānokāsabhūmiokāsavasena puggalavibhāganayo vutto,
tika-abh05t:1033_1: Etasmiṃ pana atthe satīti yvāyaṃ uppattibhūmiyā jhānaṃ visesetvā attho vutto,
tika-abh05t:1033_2: etasmiṃ atthe gayhamāne aññatthapi uppattibhūmiyā jhānaṃ visesitabbaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-abh05t:1033_4: Kiṃ pana taṃ aniṭṭhanti āha “bhūmīnaṃ okāsabhāvasseva aggahitatāpattito”ti.
tika-abh05t:1033_6: tattha tattha taṃ uppattibhūmiyā visesitabbaṃ hoti.
tika-abh05t:1033_9: Kiñca “catutthajjhāne rūpāvacare arūpāvacare”ti ettha rūpārūpabhūmiyā catutthajjhāne visesiyamāne tadekadesova okāsavasena gahito siyā,
tika-abh05t:1034_0: Nanu ca jhānabhūmiokāse asaṅkarato yojiyamāne na sabbasmiṃ paṭhamajjhānokāse kāyasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhāro ca atthi,
tika-abh05t:1034_1: tathā sabbasmiṃ kāmāvacarokāseti codanuppattiṃ sandhāya tassa parihāraṃ vattuṃ “yadipī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:1034_4: Okāsadvayassa asaṅkarato gahaṇe ayañca guṇo laddho hotīti āha “visuṃ…pe…
tika-abh05t:1034_11: Tañhi sakalakkhobhakaradhammavigamena vitakkekaṅgappahāyikato sātisayattā “muddhabhūta”nti vattabbataṃ labhati.
tika-abh05t:1035_1: Āvajjanato pubbe pavattaṃ sabbaṃ cittaṃ paṭisandhicittena samānagatikattā ekaṃ katvā vuttaṃ “paṭhamato”ti.
tika-abh05t:1040_4: Lobho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāyā”ti ca evamādinā kusalamūlakusalādīnaṃ paccayabhāvo vuttoti āha “paccayadīpakena mūlayamakenā”ti.
tika-abh05t:1040_8: rūpā aniccā”ti ca ādinā bahulakhandhādimukhena aniccānupassanādayo vihitāti vuttaṃ “khandhādīsu tīraṇabāhullato”ti.
tika-abh05t:1040_9: Kilesānaṃ samucchindanato paraṃ pahānakiccaṃ natthīti āha “anusayapahānantā pahānapariññā”ti.
tika-abh05t:1040_10: Yadipi anusayehi sampayogato ārammaṇato vā pahānapariññā nappavattati,
tika-abh05t:1040_11: anusayābhāve pana tadārambho eva natthīti katvā vuttaṃ “anusayehi pahānapariññaṃ vibhāvetu”nti.
tika-abh05t:1040_15: Anusayesu gaṇanasarūpappavattiṭṭhānato abodhitesu puggalokāsādivasena pavattiyamānā tabbisayā desanā na suviññeyyā hotīti dassento āha “tesu tathā…pe…
tika-abh05t:1041_0: Ettha purimesūti paduddhāro anantarassa vidhi paṭisedho vāti katvā sānusayavārādiapekkho,
tika-abh05t:1041_1: na anusayavārādiapekkho anusayavāre pāḷivavatthānassa pageva katattāti dassento “etesu sānusayavārādīsu purimesūti attho”ti āha.
tika-abh05t:1041_2: Sānusayavārādīsu hi tīsu purimesu okāsavāre yato tatoti desanā pavattā,
tika-abh05t:1041_5: “kāmadhātuṃ vā pana upapajjantassā”tiādinā yamakabhāvena aṭṭhakathāādigatapadassa ca atthavisesābhāvato.
tika-abh05t:1041_6: Kathamayaṃ yamakadesanā siyā dutiyassa padassa abhāvatoti attho.
tika-abh05t:1041_13: Paṭhamapadena hi vuttassa viparivattanavasenapi yamakadesanā hoti “rūpaṃ rūpakkhandho,
tika-abh05t:1041_17: tasmā na tathā desanā katāti dassento āha “atthavisesābhāvato pana na vuttā”ti.
tika-abh05t:1042_0: Uppattiarahataṃ dassetīti iminā nippariyāyena anusayā anāgatāti dassitaṃ hoti yato te maggavajjhā,
tika-abh05t:1042_1: na ca atītapaccuppannā uppattirahāti vuccanti uppannattā.
tika-abh05t:1042_2: Yaṃsabhāvā pana dhammā anāgatā anusayāti vuccanti,
tika-abh05t:1042_4: Na hi dhammānaṃ addhābhedena sabhāvabhedo atthi,
tika-abh05t:1042_5: tasmā anusayānaṃ atītapaccuppannabhāvā pariyāyato labbhantīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “atītopi hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1042_14: Uppajjanānusayānaṃ ninnānākaraṇattā eva hi “etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati,
tika-abh05t:1043_1: taṃ dassetukāmo anāgatampi tehi saddhiṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā dassento “anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ pana…pe…
tika-abh05t:1043_3: Etena bhūtapubbagatiyā atītapaccuppannesu uppattirahatā veditabbāti dasseti.
tika-abh05t:1043_4: Uppattiarahatā nāma kilesānaṃ maggena asamucchinnatāya veditabbā.
tika-abh05t:1043_5: Sā ca atītapaccuppannesupi atthevāti pakārantarenapi tesaṃ pariyāyatova anusayabhāvaṃ pakāseti.
tika-abh05t:1043_11: Na hi dhammākārā aniccatādayo uppajjantīti vuccanti.
tika-abh05t:1043_14: Tena vuttaṃ “appahīnākāro ca uppajjatīti vattuṃ na yujjatī”ti.
tika-abh05t:1044_0: Vuttampi thāmagamanaṃ aggahetvā appahīnaṭṭhamattameva gahetvā codako codetīti dassento āha “sattānusaya…pe…
tika-abh05t:1044_2: Na hi thāmagamane gahite codanāya okāso atthi.
tika-abh05t:1044_7: yutta”nti vatvā kiṃ pana taṃ thāmagamananti parāsaṅkaṃ nivattento “thāmagatanti ca…pe…
tika-abh05t:1044_9: Tattha aññehi asādhāraṇoti kilesavatthuādīnaṃ kilesatādisabhāvo viya kāmarāgādito aññattha alabbhamāno tesaṃyeva āveṇiko sabhāvo,
tika-abh05t:1044_10: yato te bhavabījaṃ bhavamūlanti ca vuccanti.
tika-abh05t:1044_11: Yasmā ca thāmagamanaṃ tesaṃ anaññasādhāraṇo sabhāvo,
tika-abh05t:1044_12: tasmā anusayananti vuttaṃ hotīti dassento “thāmagatoti anusayasamaṅgīti attho”ti āha.
tika-abh05t:1045_2: Āmantā”tiādinā anusayavāre vutto eva attho “yassa kāmarāgānusayo uppajjati,
tika-abh05t:1045_4: Āmantā”tiādinā vuttoti anusayanākāro eva uppajjanavāre uppajjati-
tika-abh05t:1045_5: saddena gahitoti “uppajjanavāro anusayavārena ninnānākaraṇo vibhatto”ti yaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1045_7: “Uppajjatī”ti vacanaṃ siyāti uppajjanavāre “uppajjatī”ti vacanaṃ appahīnākāradīpakaṃ siyā.
tika-abh05t:1045_8: Tathā ca sati yathā “imassa uppādā”ti ettha imassa anirodhāti ayamatthopi ñāyati,
tika-abh05t:1045_9: evaṃ “uppajjatī”ti vutte atthato “na uppajjatī”ti ayamattho vutto hoti appahīnākārassa uppattirahabhāvassa
tika-abh05t:1045_10: anuppajjamānasabhāvattāti codanaṃ dassento “uppajjatīti vacanassa avuttatā na sakkā vattunti ce”ti āha.
tika-abh05t:1045_11: Vacanatthavisesena taṃdvayassa vuttattāti etena dhammanānattābhāvepi padatthanānatthena vārantaradesanā hoti yathā sahajātasaṃsaṭṭhavāresūti dasseti.
tika-abh05t:1045_12: Anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvātiādi tameva vacanatthavisesaṃ vibhāvetuṃ āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1045_19: “Anusentīti anusayā”ti ettake vutte sadā vijjamānā nu kho te aparinipphannānusayanaṭṭhena “anusayā”ti
tika-abh05t:1045_20: vuccantīti ayamattho āpajjatīti taṃnisedhanatthaṃ “anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1045_21: Uppattiarahabhāvena thāmagatatā anusayaṭṭhoti yaṃ tesaṃ uppattiyogavacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1045_24: Tampi suvuttameva iminā tantippamāṇenāti idampi “abhidhamme tāvā”tiādinā āgataṃ tividhameva tantiṃ sandhāyāhāti
tika-abh05t:1045_25: dassento āha “tantittayenapi hi cittasampayuttatā dīpitā hotī”ti.
tika-abh05t:1048_1: Evaṃ satīti vedanānaṃ visesitabbabhāve kāmadhātuyā ca visesanabhāve sati.
tika-abh05t:1048_2: Kāmādhātuyā anusayanaṭṭhānatā na vuttā hoti appadhānabhāvato,
tika-abh05t:1048_5: Hotu ko dosoti kadāci vadeyyāti āsaṅkamāno āha “dvīsu panā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:1048_9: tattha ca rūpārūpadhātūnaṃ bhavarāgassa anusayaṭṭhānatā vuttāti kāmadhātuyā kāmarāgassa anusayaṭṭhānatā ekantena vattabbā, tasmā.
tika-abh05t:1048_10: Tīsu dhātūsu tīsu vedanāsūti ca niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1049_2: Tenāti “kāmarāgo dvīsu vedanāsu anusetī”ti vacanasāmatthiyaladdhena visesanicchayeneva.
tika-abh05t:1049_4: Na hi dvīsu vedanāsu kāmarāgānusayova anusetīti avadhāraṇaṃ icchitaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1050_2: Visesanañcetaṃ rūpādīnaṃ sabbadvārasabbapurisesu iṭṭhabhāvassa aniyatatāya kataṃ.
tika-abh05t:1050_3: Sātasantasukhagiddhiyāti sātasukhe santasukhe ca gijjhanākārena abhikaṅkhanākārena.
tika-abh05t:1050_15: Vedanāsu anugato hutvā setīti vedanāpekkho eva hutvā pavattati yathā puttāpekkhāya dhātiyā anuggaṇhanappavatti,
tika-abh05t:1050_19: evaṃ paṭighānusayādīnampi vuttaniyāmena yathāsakaṃ kiccakaraṇameva dukkhavedanādīsu anusayanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1050_21: Tīsu vedanāsu anusayanavacanenāti tīsu vedanāsu yathārahaṃ anusayanavacanena.
tika-abh05t:1050_22: Iṭṭhādibhāvena gahitesūti iṭṭhādīsu ārammaṇapakatiyā vasena iṭṭhādibhāvena gahitesu viparītasaññāya vasena
tika-abh05t:1051_2: Kāmassādādivatthubhūtānaṃ kāmabhavādīnanti kāmassādabhavassādavatthubhūtānaṃ kāmarūpārūpabhavānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbanti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:1051_6: Yattha tatthāti dukkhavedanāya taṃsampayuttesu aniṭṭharūpādīsu vāti yattha tattha.
tika-abh05t:1051_10: Tena vuttaṃ “rūpadhātuyā arūpadhātuyā ettha kāmarāgānusayo nānusetī”ti.
tika-abh05t:1052_0: Dhātuttayavedanāttayavinimuttaṃ diṭṭhānusayādīnaṃ anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ na vuttanti suvuttametaṃ diṭṭhānusayādīnaṃ
tika-abh05t:1052_3: taṃ dukkhavedanārūpārūpadhātuvinimuttaṃ diṭṭhānusayādīnaṃ anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ atthīti dassetuṃ “nanu cā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1052_7: nekkhammassitadomanasse viya paṭighānusayo nekkhammassitasomanassupekkhāsu kāmarāgānusayo nānusetīti “yattha kāmarāgānusayo nānuseti,
tika-abh05t:1052_8: tattha diṭṭhānusayo nānusetī”ti sakkā vattunti tasmā taṃ uddharitvā na vuttanti.
tika-abh05t:1052_9: Hontūti tāsaṃ vedanānaṃ atthitaṃ paṭijānitvā uddharitvā avacanassa kāraṇaṃ dassento āha “na pana…pe…
tika-abh05t:1052_12: Tasmāti yasmā satipi kāmarāgānusayanaṭṭhānato aññasmiṃ diṭṭhānusayādīnaṃ anusayanaṭṭhāne taṃ pana dhātuttayavedanāttayavinimuttaṃ
tika-abh05t:1052_14: Taṃ vedanādvayaṃ na vuttaṃ visuṃ na uddhaṭanti attho.
tika-abh05t:1052_16: tattha diṭṭhivicikicchā nānusentī”ti ayamattho “āmantā”ti iminā paṭivacanavissajjanena avibhāgato vuttoti “yattha kāmarāgādayo anusenti,
tika-abh05t:1052_17: tattha diṭṭhivicikicchā anusentī”ti ayampi attho avibhāgatova labbhati, tasmā.
tika-abh05t:1052_18: Avibhāgato ca dukkhaṃ paṭighassa anusayanaṭṭhānanti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh05t:1052_21: Tattha avisesenāti gehassitaṃ nekkhammassitanti visesaṃ akatvā.
tika-abh05t:1052_22: Samudāyavasena gahetvāti yathāvuttaavayavānaṃ samūhavasena dukkhantveva gahetvā.
tika-abh05t:1052_24: saddena anukaḍḍhati “dvīsu vedanāsū”ti etthāpi gehassitādivibhāgassa anicchitattā.
tika-abh05t:1053_1: na tattha paṭighānusayo anusetī”ti idaṃ suttapadaṃ kathanti codanaṃ sandhāya “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1053_7: tathā idha kasmā na vuttanti āha “paṭighuppattirahaṭṭhānatāyā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:1053_8: Evampi suttābhidhammapāṭhānaṃ kathamavirodhoti āha nippariyāyadesanā hesā,
tika-abh05t:1053_13: tasmā tassa na mahaggatadhammā anusayanaṭṭhānanti taṃ paṭhamajjhānañca anāmasitvā “na hi lokiyā…pe…
tika-abh05t:1053_18: Taṃpaṭipakkhabhāvatoti tesaṃ paṭighādīnaṃ paṭipakkhassa maggassa sabbhāvato.
tika-abh05t:1054_1: taṃ gahetabbadhammavasena vā siyā gahaṇavisesena vāti dve vikappā,
tika-abh05t:1054_3: Rūpādiārammaṇe anusayānaṃ anusayanaṭṭhānanti gayhamāne yamatthaṃ sandhāya “na sakkā vattu”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1054_6: Etassapīti diṭṭhānusayasampayuttalobhassapi “sabbasakkāyapariyāpannesu dhammesū”ti kāmarāgassa ṭhānaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh05t:1054_9: Ajjhāsayavasena taṃninnatāyāti asatipi ārammaṇakaraṇe yattha kāmarāgādayo ajjhāsayato ninnā,
tika-abh05t:1054_16: Dukkhameva tassa anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ vuttanti ajjhāsayassa tattha ninnattā dukkhameva tassa paṭighassa anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1054_18: Evanti yathā aññārammaṇassapi paṭighassa ajjhāsayato dukkhaninnatāya dukkhameva anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ, evaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1054_21: Natthi dinna”nti ca ādinā kāyakilamanadukkhe dānānubhāvādike ca micchābhinivesanavasena uppajjamānena
tika-abh05t:1054_22: diṭṭhānusayena sampayutto aññārammaṇopi lobho “evaṃ sukhaṃ bhavissatī”ti ajjhāsayato sukhābhisaṅgavaseneva
tika-abh05t:1054_23: pavattatīti sukhupekkhābhedaṃ sātasantasukhadvayameva assa lobhassa anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1054_28: Tattha rāgassa sukhajjhāsayatā taṃsamaṅgino puggalassa vasena veditabbā,
tika-abh05t:1054_31: Tesaṃ rāgapaṭighānaṃ nānānusayaṭṭhānatā hoti ekasmimpi ārammaṇeti attho.
tika-abh05t:1055_0: Evañca katvāti asatipi gahetabbabhede gahaṇavisesena anusayanaṭṭhānassa bhinnattā eva.
tika-abh05t:1055_4: Gahetabbabhedena hi rāgapaṭighānaṃ anusayanaṭṭhānabhede gayhamāne vipākamatte ṭhātabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh05t:1055_8: yathā pana sukhupekkhāsu iṭṭhārammaṇe ca uppajjantena domanassena saha pavatto doso dubbalabhāvena paṭighānusayo na hoti,
tika-abh05t:1055_9: evaṃ yathāvuttalobhopi kāmarāgānusayo na hotīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1055_13: itarattha pana sambhavo eva natthīti dassento “yaṃ paneta”ntiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:1055_14: Tattha “na hi domanassassa paṭighānusayabhāvāsaṅkā atthī”ti iminā na-
tika-abh05t:1056_0: Desanā saṃkiṇṇā viya bhaveyyāti ettha desanāsaṅkaraṃ dassetuṃ “bhavarāgassapi…pe…
tika-abh05t:1056_3: yathā kāmarāgassa kāmadhātuyā dvīsu vedanāsu ārammaṇakaraṇavasena uppatti vuttā “kāmarāgo kāmadhātuyā dvīsu vedanāsu anusetī”ti,
tika-abh05t:1056_4: evaṃ yadi “bhavarāgo kāmadhātuyā dvīsu vedanāsu anusetī”ti vucceyya,
tika-abh05t:1056_6: Tato ca kāmarāgena saddhiṃ bhavarāgassa desanā saṃkiṇṇā bhaveyya,
tika-abh05t:1056_8: So ca sahajātānusayavasena na sakkā dassetunti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena dassetabbo.
tika-abh05t:1056_13: Evaṃ desanā katāti “rūpadhātuyā arūpadhātuyā ettha bhavarāgānusayo anusetī”ti evaṃ visaye bhummaṃ katvā desanā katā.
tika-abh05t:1060_3: Kathaṃ pana kusalābyākatacittakkhaṇe anusayānaṃ pavattīti āha “maggeneva…pe… pubbe”ti.
tika-abh05t:1061_1: Cittacetasikānañca ṭhānaṃ nāma cittuppādoti āha “ekasmiṃ cittuppāde”ti.
tika-abh05t:1061_4: Sabhāvasiddhā hi dukkhāya vedanāya kāmarāgassa ananusayanaṭṭhānatā.
tika-abh05t:1061_6: Vakkhati hi “pakatiyā dukkhādīnaṃ kāmarāgādīnaṃ ananusayanaṭṭhānataṃ sandhāya vutta”nti.
tika-abh05t:1064_4: kāmarāgaṃ parijānātī”tiādīsu anusayasamaṅgibhāvena pahānapariññākiriyāya kattubhāvena ca puggalo vutto,
tika-abh05t:1064_11: Nanu ca bhavavisese kesañci anusayānaṃ appahānanti?
tika-abh05t:1064_13: atha kho paccayavekallato anokāsatāya cāti nāyaṃ virodho.
tika-abh05t:1064_14: Dvīsu vedanāsūti sukhaupekkhāsu vedanāsu dukkhāya vedanāya kāmarāgānusayena niranusayoti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1064_19: tassa pana sānusayatādihetu hotīti dassento “anusayassa panā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:1065_4: Pajahatīti ettha “rūpadhātuyā arūpadhātuyā tato mānānusayaṃ pajahatī”ti pāḷipadaṃ āharitvā yojetabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1065_5: na pajahatīti ettha pana “dukkhāya vedanāya tato kāmarāgānusayaṃ nappajahatī”ti.
tika-abh05t:1066_1: tato kāmarāgānusayena sānusayo”ti etassa pañhassa vissajjanena.
tika-abh05t:1066_2: Tattha hi “rūpadhātuyā arūpadhātuyā”tiādinā sarūpato anusayanaṭṭhānāni dassitāni.
tika-abh05t:1066_3: Tadattheti taṃ anusayanaṭṭhānadassanaṃ attho etassāti tadattho,
tika-abh05t:1066_5: “Anusayassa uppattiṭṭhānadassanatthaṃ ayaṃ vāro āraddho”tiādinā “yato”ti etena anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ vuttanti imamatthaṃ vibhāvetvā.
tika-abh05t:1066_10: evamidhāpi uppattiarahe vuccamāne na koci virodho.
tika-abh05t:1066_11: Yaṃ pana vakkhati “na hi apariyāpannānaṃ anusayuppattirahaṭṭhānatā”ti,
tika-abh05t:1066_15: Tatheva dissatīti taṃ pamādalikhitaṃ viya dissatīti attho.
tika-abh05t:1067_0: Yato uppannena bhavitabbanti yato anusayanaṭṭhānato kāmagārānusayena uppannena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1067_3: saddo yathā “yato uppannenā”ti ettha uppattirahaṭṭhānato anusayassa uppattirahatā vuttā,
tika-abh05t:1067_4: tathā “uppajjanakenā”ti etthāpi sā eva vuccatīti dīpetīti āha “sabbadhammesu…pe…
tika-abh05t:1067_6: Tattha “uppajjanako”ti vutte anuppajjanako na hotīti ayamattho viññāyati,
tika-abh05t:1067_7: tathā ca sati tena anuppatti nicchitāti uppannasabhāvatā ca pakāsitā hotīti.
tika-abh05t:1067_11: so tato mānānusayena niranusayo”ti pucchāya “yato tato”ti āgatattā vissajjane “sabbatthā”ti padassa nissakkavaseneva
tika-abh05t:1070_6: na so kāmarāgānusayaṃ pajahati pageva pahīnattā,
tika-abh05t:1070_10: Yadi evaṃ paṭhamapucchāyaṃ kathanti āha “yasmā pana…pe…
tika-abh05t:1070_14: Te ṭhapetvāti diṭṭhivicikicchānusayādīnaṃ niravasesapajahanake aṭṭhamakādike ṭhapetvā.
tika-abh05t:1070_15: Avasesāti tassa tassa anusayassa niravasesappajahanakehi avasiṭṭhā.
tika-abh05t:1070_18: Na ca yathāvijjamānenāti maggakiccabhāvena vijjamānappakārena pahānena vajjitā rahitā eva vuttāti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:1071_6: Kāraṇaṃ na hotīti yesaṃ vicikicchānusayo pahīno,
tika-abh05t:1071_9: tesaṃ tadappajahanassa kāraṇaṃ na hotīti attho.
tika-abh05t:1071_11: Atha pana na tattha kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1071_13: kevalaṃ pana sanniṭṭhānena tesaṃ puggalānaṃ gahitatādassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ “kāmarāgānusayañca nappajahantī”ti,
tika-abh05t:1071_15: Tathā ca sati “sesapuggalā tassa anusayassa pahīnattā nappajahantī”ti kāraṇaṃ vattabbamevāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “na vattabba”ntiādi.
tika-abh05t:1071_16: Tattha na vattabbanti vuttanayena kāraṇaṃ na vattabbaṃ kāraṇabhāvasseva abhāvato.
tika-abh05t:1071_24: Sanniṭṭhānapadasaṅgahitaṃ pana pahīyamānattā “nappajahatī”ti na sakkā vattunti.
tika-abh05t:1074_7: Paṭilome hi puthujjanavasenapi desanā gahitā “yassa diṭṭhānusayo appahīno,
tika-abh05t:1074_12: Ettha ca anusayānaṃ accantapaṭipakkhatāggahaṇena uppattirahataṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-abh05t:1074_13: Na hi te accantapaṭipakkhasamuppattito parato uppattirahā honti.
tika-abh05t:1074_15: Na hi maggakkhaṇe te anuppattirahataṃ āpāditā nāma honti,
tika-abh05t:1075_2: tatthevassa anuppattirahatāpādananti “attano attano okāse eva anuppattidhammataṃ āpādito”ti āha.
tika-abh05t:1075_3: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “cakkhuṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1075_5: ettha nivisamānā nivisatī”ti vatvā puna vuttaṃ “cakkhuṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1075_8: Tasmāti yasmā tadokāsattameva kāmadhātuādiokāsattameva anusayānaṃ dīpenti pahīnāppahīnavacanāni, tasmā.
tika-abh05t:1075_9: Anokāse tadubhayāvattabbatā vuttāti yasmā kāmarāgapaṭighānusayānaṃ dvinnaṃ uppattiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1075_10: so eva pahānokāsoti svāyaṃ tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ anokāso,
tika-abh05t:1075_11: tasmiṃ anokāse tadubhayassa pahānāppahānassa navattabbatā vuttā.
tika-abh05t:1075_12: Kāmarāgānusayokāse hi paṭighānusayassa appahīnattā so “tattha pahīno”ti na vattabbo,
tika-abh05t:1075_15: Tena saddhiṃ samānokāseti tena kāmarāgena saddhiṃ samānokāse.
tika-abh05t:1075_16: “Sādhāraṇaṭṭhāne”ti vutte kāmadhātuyaṃ sukhupekkhāsu pahīno nāma hoti,
tika-abh05t:1078_5: Cha paṭisedhavacanānīti tissannaṃ dhātūnaṃ cutūpapātavisiṭṭhānaṃ paṭisedhanavasena vuttavacanāni,
tika-abh05t:1078_7: Paṭisedhoti hi idha sattāpaṭisedho vuttoti adhippāyena vadati.
tika-abh05t:1078_12: Evañhīti “na kāmadhātuyā cutassa kāmadhātuṃ upapajjantassā”tiādinā paṭhamayojanāya sati.
tika-abh05t:1078_13: Nakāmadhātuādīsu upapattikittaneneva nakāmadhātuādiggahaṇenapi dhātuvisesasseva gahitatāya atthato viññāyamānattā.
tika-abh05t:1078_17: Vibhāgo panettha duvidho icchitoti āha “dvidhā kātabbāti attho”ti.
tika-abh05t:1078_19: Yathā avutte bhaṅgābhāvassa aviññātattā “anusayā bhaṅgā natthī”ti vattabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1078_20: tathā tayidaṃ “kati anusayā bhaṅgā”ti etadapekkhanti tadapi vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1083_3: na nirujjhatī”ti ārabhitvā yāva “yassa avimuttaṃ citta”nti vāro,
tika-abh05t:1083_7: na nirujjhatī”ti ārabhitvā yāva “yassa saraṇaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh05t:1083_12: Suddhikāti kevalā yathāvuttasarāgādīhi kusalādīhi ca amissakā.
tika-abh05t:1083_13: Tayo tayoti puggaladhammavasena tayo tayo mahāvārā.
tika-abh05t:1083_14: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ soḷasa puggalavārāti āha “tattha tattha pana vutte sampiṇḍetvā”ti.
tika-abh05t:1083_15: Tattha tattha soḷasavidhe sarāgādimissakacitte vutte puggale eva ekajjhaṃ sampiṇḍetvā saṅgahetvā “soḷasa puggalavārā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1083_17: Na nirantaraṃ vutteti dhamme puggaladhamme ca anāmasitvā soḷasasupi ṭhānesu nirantaraṃ puggale eva vutte
tika-abh05t:1083_18: sampiṇḍetvā soḷasa puggalavārā na vuttāti attho.
tika-abh05t:1084_1: Aññathā hi uppādanirodhā paccuppannānāgatakālā ca kathaṃ saṃsajjīyanti.
tika-abh05t:1084_4: tassa cittaṃ uppanna”ntiādinā uppādauppannabhāvāmasanato uppādauppannavāroti nāmaṃ pāḷito eva viññāyati,
tika-abh05t:1087_3: “Evaṃpakāra”nti imassa atthaṃ dassetuṃ “bhaṅgakkhaṇasamaṅgimevā”ti vuttaṃ nirujjhamānākārassa “evaṃpakāra”nti vuttattā.
tika-abh05t:1088_1: Dvayametanti yaṃ “khaṇapaccuppannameva cittaṃ uppādakkhaṇāpagamena uppajjittha nāma,
tika-abh05t:1088_5: Evaṃ na sakkā vattunti iminā vuttappakārena na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh05t:1088_10: uppādakkhaṇe taṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha ceva uppajjati cā”ti vibhajitabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh05t:1088_12: “Āmantā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā khaṇapaccuppanne citte vuttanayena ubhayassapi labbhamānattā,
tika-abh05t:1088_19: Na ca kiñci cittaṃ uppajjati cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇasamaṅgibhāvato.
tika-abh05t:1088_21: yaṃ cittasamaṅgī so puggaloti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh05t:1088_22: Yadi anekacittavasenāyaṃ yamakadesanā pavattāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “cittanti hi…pe…
tika-abh05t:1088_25: aññathā “no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatī”tiādinā paṭisedho na yujjeyyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:1089_1: Imassa puggalavārattāti “yassa cittaṃ uppajjamāna”ntiādinayappavattassa imassa atikkantakālavārassa puggalavārattā.
tika-abh05t:1089_3: tassa citta”nti cittasamaṅgipuggalo pucchitoti puggalasseva vissajjanena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1089_4: itarathā aññaṃ pucchitaṃ aññaṃ vissajjitaṃ siyā.
tika-abh05t:1089_5: Na koci puggalo na gahito sabbasattānaṃ anibbattacittatābhāvato.
tika-abh05t:1089_8: Tathā dutiyatatiyāti yathā paṭhamapañho anavasesapuggalavisayattā paṭivacanena vissajjetabbo siyā,
tika-abh05t:1089_9: tathā tato eva dutiyatatiyapañhā “āmantā”icceva vissajjetabbā siyunti attho.
tika-abh05t:1089_10: Catuttho pana pañho evaṃ vibhajitvā puggalavaseneva vissajjetabboti dassento “pacchimacittassā”tiādiṃ
tika-abh05t:1089_11: vatvā tathā avacane kāraṇaṃ dassento “cittavasena puggalavavatthānato”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:1089_12: “Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppādakkhaṇaṃ vītikkanta”nti iminā vattamānassa cittassa vasena puggalo uppādakkhaṇātītacitto,
tika-abh05t:1089_13: “atītaṃ cittaṃ uppādakkhaṇañca vītikkantanti bhaṅgakkhaṇañca vītikkanta”nti iminā pana atītassa cittassa vasena puggalo uppādakkhaṇātītacitto vutto.
tika-abh05t:1090_1: Purimassāti paṭhamaṃ vuttassa sanniṭṭhānapadasaṅgahitassa cittaṃ na bhaṅgakkhaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1090_6: Tassa cittassa taṃtaṃkhaṇavītikkamāvītikkamadassanavasenāti tassa tassa uppādakkhaṇassa bhaṅgakkhaṇassa
tika-abh05t:1090_7: ca yathārahaṃ vītikkamassa avītikkamassa ca dassanavasena dassito hoti puggalavibhāgoti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:1090_9: Puggalavisiṭṭhaṃ cittaṃ pucchitaṃ “yassa cittaṃ tassa citta”nti vuttattā.
tika-abh05t:1090_11: Athāpi cittappadhānā puggalaṃ visesanabhāvena gahetvā cittassa visesitattā.
tika-abh05t:1090_16: Esa nayo “na nirujjhamāna”nti etthāpīti nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ nirodhakkhaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantakālaṃ kiṃ tassa cittaṃ na hotīti attho.
tika-abh05t:1091_2: ekassa puggalassa rāgasampayuttacittesu yaṃ sabbapacchimaṃ cittaṃ, tassa.
tika-abh05t:1091_7: Itaresanti yathāvuttasarāgapacchimacittasamaṅgiṃ vītarāgacittasamaṅgiñca ṭhapetvā avasesānaṃ itarasekkhānañceva puthujjanānañca.
tika-abh05t:1097_1: Yathā mūlayamake kusalādidhammā desitāti kusalākusalābyākatā dhammā kusalakusalamūlādivibhāgato mūlayamake yamakavasena yathā desitā.
tika-abh05t:1100_3: So hi “cittasamuṭṭhānarūpavasena vutta”nti aṭṭhakathaṃ āharitvā “imasmiṃ pañhe kammasamuṭṭhānādirūpañca labbhatī”ti avoca.
tika-abh05t:1100_4: Tathā ca vatvā paṭilomapāḷiṃ dassetvā “cittasamuṭṭhānarūpameva idhādhippetaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1100_7: Tathāti yathā vuttappakāre pāṭhe cittasamuṭṭhānarūpameva adhippetaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1100_10: Taṃ panetanti yathā uddhaṭassa pāṭhassa atthavacanaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1101_0: Ye ca vadantīti ettha ye cāti vajirabuddhittheraṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-abh05t:1101_1: So hi “sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe”tiādinā paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiṃ āharitvā “yathā tattha satipi kammajādirūpe
tika-abh05t:1101_2: ṭhapetvā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpanti cittapaṭibaddhattā cittajarūpameva ṭhapetabbabhāvena uddhaṭaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1101_4: Tañca nesaṃ vacanaṃ tathā na hoti,
tika-abh05t:1101_7: Yathā ca taṃ tathā na hoti,
tika-abh05t:1102_4: tesu purimā dve paṭhamakoṭṭhāsena saṅgahitā tassa kusaluppattipaṭisedhaparattā,
tika-abh05t:1102_5: te pana bhavavasena vibhajitvā vattabbāti dassento “pañcavokāre”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:1103_4: Kusalānāgatabhāvapariyosānenāti kusaladhammānaṃ anāgatabhāvassa pariyosānabhūtena aggamaggānantarapaccayattena dīpitaṃ hoti samānalakkhaṇaṃ sabbaṃ. Kena?
tika-abh05t:1103_6: Esa nayoti yathā kusalānuppādo kusalānāgatabhāvassa pariyosānabhūtato vuttaparicchedato orampi labbhatīti
tika-abh05t:1103_7: so yathāvuttaparicchedo lakkhaṇamattanti svāyaṃ nayo dassito.
tika-abh05t:1103_8: Esa nayo akusalātītabhāvassa ādimhi “dutiye akusale”ti vuttaṭṭhāne,
tika-abh05t:1103_10: Idāni “esa nayo”ti yathāvuttamatidesaṃ “yathā hī”tiādinā pākaṭataraṃ karoti.
tika-abh05t:1103_11: Bhāvanāpahānāni dassitāni honti “aggamaggasamaṅgī kusalañca dhammaṃ bhāveti,
tika-abh05t:1103_15: Tena tenāti “dutiye akusale aggamaggasamaṅgī”ti evamādinā antena ca.
tika-abh05t:1104_4: Abhividhiggahaṇameva vā soḷasacittakkhaṇāyukameva rūpanti imasmiṃ pakkhe adhippete paṭikkhittovāyaṃ vādoti dassento “tato parampi vā”ti āha.
tika-abh05t:1104_6: Na tato oranti viññāyati tato oraṃ akusalanirodhasamakālaṃ abyākatanirodhassa asambhavato.
tika-abh05t:1110_1: Indriyayamake vibhaṅge viyāti yathā indriyavibhaṅge purisindriyānantaraṃ jīvitindriyaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1110_6: Soyaṃ yadatthaṃ tassa sutte desitakkamena uddeso,
tika-abh05t:1110_8: Tattha yathā “jīvitindriya”nti idaṃ rūpajīvitindriyassa arūpajīvitindriyassa ca sāmaññato gahaṇaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1110_9: evaṃ upādinnassa anupādinnassa cāti āha “kammajānaṃ akammajānañca anupālaka”nti.
tika-abh05t:1110_10: Atha vā sahajadhammānupālakampi jīvitindriyaṃ na kevalaṃ khaṇaṭṭhitiyā eva kāraṇaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1110_21: Yasmā cakkhundriyādīsu purisindriyāvasānesu ekantaupādinnesu ataṃsabhāvattā yaṃ manindriyaṃ mūlameva na hoti,
tika-abh05t:1110_23: Āyatanayamake viyāti yathā āyatanayamake paṭisandhivasenāyatanānaṃ uppādo,
tika-abh05t:1110_26: tasmā ataṃsabhāvattā jīvitindriyaṃ tesaṃ cakkhundriyādīnaṃ majjhe anuddisitvā ante purisindriyānantaraṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1110_27: Yaṃ pana cakkhundriyādimūlakesu manindriyaṃ sabbapacchā eva gahitaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1113_1: Koci sabhāvo natthīti koci sabhāvadhammo natthi.
tika-abh05t:1113_2: Yadi evaṃ “natthī”ti paṭikkhepo eva yuttoti āha “na ca rūpādī”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:1113_3: “Sukhā dukkhā adukkhamasukhā”tiādīsu sukhadukkhasaddānaṃ sāmaññavacanabhāvepi indriyadesanāyaṃ te visiṭṭhavisayā evāti dassento “sukhassa…pe…
tika-abh05t:1114_1: Paññindriyāni hontīti āmantāti vuttanti pajānanaṭṭhena adhipateyyaṭṭhena ca paññindriyāni honti,
tika-abh05t:1114_5: “yassa chattiṃsati sotā”tiādīsu pana diṭṭhiādīnampi sotabhāvo āgato.
tika-abh05t:1117_1: Aññadhammanissayenāti “yo tesaṃ rūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyu ṭhitī”tiādinā aññadhammanissayena gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1117_3: cutipaṭisandhiyo gahetvā gatesu yojanā na labbhatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:1117_5: Taṃmūlakā ca nayāti sukhindriyādimūlakā ca nayā.
tika-abh05t:1117_8: Taṃmūlakā ca tathāyojanāmūlabhūtā ca nayā jīvitindriyādimūlakā ca nayā.
tika-abh05t:1117_9: Pākaṭāyevāti pāḷigatiyā eva viññāyamānayojanattā suviññeyyā eva.
tika-abh05t:1118_3: na pana gaṇanaparicchindana”nti āha “na hi catunnaṃyevāti niyamo kato”ti.
tika-abh05t:1118_5: Tattha sasomanassapaṭisandhiyo sandhāya upekkhāpaṭisandhiyo nidassanabhāvena vuttāti keci.
tika-abh05t:1118_8: Taṃsamānalakkhaṇāti vā tāya upekkhāsahagatāya samānalakkhaṇā yathāvuttaahetukapaṭisandhi ca pañcamajjhānapaṭisandhi ca.
tika-abh05t:1118_13: te ekaṃsena taṃsabhāvā evāti ayamettha adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:1119_0: Nanu ca gabbhaseyyakesu ayamattho ekaṃsato na labbhatīti āsaṅkaṃ sandhāyāha “gabbhaseyyakānañca…pe…
tika-abh05t:1119_3: Tattha yadi sahetukapaṭisandhikānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ niyamato sacakkhukādibhāvadassanaṃ gabbhaseyyakavasena labbheyya,
tika-abh05t:1119_5: Tathā āyatanayamake dassitanti idaṃ āyatanayamakavaṇṇanāyaṃ attanā vuttaṃ “evañca katvā indriyayamake”tiādivacanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1119_6: Tattha hi somanassindriyuppādakakammassa ekantena cakkhundriyuppādanato gabbhepi yāva cakkhundriyuppatti,
tika-abh05t:1119_8: Sanniṭṭhānena saṅgahitānanti “yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ uppajjatī”ti etena sanniṭṭhānena saṅgahitānaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1120_3: Tasmāti yasmā cittaṭṭhiti viya dubbalaṃ vīriyaṃ natthi,
tika-abh05t:1120_10: Samādhivīriyāni indriyappattāni ca na hontīti samādhikiccaṃ paṭikkhipati,
tika-abh05t:1121_0: Apāye opapātikavasenāti idaṃ sugatiyaṃ opapātiko vikalindriyo na hotīti katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1121_1: “labbhanteva ñāṇavippayuttāna”nti pana vuttattā “duhetukapaṭisandhikānaṃ vasenā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1121_5: saddena gahitānaṃ parivattamānaliṅgānaṃ vasena uppādanirodhaggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1121_6: Paṭhamakappikānaṃ pana vasena uppādo eva labbhati.
tika-abh05t:1121_7: “Cutiupapattivaseneva dutiyapucchāsupi sanniṭṭhānehi gahaṇaṃ veditabba”nti idaṃ upādinnaindriyehi niyamitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1123_2: Nanu ca uppādova jīvitindriyassa cutiupapattivasena vattabbo,
tika-abh05t:1123_5: Ayañca nayo na kevalaṃ purimakoṭṭhāse eva,
tika-abh05t:1123_6: atha kho itarakoṭṭhāsepi gahito evāti dassento “pacchimakoṭṭhāsepī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:1124_0: “Upapatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe”ti kasmā vuttanti yenādhippāyena codanā katā,
tika-abh05t:1124_10: ubhayañcettha jīvitindriyabhāvasāmaññena ekajjhaṃ katvā gayhati, tasmā.
tika-abh05t:1124_12: Uppādakkhaṇena nidassitanti etena “upapatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe”ti idaṃ nidassanamattanti dasseti.
tika-abh05t:1124_13: Idāni tamevatthaṃ udāharaṇena pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1124_14: Tattha yathā tādisānaṃ anekesaṃ cittānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe labbhamānaṃ tadekadesena sabbapaṭhamassa upapatticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇena nidassitaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1124_15: evamidhāpi khaṇadvaye labbhamānaṃ tadekadesena uppādakkhaṇena nidassitanti evaṃ nidassanattho veditabbo.
tika-abh05t:1125_3: Na na sambhavati upapattikkhaṇassa viya tato paraṃ pavattikkhaṇassapi anāgatakālabhāvato.
tika-abh05t:1125_5: Ayañca attho vārantarepi dissatīti dassento āha “evañca katvā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:1125_9: saddena “ko pana vādo apacchimabhavikassa somanassasahagatapaṭisandhikassā”ti dasseti.
tika-abh05t:1125_10: Apacchimabhavikassa cutito pacchā “somanassindriyaṃ nirujjhissatī”ti vattabbameva natthīti āha “cutito pubbevā”ti.
tika-abh05t:1125_11: Ettha hi paṭhamapucchāsu sanniṭṭhānatthotiādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepattho –
tika-abh05t:1125_12: ettha “yassa cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjissatī”ti evamādīsu yamakesu yā paṭhamapucchā,
tika-abh05t:1125_14: Pucchitabbatthanissayoti “tassa somanassindriyaṃ uppajjissatī”tiādikassa pucchitabbassa atthassa nissayabhūto
tika-abh05t:1125_15: mādisova mayā sadiso eva attho upapattiuppādindriyavā upapattikkhaṇe uppādāvatthaindriyasahito,
tika-abh05t:1125_17: Paṭinivattitvāpi pucchitabbatthassa nissayoti “yassa vā panā”tiādinā paṭinivattitvā pucchitabbassapi
tika-abh05t:1125_18: saṃsayatthassa nissayoti evaṃ iminā viya ajjhāsayena “yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ uppajjissatī”tiādīsu
tika-abh05t:1125_20: Tattheva tāsu eva pubbe vuttapaṭhamapucchāsu eva.
tika-abh05t:1125_21: Pucchitabbaṃ “tassa somanassindriyaṃ uppajjissatī”tiādīsu anāgatabhāvamattena sarūpato gahitaṃ uppādaṃ uppādasaṅkhātaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1125_22: “tassa somanassindriyaṃ nirujjhissatī”tiādīsu anāgatabhāvamattena sarūpato gahitaṃ nirodhaṃ vā nirodhasaṅkhātaṃ vā saṃsayatthaṃ na niyametīti.
tika-abh05t:1125_27: Esa nayoti yvāyaṃ uppādavāre vicāro vutto,
tika-abh05t:1125_29: Tathā hi “yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ nirujjhissati,
tika-abh05t:1126_0: Evaṃ avuttattāti uppādanirodhānaṃ anāgatānaṃ sarūpena avuttattā.
tika-abh05t:1126_1: Na hi tattha te sarūpena vuttā,
tika-abh05t:1126_7: tathā uppādanirodhe appatvā uppādanirodhā sambhavanti yojetunti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:1126_15: abhūtassa uppādassa nirodhassa ca abhāvassāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:1126_19: Assa visesarahitassa abhūtābhāvassāti imassa yathāvuttassa yathā rūpābhāvo vedanābhāvoti koci abhāvopi visesasahito,
tika-abh05t:1127_1: Yādisānanti yāni bhūtāni na vattamānāni sati paccaye uppajjanārahāni,
tika-abh05t:1127_3: Uppādanirodhābhāvena pucchitabbassāti “nuppajjissati na nirujjhissatī”ti evaṃ uppādassa nirodhassa ca abhāvena pucchitabbassa atthassa.
tika-abh05t:1127_5: So yathāvutto attho nissayo etesanti tannissayā.
tika-abh05t:1127_6: Tādisānaṃyeva anāgatānaṃyeva upapatticutiuppādanirodhānaṃ upapatticutisaṅkhātauppādanirodhānaṃ anuppādānirodhānaṃ paṭikkhepavasena.
tika-abh05t:1127_8: Anuppādānirodhā saṃsayapadena pucchitā honti “yassa somanassindriyaṃ nuppajjissati,
tika-abh05t:1128_3: Taṃ pamādalikhitaṃ dhammayamake tādisasseva vacanassa abhāvato.
tika-abh05t:1128_5: taṃ cittayamake vuttaṃ “na hi khaṇapaccuppanne uppajjitthāti atītavohāro atthī”tiādinā.
tika-abh05t:1131_7: Evamaviparīte atthe siddhepi codako “missakattā”ti ettha labbhamānaṃ lesaṃ gahetvā codeti “yadi pariññeyyamissakattā”tiādinā.
tika-abh05t:1131_16: Na abyākatabhāvanti ekena yathā phassadvārato viya viññāṇadvārato kusalādīnaṃ uppattipariyāyo,
tika-abh05t:1131_17: evaṃ vedanākkhandhādīnaṃ viya na abyākatādīnaṃ pariññeyyatāpariyāyoti dasseti.
tika-abh05t:1132_10: na tato aññavisesāti dassento āha “etena pahātabbamevā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:1132_11: Bhāvetabbabhāvo eva tassa aññindriyassa gahito ukkaṃsagativijānanato.
tika-abh05t:1132_13: Dve puggalāti hi ādi anulome āgataṃ uddhaṭaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1132_15: Domanassindriyaṃ na pajahanti nāmāti idaṃ “no ca domanassindriyaṃ pajahantī”ti pāḷipadassa atthavacanaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1132_16: Yaṃ pana “cakkhundriyamūlakaṃ atikkamitvā domanassindriyamūlake idaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1132_17: paṭilome āgataṃ sandhāya vuttattā taṃ na yuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1132_18: na taṃ aṭṭhakathācariyā paṭhamaṃ āgataṃ padaṃ laṅghitvā tādisasseva pacchā āgatapadassa atthavaṇṇanaṃ karonti.
tika-abh05t:1132_19: Padānukkamato eva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā āraddhā,
tika-abh05t:1132_22: na uppaṭipāṭiyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ “dve puggalā”tiādikassa anulome āgatassa uddhaṭattā.
tika-abh05t:1133_1: Cha puggalāti puthujjanena saddhiṃ yāva anāgāmimaggaṭṭhā cha puggalā.
tika-abh05t:1133_2: Abhinditvā gahito tattha bhabbābhabbānaṃ kiccavisesassa aggahitattā.
tika-abh05t:1133_3: Yattha pana sati puthujjanaggahaṇasāmaññe bhabbānaṃ kiccaṃ gahitaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1133_5: tattha te eva bhinditvā vuttā hontīti dassento “ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti,
tika-abh05t:1133_6: ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissantī”ti ca ādimāha.
tika-abh05t:1133_11: Evaṃ puggalabhedaṃ ñatvāti idha puthujjano so ca abhabboti gahito,
tika-abh05t:1133_13: ye ca paṭhamamaggaphalasamaṅgino yāva aggamaggaphalasamaṅginoti evaṃ yathāvuttaṃ puggalavibhāgaṃ ñatvā.
tika-abh05t:1133_14: Tattha tatthāti tesaṃ dve puthujjanā aṭṭha ariyāti imesaṃ yathāvuttapuggalānaṃ bhedato abhedato ca gahaṇavasena āgate tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pāṭhapadese.
tika-abh05t:1133_18: Vissajjanaṃ yojetabbanti vissajjanavasena pavattapāḷiyā yathāvuttaatthadassanena sambandhato vibhāvetabboti.
tika-abh05t:1140_12: evaṃ sattiabhitthavakamanatthopi hoti dhātusaddānaṃ anekatthabhāvatoti “yadicchitanipphādane sakkontīti vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1141_1: sabhāvato pana sabbepi buddhaguṇā anaññasādhāraṇāyevāti dassento “niratisayāya abhiññākīḷāya,
tika-abh05t:1141_4: Gahaṇañcettha tesu upalabbhamānasammāpaṭipattiaveccappasādānaṃ tehi upanīyamānasakkārassa ca abhinandanaṃ anumodanaṃ sampaṭicchanañca veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1141_5: Dhammasabhāvānurūpānusāsanīvacaneneva ca pana sikkhāpadapaññattipi saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā vītikkamadhammānurūpā anusāsanīti katvā.
tika-abh05t:1141_11: Pūjanīyataro devoti idaṃ pūjanīyapariyāyo ayaṃ ati-
tika-abh05t:1141_16: tesupi vā labbhamānaṃ upapattidevabhāvamattameva gahetvā tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1142_1: isīsu sattamoti duvidhampi atthaṃ yojetvā dassento “catusaccāvabodhagatiyā…pe…
tika-abh05t:1142_5: Isi ca so sattamo cāti isisattamoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh05t:1142_9: Tasmiñhi nirodhite sabbaso nāmarūpaṃ nirodhitameva hoti.
tika-abh05t:1142_10: Yathāha “sotāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena satta bhave ṭhapetvā anamatagge saṃsāre ye uppajjeyyuṃ nāmañca rūpañca,
tika-abh05t:1142_12: arahato anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyantassa carimaviññāṇassa nirodhena paññā ca sati ca nāmañca rūpañca,
tika-abh05t:1142_13: etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṃ gacchanti paṭippassambhantī”ti.
tika-abh05t:1145_3: Tattha “dve anulomāni dhammānulomañca paccayānulomañcā”tiādinā parato vaṇṇayissanti.
tika-abh05t:1146_1: taṃ pana yasmā avayavadvārena samudāye niruḷhaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1146_4: Atha vā avayavānameva paṭṭhānanāmattho niddhāretabbo taṃsamudāyamattattā pakaraṇassa.
tika-abh05t:1146_5: Na hi samudāyo nāma koci attho atthīti dassetuṃ “paṭṭhānaṃ…pe…
tika-abh05t:1146_9: Vacanasamudāyatthavijānanena viditapaṭṭhānasāmaññatthassa vitthārato paṭṭhānakathā vuccamānā sukhaggahaṇā hotīti dassento āha “evañhi…pe… hotī”ti.
tika-abh05t:1146_11: Sabbasādhāraṇassāti sabbesaṃ avayavabhūtānaṃ tikapaṭṭhānādīnaṃ samudāyassa ca sādhāraṇassa.
tika-abh05t:1146_12: Atthato āpannaṃ nānāvidhabhāvanti pakāraggahaṇeneva pakārānaṃ anekavidhatā ca gahitāva hontīti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1146_18: Etasmiñca atthanaye saddatopi nānāvidhabhāvasiddhi dassitāti veditabbā.
tika-abh05t:1146_20: nānappakārānaṃ paccayatā ca nānappakārapaccayatāti ubhayampi sāmaññaniddesena ekasesanayena vā ekajjhaṃ gahitanti dassento “ekassapi…pe…
tika-abh05t:1147_1: so pana tattha paccayabhāvo na tathā tapparabhāvena vibhatto yathā paṭṭhāneti dassento “etena…pe…
tika-abh05t:1149_0: Tividhena paricchedena desitesu dhammesu tikavohāroti āha “tikānanti tikavasena vuttadhammāna”nti.
tika-abh05t:1149_2: Samantāti samantato sabbabhāgatoti vuttaṃ hotīti āha “anulomādīhi sabbappakārehipī”ti.
tika-abh05t:1149_4: Samantacatuvīsatipaṭṭhānānīti samantato anulomādisabbabhāgato samodhānavasena catuvīsati paṭṭhānāni.
tika-abh05t:1149_9: Yathāvuttato aññassa pakārassa asambhavato “anūnehi nayehi pavattānīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti āha.
tika-abh05t:1149_11: Ayañca atthavaṇṇanā aṭṭhakathāvacanena aññadatthu saṃsandatīti dassento āha “tenevāha…pe…
tika-abh05t:1150_1: Satipi hetusabhāvassa ārammaṇapaccayādibhāve savisese tāva paccaye dassentena “adhipatipaccayādibhūtassa cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1150_2: “Hetu hutvā paccayo”ti vutte dhammassa hetusabhāvatā niddhāritā,
tika-abh05t:1150_3: na paccayavisesoti tassa adhipatipaccayādibhāvo na nivāritoti āha “etenapi so eva doso āpajjatī”ti.
tika-abh05t:1150_9: svāyaṃ anaññasādhāraṇatāya dhammato anaññopi paccayantarasamavāyeyeva labbhamānattā añño viya katvā vutto.
tika-abh05t:1150_12: na hetusabhāvadhammavācakoti āha “hetu hutvā paccayoti ca vutta”nti.
tika-abh05t:1151_1: Yadi evaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dhammasseva paccayatāvacanaṃ kathanti āha “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:1151_2: Teneva cettha amhehipi “dhammato anaññopi añño viya katvā”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1151_4: mūlaṭṭhena upakārako dhammo”ti ca ādīsu dhammena dhammasattivibhāvanaṃ kataṃ,
tika-abh05t:1151_5: atha kasmā idha hetubhāvena paccayoti dhammasattiyeva vibhāvitāti codanaṃ manasi katvā vuttaṃ “idhāpi vā…pe…
tika-abh05t:1151_7: Dhammasattivibhāvanaṃ panettha na sakkā paṭikkhipitunti dassento “na hī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:1151_13: Atha vā etīti etassa atthoti “etī”ti etassa padassa attho “vattatī”ti ettha vattanakiriyā.
tika-abh05t:1151_18: tadaggena ṭhitiyāpi paccayoti koci āsaṅkeyyāti tadāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ vuttaṃ “koci hi…pe…
tika-abh05t:1151_20: Ettha ca yathā uppajjanārahānaṃ uppattiyā paccaye satiyeva uppādo, nāsati,
tika-abh05t:1151_21: evaṃ tiṭṭhantānampi ṭhitipaccayavaseneva ṭhānaṃ yathā jīvitindriyavasena sahajātadhammānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1152_2: “Lobho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāyā”tiādivacanato hetūnaṃ kammanidānabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-abh05t:1153_2: Sabhāvatovāti etena yathā aññesaṃ rūpagataṃ obhāsentassa padīpassa rūpagatobhāsakena aññena payojanaṃ natthi sayaṃ obhāsanasabhāvattā,
tika-abh05t:1153_3: evaṃ aññesaṃ kusalādibhāvasādhakānaṃ hetūnaṃ aññena kusalādibhāvasādhakena payojanaṃ natthi sayameva kusalādisabhāvattāti dasseti.
tika-abh05t:1153_4: Na sabhāvasiddho alobhādīnaṃ kusalādibhāvo ubhayasabhāvattā taṃsampayuttaphassādīnaṃ viyāti imamatthaṃ dasseti “yasmā panā”tiādinā.
tika-abh05t:1154_0: Na koci dhammo na hotīti rūpādibhedena chabbidhesu saṅkhatāsaṅkhatapaññattidhammesu kocipi dhammo ārammaṇapaccayo na na hoti,
tika-abh05t:1155_6: Chandādīsu hi hīnesu majjhimesu paṇītesu taṃtaṃsampayuttāpi tathā tathā pavattanti.
tika-abh05t:1156_0: Tadanantaruppādaniyamoti tassa tasseva cittassa anantaraṃ uppajjamānataṃ.
tika-abh05t:1156_1: Taṃtaṃsahakārīpaccayavisiṭṭhassāti tena tena ārammaṇādinā sahakārīkāraṇena taduppādanasamatthatāsaṅkhātaṃ visesaṃ pattassa.
tika-abh05t:1156_2: Tāyayevāti yā vekhādāne pupphanasamatthatā vekhāpagame laddhokāsā, tāyameva.
tika-abh05t:1157_5: Sati hi samakālatte byavadhānāsaṅkā eva na siyā saṇṭhānābhāvato.
tika-abh05t:1157_6: Idamito heṭṭhā uddhaṃ tiriyanti vibhāgābhāvā attanā ekattamiva upanetvāti yojanā.
tika-abh05t:1158_5: kathamidaṃ “sattāhaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā pañca kappasatāni atikkamitvā”ti vacananti āha “na hi tesaṃ…pe…
tika-abh05t:1158_7: Nanu tesaṃ antarā rūpasantāno pavattatevāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “na ca…pe…
tika-abh05t:1158_9: Yadi evaṃ tesaṃ aññabhinnasantānaṃ viya aññamaññūpakārenapi bhavitabbanti codanāya vuttaṃ “rūpārūpa…pe… hontī”ti.
tika-abh05t:1158_11: yadipi rūpārūpadhammā ekasmiṃ puggale vattamānā visesato aññamaññūpakārakabhāvena vattanti,
tika-abh05t:1158_12: aññamaññaṃ pana visadisasabhāvatāya visuṃyeva santānabhāvena pavattanato byavadhāyakā na honti santativasena mithu apariyāpannattā,
tika-abh05t:1158_15: Upakārako ca nāma accantaṃ bhinnasantānānampi hotiyevāti na tāvatā santānābhedoti bhiyyopi nesaṃ byavadhāyakatābhāvo veditabbo.
tika-abh05t:1158_16: Yathā samānajātikānaṃ cittuppādānaṃ nirantaratā suṭṭhu anantarabhāvena pākaṭā,
tika-abh05t:1158_17: na tathā asamānajātikānanti adhippāyena “javanānantarassa javanassa viya bhavaṅgānantarassa bhavaṅgassa viyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1159_17: Tenevāti kālavasena paricchijja eva dhammānaṃ gahaṇato.
tika-abh05t:1160_0: Uppattiyā paccayabhāvena pākaṭenāti idaṃ tassa nidassanabhāvanidassanaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1160_7: Evañhi “pakāsassa padīpo viyā”ti nidassanampi suṭṭhu yujjati.
tika-abh05t:1161_0: Aññamaññatāvasenevāti iminā sahajātādibhāvena attano upakārakassa upakārakatāmattaṃ na aññamaññapaccayatā,
tika-abh05t:1161_4: Yadipi aññamaññapaccayo sahajātādipaccayehi vinā na hoti,
tika-abh05t:1161_5: sahajātādipaccayā pana tena vināpi hontīti sahajātatādividhureneva pakārena aññamaññapaccayassa pavattīti dassento “sahajātādi…pe…
tika-abh05t:1161_6: na hotī”ti vatvā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “na ca purejāta…pe…
tika-abh05t:1162_0: Pathavīdhātuyaṃ patiṭṭhāya eva sesadhātuyo upādārūpāni viya yathāsakakiccaṃ karontīti vuttaṃ “adhiṭṭhānākārena pathavīdhātu sesadhātūna”nti.
tika-abh05t:1162_2: Ādhārākāro cettha nesaṃ sātisayaṃ tadadhīnavuttitāya veditabbo,
tika-abh05t:1162_4: Evañca katvā cakkhādīnampi adhiṭṭhānākārena upakārakatā suṭṭhu yujjati.
tika-abh05t:1162_5: Na hi yathāvuttaṃ tadadhīnavuttiyā visesaṃ muñcitvā añño cakkhādīsu adesakānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ adhiṭṭhānākāro sambhavati.
tika-abh05t:1162_6: Yadipi yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ye ye dhammā pavattanti,
tika-abh05t:1162_8: yena pana paccayabhāvavisesena cakkhādīnaṃ paṭumandabhāvesu cakkhuviññāṇādayo tadanuvidhānākāreneva pavattanti,
tika-abh05t:1162_9: svāyamidaṃ tesaṃ tadadhīnavuttiyā siddho visesoti vutto.
tika-abh05t:1162_10: Evañhi paccayabhāvasāmaññe satipi ārammaṇapaccayato nissayapaccayassa viseso siddhoti veditabbo.
tika-abh05t:1164_5: Atha vā tathāti nipphādanavasena upasevanavasena ca.
tika-abh05t:1164_7: taṃ suviññeyyanti anāmasitvā upasevanameva vibhāvento “upasevito vā”ti āha.
tika-abh05t:1164_15: Paccuppannassapi hi “paccuppannaṃ utu bhojanaṃ senāsanaṃ upanissāya jhānaṃ uppādentī”tiādivacanato pakatūpanissayabhāve labbhatīti.
tika-abh05t:1165_0: Yathā ye dhammā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ pacchājātapaccayā honti,
tika-abh05t:1165_2: tathā ye dhammā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ purejātapaccayā honti,
tika-abh05t:1165_3: te tesaṃ nissayārammaṇapaccayāpi hontīti ubhayesu ubhayesaṃ paccayākārānaṃ lakkhaṇato saṅkarābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “vippayuttākārādīhi visiṭṭhā,
tika-abh05t:1165_6: evaṃ pacchājātavippayuttākārādayo purejātanissayākārādayo ca aññamaññavibhattasabhāvā evāti.
tika-abh05t:1166_0: Manosañcetanāhāravasena pavattamānehīti iminā cetanāya sampayuttadhammānampi tadanuguṇaṃ attano paccayuppannesu pavattimāha.
tika-abh05t:1167_0: Payogena karaṇīyassāti etena bhinnajāti yaṃ tādisaṃ payogena kātuṃ na sakkā,
tika-abh05t:1167_2: Anekavāraṃ pavattiyā āsevanaṭṭhassa pākaṭabhāvoti katvā vuttaṃ “punappunaṃ karaṇa”nti.
tika-abh05t:1167_9: Na hi parittā dhammā mahaggataappamāṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ āsevanapaccayā na hontīti.
tika-abh05t:1167_16: Tena ganthasippādivisayā purimasiddhā ajjhayanādikiriyā “ganthādīsu purimā purimā”ti vuttā,
tika-abh05t:1167_17: sā pana āsevanākārā idha udāharaṇabhāvena adhippetāti āha “purimā purimā āsevanā viyāti adhippāyo”ti.
tika-abh05t:1167_19: Ganthādivisayā hi āsevanā ganthādīti vuttā yathā rūpavisayajjhānaṃ rūpanti vuttaṃ “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādīsu.
tika-abh05t:1168_0: Attano viya sampayuttadhammānampi kiccasādhikā cetanā cittassa byāpārabhāvena lakkhīyatīti āha “cittapayogo cetanā”ti.
tika-abh05t:1168_2: Uppannakiriyatāvisiṭṭheti cittapayogasaṅkhātāya cetanākiriyāya uppattiyā visiṭṭhe visesaṃ āpanne.
tika-abh05t:1168_4: tattha yathābalaṃ tādisaṃ visesādhānaṃ katvā nirujjhati,
tika-abh05t:1168_5: yato tattheva avasesapaccayasamavāye tassā phalabhūtāni vipākakaṭattārūpāni nibbattissanti.
tika-abh05t:1168_10: Kiṃ vattabbanti asahajātānampi bhāvīnaṃ upakārikā cetanā sahajātānaṃ upakārikāti vattabbameva natthīti attho.
tika-abh05t:1169_6: Svāyaṃ yathā asamugghātitānusayānaṃ kiriyamayacittuppādesu sātisayo labbhati,
tika-abh05t:1169_8: Tato eva te santasabhāvā vipākuppādanabyāpārarahitāva honti,
tika-abh05t:1169_9: kiriyamayacittuppādatāya pana saussāhā evāti tatopi visesanatthaṃ “nirussāhasantabhāvenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1169_12: Visadisavipākabhāvaṃ dasseti yathāvuttaussāhamattarahitasantabhāvassa vipakkabhāvamāpannesu arūpadhammesu eva labbhanato.
tika-abh05t:1169_14: Vipākānaṃ payogena asādhetabbatāyāti “chandavato kiṃ nāmana sijjhatī”tiādinā cittābhisaṅkhārapayogena yathā kusalākusalā nipphādīyanti,
tika-abh05t:1169_20: Kammassa kaṭattāyeva payoge sati asatipīti vuttamevatthaṃ avadhāraṇena dassento vipākānaṃ nirussāhataṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti.
tika-abh05t:1169_21: Na kilesavūpasamasantabhāvo yathā taṃ santānesu jhānasamāpattīsūti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t:1169_25: Tenevāha “pañcahi viññāṇehi na kiñci dhammaṃ paṭijānāti aññatra abhinipātamattā”ti.
tika-abh05t:1170_0: Yathāsakaṃ paccayehi nibbattānaṃ paccayuppannānaṃ anubalappadānaṃ upatthambhakattaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1170_1: tayidaṃ āhāresu na niyataṃ tato aññathāpi pavattanato.
tika-abh05t:1170_2: Tathā sati tadeva tattha kasmā gahitanti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “satipi…pe…
tika-abh05t:1170_4: Tena padhānāppadhānesu padhānena niddeso ñāyagatoti dasseti.
tika-abh05t:1170_6: sāmaññajotanā pana visese avatiṭṭhatīti yathārahaṃ paccayabhāvo niddhāretabbo.
tika-abh05t:1170_7: Svāyaṃ tesaṃ upatthambhakattassa padhānabhāvavibhāvaneneva āvi bhavatīti tameva dassento “upatthambhakattañhī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:1170_8: Phassamanosañcetanāviññāṇāni attanā sahajātadhammānaṃ sahuppādanabhāvena paccayā hontīti āha “satipi janakatte arūpīnaṃ āhārāna”nti.
tika-abh05t:1170_9: Upatthambhakattaṃ hoti uppādato parampi nesaṃ paccayabhāvato.
tika-abh05t:1170_10: Asatipi janakatte upatthambhiyamānassa rūpassa aññehi yathāsakaṃ paccayehi janitattā.
tika-abh05t:1170_12: Yadaggena rūpārūpāhārā attano phalassa uppattiyā paccayā honti,
tika-abh05t:1170_13: tadaggena ṭhitiyāpi paccayā hontiyevāti upatthambhakattaṃ janakattaṃ na byabhicarati,
tika-abh05t:1170_17: Yasmā janako ajanakopi hutvā āhāro upatthambhako hoti,
tika-abh05t:1170_18: anupatthambhako pana hutvā janako na hotiyeva,
tika-abh05t:1170_20: Idāni janakattampi āhārānaṃ upatthambhanavaseneva hotīti dassento “janayamānopi hī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:1171_1: evaṃ sante adhipatipaccayato indriyapaccayassa kiṃ nānākaraṇanti codanaṃ manasi katvā taṃ tesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ
tika-abh05t:1171_3: Tattha pavattinivāraketi attano adhipatipaccayapavattiyā nivārake aññe adhipatipaccayadhamme.
tika-abh05t:1171_4: Abhibhavitvā pavattanenāti purimābhisaṅkhārasiddhena dhoreyyabhāvena abhibhuyya pavattiyā.
tika-abh05t:1171_7: yena jeṭṭhakabhāvena chandādayo attano pavattivibandhake tulyayogīdhamme tadaññadhamme viya abhibhuyya pavattanti,
tika-abh05t:1171_10: Dassanādikiccesu nimittabhūtesu cakkhuviññāṇādīhi cakkhādīhi paccayehi cakkhādīnaṃ anuvattanīyatāti sambandho.
tika-abh05t:1172_3: Tappaccayānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ tadanuvattanena tesaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ anuvattanena.
tika-abh05t:1172_5: Pavattīti ca idaṃ tassa adhipatiyaṭṭhassa pākaṭakaraṇaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1172_6: Anuvattakena hi anuvattanīyo adhipatiyaṭṭho pākaṭo hoti.
tika-abh05t:1172_9: Tassa pana tādisena kāraṇatāmattenāti dassento “itthipurisindriyānaṃ panā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:1172_13: “Sukhindriyadukkhindriyānipi cakkhādiggahaṇena gahitānī”ti idaṃ indriyapaccayameva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1172_14: pacchājātādīhi pana tāni rūpadhammānampi paccayā hontiyeva.
tika-abh05t:1173_0: Lakkhaṇārammaṇūpanijjhānabhūtānanti aniccatādilakkhaṇassa pathavīkasiṇādiārammaṇassa ca upanijjhānavasena pavattānaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1173_2: Upagantvā nijjhānanti upanikacca nijjhānajjhānārammaṇassa jhānacakkhunā byattataraṃ olokanaṃ atthato
tika-abh05t:1173_12: Ajhānaṅgā upekkhācittekaggatā pañcaviññāṇasahagatā daṭṭhabbā vitakkapacchimakattā jhānaṅgānaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1173_13: Yadi evanti jhānaṅgavacaneneva ajhānaṅgānaṃ nivattanaṃ kataṃ,
tika-abh05t:1173_19: Atha vā yadi ekantena ajhānaṅgataṃ vedanādvayaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1173_23: Yadi evaṃ yathāvuttavedanādvayena saddhiṃ tādisā upekkhācittekaggatā kasmā na ṭhapitāti āha “upekkhā…pe… atthī”ti,
tika-abh05t:1174_0: Yato tato vāti duggatito vā sugatito vā saṃkilesato vā vodānato vā niyyānaṭṭho,
tika-abh05t:1174_1: svāyaṃ yathākkamaṃ sammā micchā vā hotīti āha “sammā vā micchā vāti attho”ti.
tika-abh05t:1174_2: Ahetukacittesu na labbhantīti ettha ahetukacittesu eva na labbhantīti evamavadhāraṇaṃ gahetabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1174_4: Tasmā purimasmiñhi avadhāraṇe ahetukacittesu alābho niyatoti so patiyogīsu nivattito hoti.
tika-abh05t:1174_6: Dutiye pana ahetukacittāni alābhe niyatānīti tesu anavasesato alābhena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1174_7: Tathā sati yo kesuci ahetukacittesu jhānapaccayo labbhati,
tika-abh05t:1174_10: Tattha lābhābhāvadassanatthanti lābhābhāvasseva dassanatthaṃ na vuttanti attho.
tika-abh05t:1174_13: Evaṃ atthe gayhamāneti evaṃ vuttanayena paṭhamapadāvadhāraṇavasena atthe viññāyamāne.
tika-abh05t:1174_14: Ettakameva viññāyeyyāti ahetukacittesu kesuci cittesu jhānamaggapaccayesu kassaci paccayassa lābho na
tika-abh05t:1174_16: Kiṃ panettha upari kātabbanti āha “na savitakka…pe… kata”nti.
tika-abh05t:1175_1: Tasmāti yasmā ahetukacittesu na labbhanti evāti evaṃ niyame kariyamāne yathāvutto attho sambhavati, tasmā.
tika-abh05t:1175_2: Ayañca attho pāṭhantarenapi saṃsandatīti dassetuṃ “yena alābhenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1175_3: Taṃ alābhanti taṃ dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ pakāsitaṃ alābhaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1175_4: Esāti esa idha paṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ “ahetukacittesu na labbhantī”ti alābho vutto.
tika-abh05t:1175_5: Kīdiso pana alābhoti taṃ dassento “yathā hī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t:1175_9: Imasmiṃ pana pakaraṇe jhānapaccayo vuttova yathālābhapaccayākāravibhāvane desanāya tapparabhāvato.
tika-abh05t:1176_3: Sā pana saṃsaṭṭhatā yasmā sabhāvato anekesampi sataṃ ekattagamanaṃ viya hoti,
tika-abh05t:1176_5: Evaṃ upakārakatā ca tesaṃ bahūnaṃ sahacca ekattakāritāya nidassetabbā.
tika-abh05t:1177_0: Yuttānampi satanti vuttappakārena saṃsaṭṭhatāya aññamaññasambandhatāya yuttānampi samānānaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1177_1: Ayañca yuttatā na sampayuttapaccayatāya viya paccayadhammesu paccayuppannadhammesu ca veditabbā,
tika-abh05t:1177_6: Idañhettha vippayuttatāya visesanaṃ yā nānattūpagamanasaṅkhātā vippayuttatā,
tika-abh05t:1177_8: ayañca upakārakatā vinā saṃsaggena sahāvaṭṭhāyitāya kiccakāritādīhi nidassetabbā.
tika-abh05t:1177_9: Na hītiādi “yuttāna”nti vuttassa atthassa samatthanaṃ “tādise yoge satiyeva vippayuttapaccayatā”ti.
tika-abh05t:1177_14: pacchājātā kusalā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo”tiādivacanato vatthusahajātapacchājātavasena
tika-abh05t:1177_17: Yadi evaṃ rūpānaṃ rūpehi kasmā vippayuttapaccayo na vuttoti āha “rūpānaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:1177_21: sampayogalakkhaṇaṃ pana natthīti tesaṃ vippayogo vutto.
tika-abh05t:1178_0: Atthi me pāpakammaṃ katanti katabhāvavisiṭṭhā atthitā vuccamānā kiriyāya siddhabhāvameva dīpeti,
tika-abh05t:1178_2: Atthato pana kammassa anibbattaphalatāya evamettha atthitā veditabbā.
tika-abh05t:1178_3: Atthi puggaloti panettha tassā paññattiyā gahetabbatā,
tika-abh05t:1178_4: tadupādānassa vā pabandhāvicchedo labbhatevāti vuttaṃ “upalabbhamānatālakkhaṇaṃ atthibhāva”nti.
tika-abh05t:1178_5: Paccayadhammassa yadipi uppādato paṭṭhāya yāva bhaṅgā labbhamānatā atthibhāvo,
tika-abh05t:1178_6: tathāpi tassa yathā uppādakkhaṇato ṭhitikkhaṇe sātisayo byāpāro,
tika-abh05t:1178_7: evaṃ paccayuppannepīti vuttaṃ “satipi janakatte upatthambhakappaṭṭhānā atthibhāvena upakārakatā”ti.
tika-abh05t:1178_10: Atthibhāveneva na nissayādibhāvenāti “sādhāraṇa”nti vuttaṃ upakārakattaṃ vibhāveti.
tika-abh05t:1179_0: Phassādīnaṃ anekesaṃ sahabhāvo natthīti idaṃ na ekacittuppādapariyāpanne sandhāya,
tika-abh05t:1179_1: atha kho nānācittuppādapariyāpanneti dassento “ekasmiṃ phassādisamudāye sati dutiyo na hotī”ti āha.
tika-abh05t:1179_3: Ettāvatā pana anavabujjhantānaṃ vasena vivaritvā vutto.
tika-abh05t:1179_12: evamajjhāsayā viya paccayadhammā abhāvaṃ gacchantīti dassanatthaṃ viya-
tika-abh05t:1180_0: Natthitāvigamānaṃ satipi paccayassa dhammassa anupaladdhitāsāmaññe natthivigatapaccayesu labbhamānaṃ visesamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1180_4: Sabhāvavigamenāti etena nirodhato parampi yato “vigatatā nirodhappattatā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1180_5: Paccayadhamme yāsaṃ natthitāvigatatānaṃ vasena natthivigatapaccayā vuttā,
tika-abh05t:1180_6: tāsaṃ visese dassite natthivigatapaccayānaṃ viseso dassito hotīti “natthitā ca nirodhānantarasuññatā vigatatā nirodhappattatā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1180_8: Tathāti iminā yathā paccayadhammāvisesepi natthivigatapaccayabhāvaviseso niddhārito,
tika-abh05t:1180_10: Yathā hi nirodhānantaranirodhappattīhi natthivigatatānaṃ bhedo lakkhito,
tika-abh05t:1180_12: Kathaṃ panāyaṃ dhammāvisese paccayabhāvaviseso duviññeyyarūpena ṭhito sammā vibhāvissatīti āha “dhammānañhī”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:1181_0: Catūsu khandhesu ekassapi asaṅgahitattābhāvato anantarādīhīti vibhattiṃ pariṇāmetvā yojanā.
tika-abh05t:1181_3: Nanu ca rūparūpampi purejātapaccayabhāvena kusalattike nāgatanti āha “rūparūpaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:1181_5: sanidassanattikādīsu pana āgatattā na sakkā rūparūpassa purejātapaccayataṃ paṭikkhipitunti attho.
tika-abh05t:1185_4: Ettha ca paṭhamavikappe yo hetupaccayena paccayabhāvo vutto,
tika-abh05t:1185_5: yo ca dutiyavikappe hetubhāvena paccayo vutto,
tika-abh05t:1185_6: so yasmā atthato yathāvuttassa paccayadhammassa yathāvuttānaṃ paccayuppannānaṃ hetupaccayabhāvoyeva,
tika-abh05t:1185_7: tasmā vuttaṃ “ubhayathāpi hetubhāvena upakārakatā hetupaccayoti uddiṭṭhoti dassitaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-abh05t:1185_10: ārammaṇabhāvena vā paccayo ārammaṇapaccayo”tiādinā ārammaṇapaccayādīsu attho netabboti dassento “esa nayo sesapaccayesupī”ti āha.
tika-abh05t:1185_12: na dhammato aññā dhammasatti nāma atthīti.
tika-abh05t:1186_4: So hi chabbidho navavidho dvādasavidhoti anekabhedena bhinnopi hetubhāvasāmaññena ekajjhaṃ katvā ekavacanena vutto.
tika-abh05t:1186_6: Hetunā sampayuttānanti adhikatattā vuttaṃ “hetu sampayuttānaṃ paccayo honto hetunā sampayuttānameva paccayo hoti,
tika-abh05t:1186_8: Na hi sabbena sabbaṃ hetuvippayuttadhammānaṃ hetupaccayo na hotīti.
tika-abh05t:1186_10: Sampayuttoti hi vutte kena sampayuttoti ekantato sambandhiantaraṃ apekkhitabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1186_13: Nāyaṃ ekantoti yvāyaṃ “dutiye hetusadde avijjamāne”tiādinā vutto attho,
tika-abh05t:1186_15: aññāpekkhopi saddo aññassa visesanaṃ hotīti idaṃ na sabbattheva sambhavatīti attho.
tika-abh05t:1186_19: Evanti yathā hetusaddena aññattha byāvaṭena sampayuttā na visesiyanti kiccantarapasutattā,
tika-abh05t:1186_20: evaṃ sampayuttasaddena hetusaddavisesanarahitena tadatthamattabyāvaṭattā avisesato sampayuttānaṃ gahaṇaṃ siyā.
tika-abh05t:1186_22: Āhārindriyāsampayuttassa abhāvatoti āhārehi indriyehi ca nasampayuttassa dhammassa abhāvato.
tika-abh05t:1187_6: Vināpi dutiyena hetusaddena hetusampayuttabhāve siddhepīti iminā yaṃ vuttaṃ “nāyamekanto”ti,
tika-abh05t:1187_8: Na pana hetūnanti idaṃ hetussa paccayabhāvena gahitattā paccayuppannabhāvena gahaṇaṃ na yujjeyyāti āsaṅkamānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1187_11: Apare pana “hetusampayuttakāna”nti ettha hetūnañca sampayuttakānañcāti samāsaṃ vikappenti.
tika-abh05t:1187_12: Patiṭṭhāmattādibhāvena nirapekkhāti hetujhānamaggadhammā patiṭṭhānaupanijjhānaniyyānamattena aññadhammanirapekkhā hetujhānamaggapaccayakiccaṃ karonti.
tika-abh05t:1187_16: te attano paccayuppannadhamme paccayabhāveneva paricchinditvā tiṭṭhanti, tasmā.
tika-abh05t:1187_23: idha ca hetupaccayaniddese dutiyena hetuggahaṇena paccayuppannānaṃ puna visesanakiccaṃ natthi, kasmā?
tika-abh05t:1187_24: Paccayabhūteneva hetunā sampayuttānaṃ aññesañca hetūnaṃ avicchinnattā.
tika-abh05t:1188_3: pākaṭībhāvo ca aññānapekkhena saddena pakāsitattā veditabbo.
tika-abh05t:1189_0: Yadi evaṃ “taṃsamuṭṭhānāna”nti ettha kathanti āha “hetusampayuttakānanti iminā panā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:1189_2: saddo satipi hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ niddesabhāve hetusampayuttakasadde labbhamānānaṃ niddisitabbānaṃ
tika-abh05t:1189_5: Tena ca yathādhippetassa atthassa ekadesova vuccati dhammānaṃ visesanabhāvatoti āha “asamattenā”ti.
tika-abh05t:1189_7: Vuttatāya vinā paṭiniddesatā natthīti “pubbe vuttenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1190_2: saddena niddisitabbaṃ hetusampayuttakasadde pākaṭībhūtaṃ kiṃ panāti pucchati.
tika-abh05t:1190_6: Aññathāti “yehi hetūhī”tiādinā vuttappakārato aññathā aññena pakārena.
tika-abh05t:1190_13: evaṃ pubbe “taṃsampayuttakāna”nti vuttacodanāyampi evameva teneva taṃ-
tika-abh05t:1190_17: Duvidhampi vā hetuggahaṇaṃ apanetvāti “hetū hetusampayuttakāna”nti ettha kataṃ dvippakārahetuggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh05t:1190_21: Hetū hi paccayāti idaṃ ayaṃ hetupaccayakathāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1191_0: Taṃ na vuttanti cittasamuṭṭhānavacanaṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t:1191_3: vuttova so “vipākābyākato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo,
tika-abh05t:1191_4: tayo khandhā ekassa khandhassa kaṭattā ca rūpāna”ntiādinā,
tika-abh05t:1191_5: tasmā cittacetasikānaṃ kaṭattārūpapaccayabhāvo na sakkā nivāretuṃ.
tika-abh05t:1191_7: Tattha hi “cittacetasikā dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo”ti cittasamuṭṭhānarūpāni eva niddiṭṭhāni.
tika-abh05t:1191_10: Yadi evaṃ kasmā tathā na vuttanti āha “cittasamuṭṭhānānanti panā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t:1191_13: Cittacetasikānaṃ paccayabhāvo eva hi tattha paccayaniddese vutto,
tika-abh05t:1192_2: Ārammaṇametaṃ hotīti yadetaṃ kusalākusalacetanāvasena manodvāre cetanaṃ sesadvāresu kāyavacīpayogavasena saṅkappanaṃ,
tika-abh05t:1192_4: etaṃ ārammaṇaṃ eso paccayo kammaviññāṇassa ṭhitiyā patiṭṭhānāya.
tika-abh05t:1192_5: Patiṭṭhiteti kammaṃ javāpetvā paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanasamatthatāpatiṭṭhāpatte kammaviññāṇe viruḷheti tato
tika-abh05t:1192_6: eva kammaviññāṇato paṭisandhiviññāṇabīje viruḷhe viruhanteti attho.
tika-abh05t:1192_7: Atha vā patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa hotīti kilesābhisaṅkhārasaṅkhāte kammaviññāṇassa ṭhitiyā pavattiyā ārammaṇe
tika-abh05t:1192_9: tasmiṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇe punabbhavābhinibbattivasena patiṭṭhite patiṭṭhahante viruḷhe bījabhāvena viruhante
